title: Kohl's - Shopping & More
description:
With the Kohl‚Äôs App, shopping and saving have never been easier. It‚Äôs packed with features to help you find the best deals, browse online or in store, manage payments and so much more.¬†Here are just a few reasons why you‚Äôll love using the Kohl‚Äôs App.

Store your savings in your Kohl‚Äôs Wallet.
Access all your coupons, rewards and Kohl‚Äôs Cash in one convenient place, so the best value is always at your fingertips.

Never miss a deal with offer reminders.
Kohl‚Äôs Cash or exclusive coupons about to expire? We‚Äôll let you know with mobile reminders and personalized notifications.

Use the Scanner to shop online or in store.
Scan product bar codes to check prices, sizes, colors and reviews. Can‚Äôt find what you‚Äôre looking for? Buy it on the Kohl‚Äôs App while you‚Äôre in the store and get free shipping.

Save and pay in one scan with Kohl‚Äôs Pay.
Quickly select all your coupons, rewards and Kohl's Cash, and apply them with a single scan to breeze through checkout.

Manage your Kohl‚Äôs Card and Kohl‚Äôs Rewards accounts.
The Kohl‚Äôs App keeps you signed in so you can easily check your Kohl's Card balance and make payments. Plus, it tracks your rewards balance and progress toward your next $5 reward.

Download the Kohl‚Äôs App today to discover amazing deals on everyday must-haves for you and your family. From beauty to decor, activewear and toys, you‚Äôll be sure to find something you love.

summary: Buy fashion, beauty, home, & more! Save with amazing shopping deals & discounts.

scraped_reviews.content: Worst app to shop on. Viewing anything or zooming in on any clothing is impossible. They have it to where it opens up in a separate window and you can't even zoom in without it disappearing back down then it closes out. I have to go back and open it again and again because all it does is close. The men modeling have no pictures or videos of the back of the clothes or underwear. It would be nice to see what something looks like on the back. I hope all of this gets fixed.

Over a year since 1st review and the app is worse, not better! So many random items show up when searching a specific category, now can't order at all on certain items (says 'max 1'---well, I haven't ordered any!), and filters don't work half the time. Along with their annoying rule of having to spend reward dollars in a VERY limited time, I'm about done with Kohl's....

Terrible App. Never works right. Doesn't show my card purchases, though I'm signed-in to my account - which took several days because it locked me out until the next day(s) after resetting the password. I have my location set, but when shipping and filtering on features it says it needs location permission - though again, my location / home store is already set (!). üôÑ It just spins and spins and never goes anywhere. Waste of time.

I've been having so many issues with this app lately. Last time I used the app, it wouldn't allow me to place my order, and I lost out on sale prices because of it. Most recently, I spent a couple of hours shopping on the app and picking out exactly what I needed. Before placing my order, I stepped away from my phone for about 30 minutes to cook dinner. When I returned to my phone to place my order, the app cleared out my entire cart (current and saved items) that I spent all that time on. ARGH!

update: found out I can not add gift cards, it says it was added, but nothing shows up, horrible app. previous:The app was never amazing, crashes often and freezes. But as of late it has been more terrible. I can't get item added to the cart, I have to back out and click the item again, or just restart the app. If you click an item and want to go back it completely starts your search over. And now show they "market place" items that can't be filtered out. Very annoying app right now.

recent updates to the app are very frustrating!!!! the amount of money I alone spend at Kohl's is enough to fund a better functioning app. years ago your app was horrible and then it got a lot better and it was fun to use. Now it's just annoying. not enough photos of items, zooming in on photos is difficult and there are way too many "marketplace" items.

10/1/25: Beware, the app changes the dates on your KC expirations! App signs me out then says my account doesn't exist when attempting to sign in. I can sign in through Google so it is exclusively an app issue. 11/8/25: I cannot add anything to my cart. I'm getting an error, "unable to add item to cart" for multiple items. I uninstalled and reinstalled. Trying to sign in, error saying my account doesn't exist üôÑ Beyond frustrating!!

updated and tried to use the app after ditching them years ago, and I can't do a single thing. If I'm lucky I can click on one item and be pulled to the screen, unable to add to cart. unable to add. unable to add. so I restart, freezes. restart, unable to add anything. restart, freezes. now I'm stuck on a blank screen trying to even OPEN the app. this is ridiculous, I'm taking my business elsewhere and I highly recommend you all do the same. this is not business practice, they need bankruptcy.

I like the ability to scan the barcode of an item in the store to find the price. However, if you don't have the UPC correctly in the camera view, the app's scanner will capture just the partial UPC and then give and error (obviously) because the system cannot find the item. I would prefer if the scan option allowed me to "click" when I can see that the UPC is fully in the view of the camera before taking the shot. Also, the app frequently logs me out and doesn't integrate with password mgr.

It's a decent app when it actually works, it crashes so often. I have to close the app, open it again, repeat until I get the pop up saying the app is not responding and I can press close app and THEN it will work. I work at a kohls, so I use the app all the time, having to do that more often than not is annoying while trying to help customers. I also wish items would show sku numbers regardless of being in stock in a certain size. Would make my job so much easier!!

Almost a year since posting my original review. Still no good. Nearly impossible to search/filter on anything. Sometimes when I click on something and go back I lose the search altogether. Or when I go back (if back even works) it brings me to the top of the search results so I have to scroll down past items I've already looked at. It's bad. Still one ‚≠êÔ∏è.

The app is super buggy. Most of the time, you have to try 3 times to even open it. God forbid you minimize the app for a short period of time, when you go back to it, it's just a white screen. The back button usually takes you to the home screen, as well as attempting to click on any crumb links just takes you home. Clicking on an item in your cart only allows you to update the item. There's no way to get back to the listing if you want to purchase a variation. Why does the logo look so bad?

The app is ok, just missing a few key features. For example, there is no option to save an item, to purchase later. It needs a "save for later" option in the cart. I shop online A LOT, but don't always want to purchase that day. I can create a list & reference the item that way, but more convenient if right on cart page. BUT...I do LOVE the way it tracks your Kohls cash, rewards, & coupons. Very helpful!

This app is the absolute worst! I hate apps but had to install this one to get free shipping when ordering in the store. That is a great feature when it works (which isn't all the time). When using the app outside of the store it often doesn't work. You would think a major retailer could have a better app Update: the "order in store and get free shipping " feature no longer works (yes I am connected to the WiFi and settings are correct). Tried several different days and I am DONE. Uninstalled.

Please fix your app, Kohl's! This has been happening for years. No matter when or where I go on it, it's glitchey and closes out my page & filters, it freezes, especially when you're trying to checkout and scan your coupons. Today, I went on to see my cart to checkout, but my page for my cart is a blank white page. PLEASE FIX YOUR APP.

I had to call in to complete my order because the app wouldn't process my credit card. It would be nice if the SKU number would appear on the shopping cart so I can easily tell your rep what I ordered. The app seems a bit slow, but it is probably because we have lousy internet. It might be nice to optimize the page so text and thumbnails load a bit faster. Also, you should be able to set up an account from within the app (you have login but no new account set up). Thank you!

When the app works right it's great. Problem is most of the time it doesn't work. I am having the same issue that others are having. When I open the app it doesn't load, I have trouble adding items to my cart and once I remove an item I still get emails reminding me to purchase it, app usually never loans while I am in store. When hitting the back button it takes you all the way back to the home screen. Kohl's, with today's technology these should be easy fixes. Please listen to your customers!

The app. is very useful, usually quick. My personal issue is that it doesn't always update items no longer in stock. I'm referring to items shown for a specific search, but have been sold out for days, weeks.... sometimes months!! After awhile you just kinda wonder how long will it stay....or the motivation behind keeping something sold out to show as initially available.

Downloaded the app and was excited because it seemed to work much faster than the website. However, it's basically unusable because anytime you look at a product and try to go back to the list, it takes you alll the way back to the homepage. Everytime. You cannot look at the details of any product without being taken back to the homepage. Impossible to shop that way.

I would rate it better, but right now it occasionally works. Takes me multiple times of open/close before the app works. If on the app for more than 30 minutes, it crashes. Sometimes when trying to add an item to my cart it says cannot add and then I try again and it will add it twice. It would be nice to be able to select the size and show what colors/designs are available instead of having to go through every color/design to find what's in my size.

App has been terrible for a while- crashes often. But now I can't add a coupon from the mailer. (It's not in my wallet, only one time use one is for the same %.) I keep getting a "check your network connection and try again later" error message. I was connected to WiFi (computer was working just fine), tried disconnecting from WiFi to just be on 5G/5G+, same thing. Left the house, so just using data, and SAME THING!! Very frustrating! And all other apps are working just fine...

Every single time I try to login it makes me reset my password. Every time. I've had to change it so many times I can't even remember it. Customer service was no help. It's apparently automatic in the system. Then, I change it, go to login, and the new password won't work, and I have to change it again. Thank God that doesn't happen with the kohls charge page. I have no problem logging in there, so why is this app so difficult. It's utterly useless when I can't access it, uninstalling.

I always use the app when checking out prices. The tools are also very helpful. The app stops working once I get to the register, though. I was told by an associate that its due to the metal structure in tge building. Once I step away, my reception is better. Kind of a pain to have to stand by the door, take pictures of my coupons, then go to the register to check out.

Your fitting rooms are still closed. Your competition has them opened. It's a little over done to keep them closed at this point. I ended up having to purchase items online and got discounts and kohls cash but had to return items that didn't fit because I couldn't try them on. This caused me to lose discounts and kohls cash and had to repurchase items at non-discounted prices. That plus multiple trips back and forth make it likely that you have lost a long time customer.

Comparatively, this app is very outdated. Pressing the back button automatically brings you home, searching for products is impossible, in store options are outdated. If you place an order for pickup in store and they don't have it, it is automatically canceled and no other options to order it is provided. Item pictures and descriptions often do not supply enough info about products. If I didn't have a credit card, I probably wouldn't shop here anymore.

Your app still isn't working after the update yesterday. The problem I'm having is that when I click my kohl's, it doesn't even make a full complete circle to load the page, and it's frozen again. This has been going on for at least 4 days now. Update 7/8/24: My app is still not letting me sign into my account. I have uninstalled it twice, and even when I'm at kohl's store, it isn't working. It keeps freezing on me through the app. I can't even get off the home page.

Better, but still some glitches. Try adding the same product but in different colors lol!! I wanted two pairs of Vera Wang pants, one in black and one in brown. The app won't let you! It will update your cart with the different color, so you end up switching one pair of pants back and forth between colors instead of adding a pair in a different color! It's maddening. I had to add one to my cart, save it for later, add the other one to my cart, and then add the saved pair back into the cart to ge

haven't been able to access my shopping cart for about a week now. every time i try to order something. guess you don't want my money. (2019) it's 2021 STILL HAVING THE SAME ISSUES. For as much as you guys charge for shipping you would think you would invest in your technology a little more. This is so frustrating. Been trying to order for TWO DAYS and the app only works when it wants to. Everything on my phone works and it's up to date. And the developer contact email isn't found when you email

Not sure what happened but after updating, I get and error message and it won't show any products. I just get a page full of ads for other companies. App is not working. This is now 6/23/23. Won't accept password even though it has been reset and can be used on the regular website. I'd give it a zero if I could. Very Frustrating. You also have to keep typing in the captcha letters which is annoying. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and still having the same problem.

Fix the app already! ALWAYS needing an update! Then still doesn't work properly. You can't click on things from your previous orders like you can on the website. When wanting to add another of something from the cart you can't, only updates what's in there. Also can't click on anything in my saved for later, ALWAYS getting an error. One of the worst apps unfortunately. Maybe I should stop trying to use it and only use the website... Annoying!

It's useful for online ordering and finding out what your bill is BUT it constantly signs me out of my account. Then when I need to use it at the store, I can't because I didn't memorize the password. Then once I'm signed in again, I have to re-input my credit card information. Honestly, I've stopped using it as much for these reasons. Now I just save the coupons from the mail and call for my balance. I gave 3 stars because when it works, it's great but it's useless otherwise.

Using this app is exhausting. There's no way to return to the results of a specific search after clicking on any item. You just have to do the search all over again. You were 50 results deep? Sucks. Have fun scrolling back to where you were. If I use the regular feature on my phone to go back, it pulls up the shop by category tab, which you then can't close out of. This is all provided the app even opens, which it doesn't more than half the time.

Other than being slow sometimes, Kohl's app and website are much more user friendly than other sites I have visited. When I click for a closer look at a product & then click the back arrow when I'm done, Kohl's sends me back to where I was in my shopping. Most, if not all, other sites send me way back to the beginning every time, which is very annoying and time consuming! Kohl's also shows page numbers so I can tell where I've been or remember what page something is on, some other sites do not.

Useless app that is a frustrating time waster. Tried to scan a bar code to my wallet - says it's already in there. Wallet shows zero. App shows I have eight offers but only allows me to access one of them. Kohl's - if you're listening - check out the CVS app. They know what they're doing and it's awesome. No mailers, no paper, no wasted ink, just an email. Click on the offer you want and it adds to your app. At checkout, it shows up automatically - use it then or wait. Take a lesson, kohl's!

I've had consistent issues with the app. It does not allow me to sign in or access it. It says check phone number, nothing to do with the app, update no change, change password no change, uninstall and reinstall NO change. Called in to calls, he was no help. Everything he said try I'd already done. Fix it please, I'm sure I'm not the only one having issues with it.

It's ok. Some items they say are available are really not. They take forever to load. If you get their credit card BEWARE because they charge you $30 in just interest every single month. So when they say your min payment is $35 only $5 goes to pay off your actual debt. So, if you can't pay it off right away it's certainly NOT WORTH GETTING not even for the perks. So minimum payments are not smart unless that's really all you can do but keep in mind your debt will never go down.

Before the update it was awesome. Now, it's impossible to do anything. I went to the store and couldn't even pay from the app because it won't open, then it won't sign me in. Now I still can't sign in and I was hoping to do some shopping tonight. I've deleted and reinstalled, but nothing. Worst of all, it won't accept my password and as many times as uve tried to reset, it's not working, keeps saying link has expired. Somebody better fix this thing or bye to kohls

Worst app ever. Freezes and crashes often. I can't access my orders/coupons page. The app crashed and shut down. It asks me to login EVERY TIME I open the app. My account keeps getting locked out despite to activity from my end, and I have to change the password weekly. I've honestly stopped shopping here as much as I used to because of how terrible the app has become. This is ridiculous.

I love shopping at Kohl's. However, I usually have issues with this app. On three separate occasions now I've had my entire cart deleted, and prices changing while in the cart (within minutes to an hour of adding it - and always more expensive). I've missed out on deals and orders because of errors in the app. I love Kohl's, but hate the hassle and not having the sale prices being honored when there are issues ordering through the app.

I used the Kohls app frequently to search for items, see what's in-store, & make purchases. In the last 3+ months the app is useless. They "sunsetted" the list feature, which every competitor has. Now consumers are supposed to save items to their cart a la Amazon to buy later. Except Amazon has both, so you don't have to use it if you don't want to. Size searches are broken. Big & Tall results come up even when excluded. Instead of changing how I shop due to the app, I've changed where I shop.

I have only used this once. it worked ok at the store, as long as you can get data or WI fi to work inside the store. What I don't like, you get emails with coupons that you have to add to the app. Why don't they just put them in your account? I spent all the time adding the coupons, etc. I am ready to go shopping and now the app will not open unless you upgrade, but the app will not upgrade. Now I have to print out all the coupons. what a waste of my time.

This app has always been glitchy, randomly frozen up repeatedly, having to attempt multiple times before it will add an item to your cart, etc. Now, I have to log back in every single time I open it. Kohl's, in general, has already gone rapidly downhill, restricting coupon use more and more, and now adding ridiculous marketplace items. Just close and get it over with since you obviously can't get it together. It used to be my favorite store, not even close now.

Extremely bad app. So frustrating and time consuming. Takes forever to load. Sometimes shows my cart contents sometimes shows it empty. Deleted my Save for later items. Sometimes applies my coupons and sometimes shows I don't have any. Very bad app. So time-consuming that even if you want to buy something you would not want to go through the pathetic app and instead would end up not buying anything. Worst experience. The updates don't do any good. Surprised such a good store has such bad app.

Tedious. At first I liked how I can search different sizes and add to the cart different styles. The search feature is good. Checkout is a nightmare. I have created an account at least 10 times. It never remembers me. I had a giftcard and added it into the checkout then it demanded I add credit card to finalize checkout. Kept logging me off. Received an email that credit card was charged and not gift card. Will sort it out tomorrow. Over an hour spent on this.

Horrible. I've been in our local store 4 times now and the app freezes. The cashier can not go forward or backward. Ten minutes later I have to jump lines, re-ring everything, and pay with my debit card. The cashier is very apologetic, and I tried to be understanding. IF YOU WANT PEOPLE TO USE THE APP, THEN MAKE SURE IT ACTUALLY WORKS EVERY TIME! At this rate, I'm questioning if I'll be back to shop or not. It's just not worth the aggravation.

This app is only good for coupons and shopping. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO PAY YOUR BILL THROUGH THE APP!! It will not show that a payment has been set up and pending. If you like the security of setting up your bills in advance and getting a confirmation, this is not for you. I ended up paying double because there was no indication it took the information I provided originally. TERRIBLE!! This needs to be fixed.

I've reviewed this app several times but nothing gets better. It logs me out ALL THE TIME!! I can be logged in and then I get to the checkout to show my coupons and I'm logged out again. Many times I've gotten to the checkout and my coupons have disappeared, when they had been in my account just minutes before. I almost wonder if your store wi-fi has something to do with it. Please please please fix all the bugs!!!!!!!

Says items are available for store pick up but wont let you order them. Becoming an inconvenience. App will ALWAYS ask you to login "verify account" to make a payment but will ALWAYS tell you your password is wrong. Stupid updates are making it harder to navigate. Doesn't work without wifi, very inconvenient. All apps should work regardless of wifi or not. Very rude customer service with the credit card company also. Closed my account for no reason, you lost a customer. Cant make payment in app.

Kohl's is literally the poorest made shopping app I have ever experienced. I am not exaggerating. I do enjoy shopping at Kohls in stores, and unfortunately made the decision to open a Kohls credit card. The entire card as far as your balance, paying bill, etc is all ran through this app. It's horrible. The interface itself seems extremely outdated and difficult to navigate. I have issues logging in every single time I use the app. And this is coming from someone who shops online all the time.

I liked the app until today when I went to add something to my wishlist and found that 'Lists' have been eliminated! It was very frustrating to find all the things I've been saving were now gone. Also, wishlists are one of the main reasons I use store apps. I add things to them for comparison, or to save for when I have some extra money. Then I'll pull up a list and get the items I've been wanting. There's really no point for me to use the app anymore. I can just go online. Bad decision Kohl's.

scraped_reviews.content: My Purchase power went to zero. even after paying everything on time, each month. for the past 1 years. How can I have zero? if I paid every single emi on time without delay for the past 1 years? they just made up some bs reasons and I'm extremely disappointed. NEVER use this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, we are disappointed to hear about your slice experience and would like to make this better. Please reach out to us at help@slicebank.com or call us at +91-8048329999 to discuss the matter further.

scraped_reviews.content: slice's savings account offering is one of the best. A lot of use cases are still unsupported but hopefully they're already working on those (eNACH and email notifications for UPI for example). The credit card is mediocre but the 3 month EMI feature is amazing. International transactions are not supported however. The app itself is mostly good but the lack of a dark mode is what reduces its usability for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mufeed, we know you‚Äôre excited to be a part of slice, so are we. But, unfortunately, at this moment, our system lacks key information to approve your profile. Rest assured, we‚Äôll get back to you as soon as we have more information. Thanks for your patience, we can‚Äôt wait to serve you.

scraped_reviews.content: Hi I have been using this app for one year and believe guys it's a wonderful app. Quick and reliable. You can trust it easily. They are very professional and responsive. The best thing is you can get a loan easily by making timely payments and their reminders are also sent in a very professional way. Go through it. Still using it. It's best ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, we're delighted to hear that your experience with slice was positive. We are happy to learn that our hard work has been successful. You will receive exclusive updates on your application now that the new product is live. We hope to make your next visit equally positive. Have an amazing day!

scraped_reviews.content: There is no customer support here and the number given for customer support is always out of order, only emails work here. And it has been several months since I am using the app but I have not received any credit limit till now. I also agree that it has been almost 1 month since I am using the slice account after doing KYC but still I have been doing this for quite some time by linking other bank accounts and using the app. i want my slice super credit card or limit as soon as possible please.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, we are sorry to hear that your slice experience did not meet your expectations. We take all feedback seriously and strive to provide excellent service to our customers. Please reach out to us at help@slicebank.com or by phone at +91-8048329999 so we can address any concerns you may have at the earliest.

title: SoFi: Bank, Invest & Loans
description: Mobile banking and investing made easy. Send money instantly, deposit checks digitally, pay bills online, track spending with budgeting tools, save cash in high-yield accounts, and trade stocks with no commission (other fees apply). Join 12.6M members banking, investing, and saving with SoFi. MOBILE BANKING & CHECKING ACCOUNT ‚Ä¢ Checking account with no account fees, no minimum balance- mobile banking made easy. ‚Ä¢ Direct deposit gets you paid up to 2 days early‚Åµ with instant access to your funds. ‚Ä¢ Send money, pay bills online, transfer funds between accounts with no extra charges. STOCK TRADING & INVESTING ‚Ä¢ Trade stocks and ETFs with no commission through SoFi Securities (other fees apply). ‚Ä¢ Invest in fractional shares starting at just $5 to build your stock portfolio (restrictions apply). ‚Ä¢ Automated investing with digital portfolio management from SoFi Wealth. HIGH-YIELD SAVINGS ACCOUNT ‚Ä¢ Earn high APY¬π on savings balances. ‚Ä¢ Savings Vaults help organize emergency funds and savings goals in one place. ‚Ä¢ Instant transfers between checking and savings with no fees anytime. PERSONAL LOANS & CREDIT SCORE ‚Ä¢ Personal loan rates for debt consolidation, home improvements, and major purchases. ‚Ä¢ Track your credit score with regular updates and monitoring tools. ‚Ä¢ Pre-qualify for loans without affecting your credit score- compare rates instantly. BUDGET TOOLS & MONEY MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Budget tracker with automatic spending categorization across all linked accounts. ‚Ä¢ Real-time spending alerts protect accounts and help maintain your budget. ‚Ä¢.Bill payment reminders keep you on track and avoid late fees. BANK SECURITY & CUSTOMER SUPPORT ‚Ä¢ Bank-level encryption protects personal and financial information with fraud alerts. ‚Ä¢ Instant notifications for suspicious account activity keep your money safe. ‚Ä¢ Financial support team available 7 days/week via chat or (855) 456-SOFI (7634). ¬πSoFi members who enroll in SoFi Plus with Eligible Direct Deposit or by paying the SoFi Plus Subscription Fee every 30 days or SoFi members with $5,000 or more in Qualifying Deposits during the 31-Day Evaluation Period can earn 3.60% annual percentage yield (APY) on savings balances (including Vaults) and 0.50% APY on checking balances. There is no minimum Eligible Direct Deposit amount required to qualify for the stated interest rate. Members without either SoFi Plus or Qualifying Deposits, during the 30-Day Evaluation Period will earn 1.00% APY on savings balances (including Vaults) and 0.50% APY on checking balances. Interest rates are variable and subject to change at any time. These rates are current as of 11/12/25. There is no minimum balance requirement. If you have satisfied Eligible Direct Deposit requirements for our highest APY but do not see 3.60% APY on your APY Details page the day after your Eligible Direct Deposit arrives, please contact us at 855-456-7634. Additional information can be found at http://www.sofi.com/legal/banking-rate-sheet. See the SoFi Plus Terms and Conditions at https://www.sofi.com/terms-of-use/#plus. ¬≤We do not charge any account, service or maintenance fees for SoFi Checking and Savings. We do charge a transaction fee to process each outgoing wire transfer. SoFi does not charge a fee for incoming wire transfers, however the sending bank may charge a fee. Our fee policy is subject to change at any time. See the SoFi Checking & Savings Fee Sheet for details at sofi.com/legal/banking-fees/. ‚ÅµEarly access to direct deposit funds is based on the timing in which we receive notice of impending payment from the Federal Reserve, which is typically up to two days before the scheduled payment date, but may vary. ‚Åπ9x based on FDIC monthly savings account rate as of December 16, 2024. See SoFi Checking and Savings rate sheet for annual percentage yield (APY) details at: https://www.sofi.com/legal/banking-rate-sheet.

Mobile banking and investing made easy. Send money instantly, deposit checks digitally, pay bills online, track spending with budgeting tools, save cash in high-yield accounts, and trade stocks with no commission (other fees apply).

Join 12.6M members banking, investing, and saving with SoFi.

MOBILE BANKING & CHECKING ACCOUNT
‚Ä¢ Checking account with no account fees, no minimum balance- mobile banking made easy.

STOCK TRADING & INVESTING

‚Ä¢ Automated investing with digital portfolio management from SoFi Wealth.

HIGH-YIELD SAVINGS ACCOUNT
‚Ä¢ Earn high APY¬π on savings balances.

‚Ä¢ Instant transfers between checking and savings with no fees anytime.

PERSONAL LOANS & CREDIT SCORE

BANK SECURITY & CUSTOMER SUPPORT

‚Ä¢ Instant notifications for suspicious account activity keep your money safe.

¬πSoFi members who enroll in SoFi Plus with Eligible Direct Deposit or by paying the SoFi Plus Subscription Fee every 30 days or SoFi members with $5,000 or more in Qualifying Deposits during the 31-Day Evaluation Period can earn 3.60% annual percentage yield (APY) on savings balances (including Vaults) and 0.50% APY on checking balances. There is no minimum Eligible Direct Deposit amount required to qualify for the stated interest rate. Members without either SoFi Plus or Qualifying Deposits, during the 30-Day Evaluation Period will earn 1.00% APY on savings balances (including Vaults) and 0.50% APY on checking balances. Interest rates are variable and subject to change at any time. These rates are current as of 11/12/25. There is no minimum balance requirement. If you have satisfied Eligible Direct Deposit requirements for our highest APY but do not see 3.60% APY on your APY Details page the day after your Eligible Direct Deposit arrives, please contact us at 855-456-7634. Additional information can be found at http://www.sofi.com/legal/banking-rate-sheet. See the SoFi Plus Terms and Conditions at https://www.sofi.com/terms-of-use/#plus.

¬≤We do not charge any account, service or maintenance fees for SoFi Checking and Savings. We do charge a transaction fee to process each outgoing wire transfer. SoFi does not charge a fee for incoming wire transfers, however the sending bank may charge a fee. Our fee policy is subject to change at any time. summary: Invest, bank & save in one app. Trade stocks, earn high APY & budget smarter.

scraped_reviews.content: really happy with this app/bank. had a bank before sofi ( I will not mention their names) but my account was hacked 3 times!! I finally got fed up with them and switched. I'm so glad I did. the app is easy to use, and you also earn points, which you can redeem for cash, or pay off your credit card/student loans. I'd give them 6 Stars if it would let me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Donald. We‚Äôre glad you‚Äôre loving the app! We‚Äôre continuously working on new features and functionality, so stay tuned for more updates in the coming weeks. Thanks for being a SoFi member.

scraped_reviews.content: not a bad bank, but it drives me insane that when I open up my banking app, it combines all accounts on the home page and displays the total balance between all accounts, not a bad feature on the surface but there is no way to turn it off. theres really no practical reason to combine savings and checking, personally id rather my saving not show up at all on the home page, but there really is no customization options when it comes to your home page. edited 3 stars to 1 star due to this
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for this review, it's very helpful. We're continuously working on features and functionality to help you get your money right, so stay tuned for more updates in the coming weeks.

scraped_reviews.content: App updated itself and deleted my linked account, had to fumble around the app to fix that. Set up a money transfer and it didn't show it. Set up another and found out it had set up a duplicate. Tried to find a record of the transactions and delete one, but neither showed up in the app. Contacted support and told I'd have to sign in at the website to delete one. Did that. Went back to the app and still no record of any of this appeared in the app. App worked fine until the update.

I absolutely love this app, They definitely need to add a options watchlist similar to robinhood's with profit modeler. And add option portfolios to social investing leaderboards if anybody is listening from sofi! If you really want to get your money right give them a shot. They are by far the best bank that I have ever used and they are really stepping up to become a giant for anyone who is serious about their money.

Unreliable Banking... loan payment progress is inaccurate, need to call for correct payment information. Credit card payments take 5 to 7 days to process. Refunds for payments initiated without cause or notice. Poor customer service, basically reads you what you already see on the app. Chime is better, in my opinion. As soon as my loan is paid off, I am closing my account with SOFI.

I didn't care for the $20 inactivity fee. I did not login for a couple years, hoping to see investment gains by setting and forgetting, and then found I had been hit with about $100 in inactivity fees that I wasn't tracking. It seems a bit cluttered and not as intuitive to be able to withdraw funds if you don't use it regularly. Otherwise, the Sofi app is great with many resources.

Updated from 5 to 3 stars: They started treating transactions related to money transfers as a cash advance on their credit card, charging an extra fee. Every time you try to sell and buy stocks, they flag you as a day trader, but when you are buying every week, there are no complaints. The good: was their high interest rate on savings and checking accounts, but it keeps going down every month... the app still has a great design and user experience.

Setting up an account was so easy! Could purchase stocks shortly after setting the account up. Just a reminder, there will be a three day hold on most the funds...they allow a certain amount instantly, but keep it in mind. Love the app so far! A suggestion: add a "notes" option for stock holdings and the wish list where we can save and edit insights related to individual stocks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre so happy you‚Äôve had such a great experience! Don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out with any questions‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help. üòä

scraped_reviews.content: You should consolidate the Self Directed and Investment dashboards. It's confusing to not see my favorites and I'm not sure one is more distinct or useful than the other. I'm not used to using the bottom tab for investing yet. Also add a feedback option, even if you make it clear that no one is looking at it or responding - you can data mine it for trends. Surely it's easier to sift through that and not affect your app store ratings...? Also I never got the $5 promo for investing.

Made the mistake of ONLY having this card on me and of course it was declined multiple times. So I called and the guy said it was frozen due to non pay and to wait 24/48 hours. Uhh, no. I'm not behind on my payments and if I were you'd think a courtesy notification saying 'hey, your account is being frozen for non pay' would have been nice? There is nothing in my app that gives any indication of why it's being declined or that it can't be used. Will never use this company again.

Excellent banking and investing app! By far one of the best banking and stocks investing apps I've ever used! It's very easy to use and informative with regards to the stock market and building your financial future. I've yet to have any problems or experience any glitches. I have other apps for banking, but I use this one the most. I rarely, if ever, see an ad. The customer service is excellent as well. I think SoFi should have small physical banking branch locations nationwide.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Freddy, thanks so much for the awesome feedback! We‚Äôre really happy to hear you‚Äôre loving the app and our customer service. Great idea about branch locations. We‚Äôll definitely share it with the team. Reach out anytime if you need anything!

scraped_reviews.content: had an account opened for almost 3 weeks, have direct setup and all that, card still do this day has not been shipped. but hey there is a digital version right? wrong, you have a digital version but you can't see the numbers for it so it's unable to be used for bill pay or anything like that. so all my money goes there, but I can't use any of it to do anything except tap to pay. because these dummies think bills work that way. DO NOT USE THIS APP AS MAIN ACCOUNT!!! DISGUSTING!!

My "dashboard" WAS just a bunch of offers for other products. My loan details weren't front and center but it turns out my loan was simply too new. I'm editing my initial review to a higher score. I do wish they would have let me know to be patient to allow for things to be up to date. Otherwise, nicely appointed, help team is responsive and the app is fairly easy to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you've had difficulty with our mobile app. Once logged in, please select your personal loan, then select the personal loan link. After, you'll see an option for Manage Autopay, which is located underneath the 'Payment' section. If there's anything we can help you with, please give us a call at 855-456-7634. Thanks for your feedback! üíô

scraped_reviews.content: Had you asked last week this would have been a 4-5. A retired computer forensic examiner. Not my first tech rodeo. Bank and app are great for savings management; OK and still getting used to odd bill paying, could be simpler. The issue is with those not so everyday, when you need them, YOU NEED THEM events Big purchased required a wire transfer. The third party vendor ID software SoFi uses is terrible and failed a dozen times. SoFi support useless on vendors. No backup option. Cost me $207.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! Thanks for the feedback, and we're sorry for the trouble. We're constantly working to add new features and functionality to help you get your money right. Stay tuned for more updates, and thanks for being a SoFi member.

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love this bank and investment company!!! I just started with them, it's only been a few weeks and they have already raised my credit score a few points and gave me some of their points which added $10 to my checking account. I've never dealt with a bank like this. they have it all, checking savings retirement plans CDs when I get my money up I'm investing in everything they have!!!!

I've had SoFi as my primary bank for around 3 years. Started out pretty great, I got some nice sign-up bonuses and was really impressed with how much I could do with one app. Then the cracks started showing. Savings APY started going down, which wasn't a big deal for me, since I have another savings account. But the deal breaker for me was being completely unable to deposit a fairly large insurance settlement check that I needed ASAP. CS was beyond useless. Avoid.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey T.J., we appreciate you sharing your feedback with us. We completely understand not being able to deposit a check due to its amount can be frustrating. We're always looking for ways to better our features and benefits and limit increases is one of them! We have shared this with our team. We hope to make SoFi your primary account again!

scraped_reviews.content: Was great....for a short while. Then crashed and totally useless. Out of the blue, I am suddenly unable to add money to my account to be able to buy stocks. It just quit working and gave me a 'Sorry for the delay on our end' message. So frustrating if you want to be able to buy stocks quickly at a target price. Think I'll cash out and take my money elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Todd, we‚Äôre truly sorry to hear about the trouble you experienced with adding funds. Our team is constantly working to improve performance and minimize delays. If you‚Äôd like, please reach out to our Invest team at 855-525-7634 so we can help troubleshoot and get things back on track.

scraped_reviews.content: The app works fine. It is user friendly and does the job well. My only complaint is mobile check deposit. Please send feeback to the actual bank, the app is great, no issues there. It should NOT take a week to clear a mobile deposit check in the year 2025. There are ways to verify if the check is valid immediately. Most of your customers are low income. Please don't make things harder for no reason over an $8 check when they just need some damn milk.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Randa, thanks for your feedback! We‚Äôre glad you find the app user-friendly. We understand waiting for mobile check deposits can be frustrating, especially when every dollar counts. We‚Äôre always working to improve our processes and appreciate your patience. If you need any help, feel free to reach us at 855-456-7634.

scraped_reviews.content: I haven't had much experience with the bank but the app is way too crowded. The checking portion should be the first page and the ability to freeze your card should be easier and faster to access. currently, it's extremely cluttered update: even worse than I thought. you have to reenter the debit card to Google wallet every time you unfreeze it. huge waste of time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Michael, thanks for the review. Your feedback helps us improve user experiences, and we‚Äôre always working to offer members the best. We‚Äôre continuously working on new features and functionality to help you get your money right, so stay tuned for more updates!

scraped_reviews.content: Giving 3 stars because it doesn't work in Landscape mode on the Galaxy s10 ultra tablet. It only works in portrait mode. On the galaxy 25 ultra no issues working in either mode. But I would definetly like to be able to use this on my tablet in landscape so I can have it set up like a laptop to watch my investments and be able to trade when I start doing that here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review. This is very helpful. We‚Äôre continuously working on new features and functionality to help you get your money right, so stay tuned for more updates in the coming weeks. Thanks for being a SoFi member.

scraped_reviews.content: please, stop showing pop-up offers for things I will never be interested in when I open the app. you are a bank, when I open the app I want to view my banking info. I don't want ANYTHING else, especially not for my tap on the screen to be hijacked by an unexpected pop-up for a completely useless offer. edit: dev responded to me with a solution to a completely different problem. I'm not talking about push notifications, I mean the big annoying offers that pop up when I open the app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Hannah, thanks for the review. We‚Äôre continuously working on new features and functionality to help you get your money right, so stay tuned for more updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely horrible, worked on all of my devices until one day it didn't work on any (only app that did it). Took 6 calls over 2 months just to get someone who I think has a pulse. When they called me, put me on hold for 30 minutes as soon as they called waiting to get through to another dept. App still only works on 1 device even after factory resetting all of them. If you want a bank that you can never get ahold of anyone months on end, SoFi is ur bank.

Fantastic app! Love it. Better than all the other apps I've ever used. But I have one issue, one day randomly, my app stopped working. I uninstalled it and reinstalled, that didn't work. My problem was simple, it would try logging in, type my password and email, click sign in and it would reset and bring me back to the "sign in or sign up" page when you first open the app. But I can login on chrome. Weird.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chaae, this is Phil Rabin, the Engineering Director for Mobile here at SoFi. We take our reviews seriously and want to get to the bottom of your issue. You can email me at prabin@sofi.org and we can try to connect you directly with some of our engineers to debug the issue. Looking forward to hearing from you. Thanks! Phil.

scraped_reviews.content: Some features were really nice, I like seeing everything in one place and being able to explore new and different stocks. Not great on automated investing options and some serious deal breakers, like extremely confusing communications and lackluster customer service. The nail in the coffin for me was the inability to add a trust as a beneficiary. This is extremely basic and could ruin someone's estate plan. If a trust is part of your future, I can't recommend SoFi.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for sharing your experience and this feedback. Improving our products and services for the sake of the member experience is a priority, and we‚Äôve shared your thoughts with our team. Please stay tuned for potential updates in the future‚Äîand let us know if you have further concerns!

scraped_reviews.content: Tracks everything even when you don't want it too. It used to text me every time a transaction went through and now it doesn't. I even un-installed and reinstalled. Same issue. Has some helpful tools, but the credit monitoring is extremely behind with not a lot of details. The gems that you can turn into cash for your account are a nice thing. Wish there was a way to get bigger bonuses there.

Savings rate started at 4.5 percent which was phenomenal. Since about 2 months ago they have lowered it by .1 percent every 2 weeks and it just hit 3.8 percent. Only .05 percent better than discover, the second highest savings rate. Add that to the fact that they have been pushing more and more pop up ads for investing and push notifications as well. They really dont want to just be a banking app. It started great but has been sliding downhill fast. Enshittification strikes again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, thanks for the review. This is very helpful. We‚Äôre continuously working on new features and functionality to help you get your money right, so stay tuned for more updates.

scraped_reviews.content: I really liked my SoFi account. Their app platform is fantastic, however, after 3 months of having my account open, they suddenly freeze my account. I've been in contact with multiple people and nothing has been done. It has been 2 weeks since my account was frozen and it is still frozen, with my money being inaccessible at the moment. SoFi has a great business plan, just terrible customer service. Be careful when opening an account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cody Chism - Thank you for letting us know. We‚Äôre sorry that this issue happened. Please email sofimoneysupport@sofi.com and include in the subject line "App Review". Our team will be happy to help you further.

scraped_reviews.content: SoFi has been very good to me since I joined about a year ago: with the intention to use it for investing. Now they're an official bank and I completely switched to them. They give great interest rates, good rewards, and no fees! Only thing I'm wishing for is a Secured Credit Card/starter card for building credit. I'm in my early 20s with no established credit and would love to be able to do so through my main bank. :)

Created my account, entered all my information, got all the way to linking my checking account, and it just refuses to do it. Website, app, neither one would link my account. Tried three different ways. Even when it said it had linked, it would not connect. That kind of thing right out of the gate leaves a really bad taste in a guys mouth. Deleting.

SoFi is great, but the app is too cluttered. I don't want to be bombarded by all the products all the time. Let me default to the product I want to use. Let me hide products I have zero interest in using from every part, but add a discover page or something that I can go explore more. The app feels like one big advertisement with no way to turn it off.

OMG, the notifications are extremely annoying. For stocks that I have no interest in at all. I go in the app to notification settings, and there's no option to turn them off! üó£PLEASE JUST MAKE IT STOP!!! Other than that, I actually love sofi products and use pretty much all of them. If you want the credit card, make sure your credit score is where you want it to be because they don't believe in credit limit increases.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Terrence, thank you for providing this feedback. We‚Äôre continuously working on new features and functionality to help you get your money right, so stay tuned for more updates.

scraped_reviews.content: My job keeps on sending me direct depoaits that bounce. I check the routing and bank account number two three times when setting up the direct deposit. I know it could be a typo but the fact that It happened twice, I doubt it. It's probably a praticular error with me company but I have delt with so many issues with banks the last few months, I give up. If your looking for a bank that has better ease of use, which was what I was looking for, you may want to dig deeper into sofi.

I use the app for budgeting, and generally for that I find it better than competitors. The lower rating is because if you hit any issue, there is no support. I had an issue with account sync and their chat support's only solution was to delete and re-add the account, meaning recategorizing all transactions. Now I had an error trying to change the category for the transaction, and they hung up on me saying it was by design, refusing to recognize an issue and escalate it further. Not great.

This is literally the best EVER!!! Not only can you do EVERYTHING in the app (checking with round-up going into your savings, credit card, investing, and vault accounts to save for a rainy day), but there are quick "classes" you can take, for free, on any number of topics to assist you in taking charge of your financial security. You can also attach all of your other banking or credit cards so you can see them all in 1 place. EVERYTHING IS FREE!!! There aren't any fees attached to anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you so much for your review! It really helps us to keep going and delivering the best :)
We are delighted to hear such positive words and it‚Äôs always a pleasure to serve our members.

scraped_reviews.content: I like having a separate debit card to use for incidental expenses, and I'm still on the fence about this one. First, transfers take days and don't happen instantly, which isn't particularly helpful if you want to quickly transfer to this card. I have another card which will instantly transfer from my bank account, so I know it can be done. There isn't a quick way to see your balance without doing a full login (another thing I know is doable). But my biggest gripe with this service is this app is TERRIBLE. Full of ads for all their different "benefits," re investing and stocks, none of which I really need. The menu for transferring money is hard to find. It logs out for no apparent reason (even though I just spent several minutes trying to find the transfer money menu, it told me it was logging me out for inactivity, and logged off in spite of me repeatedly pressing the "continue" button). I know this sounds like I'm an old fart who doesn't know how to use apps, but I'm fairly technically capable. This app is just not very intuitive. I like the concept of having a chip card and the interest, but I'm not certain at this point I will keep this account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Elizabeth, thanks for the review. This is very helpful and we have passed along your feedback to our team. We‚Äôre continuously working on new features and functionality, so stay tuned for more updates in the coming weeks. Thank you for being a SoFi member.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is cluttered. The home page could use some customization options to filter out alot of garbage and maybe see the nice charts and expense reports. The trading platform would benefit from options, candlesticks, and moving averages. Also being able to filter your watch lists by sector. One positive is that once you sign up for a single service it auto connects alot of accounts. The perks and interest rates on banking are solid and the app is so much better than Chase. I'm a customer!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: With every new app version, we are introducing new features and improving existing ones. We are sure that your feedback will only help us improve further.

scraped_reviews.content: SoFi SUCKS. Worst bank ever. It takes 11 days & counting for a mobile deposit to clear & they were business checks besides. They decline every debit until i verify by text that it was me & then i have to run the transaction a 2nd time. Annoying when you're at a store with a line behind you. They didn't pay the $250 sign on bonus for direct deposit, which was the only reason i chose them. The app sucks too. It's slow & not the least bit user friendly. There's not a single good thing i can say.

Great bank with numerous features. They don't have overdraft fees, provide free checks, and even have a great APY. Good free investing platform, too. The app performs smoothly and completes everything you need. Customer support needs a lot of work though. Every person says something different; say the replacement card will be in 2-3 days and it takes weeks; say they've activated a credit card when they haven't. Compounding confusion when approving loans. Still, they get everything resolved.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your clear and honest feedback. We‚Äôre always looking for ways to improve.

scraped_reviews.content: REALLY GREAT & AWESOME, at least up until about what's been a week or so now. I can't login on the app, only from my chrome browser. Logging in that way my points aren't showing up correctly, I'm missing referral rewards, can't redeem what points I KNOW I have. I keep getting a error notification when trying to login. Or a "sorry we lost our marbles be back soon" , when trying to view rewards, when able to login through the browser. Pretty damn irritating .

Completely inoperable. Since the last update, it's impossible to login. You click login and it sends you to their website, where you enter your credentials, it loads for two seconds, and then it just sits on the login page. I know my credentials are fine and the website is fine because I checked on my laptop. But this app is now garbage, and now I can't access any of my money via mobile or deposit checks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate the honest feedback and are working to resolve this issue! We‚Äôll have it resolved soon and are so sorry for the inconvenience.

scraped_reviews.content: Installed Sofi and set up account. Onboarding took a bit too long, so I ended up going with another platform. However, when I tried to cancel my account, Sofi's support center specifed that the only way to cancel was to CALL THEIR SERVICE CENTER. I called, have been on hold for 10 minutes, and I'm now writing this while stuck on hold. 1 star. Will never use this product again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Due to heavy new account volume, we have been experiencing heavier than normal call volumes. We appreciate your patience in this matter.

scraped_reviews.content: Sofi app is great. I recently opened an account to participate in a hundred day savings challenge with my department. Very fun, and we're all going strong! However, every time I need to open the Sofi app, it makes me log in again and again and again. I know my information is correct and I'm getting verification after verification, but I am ultimately put right back at the login screen with no progress made. No point in keeping the account open or the app if I can't even get into it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there thanks for leaving us a review on what is going on. We would like to know more and see what we can do to fix this. Would you mind sending us an email to Mobilesupport@sofi.org subject line "[Your User Name] app review"? In the email if you could provide us with some screenshots and confirm if you are on a VPN we will take it from there!

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty good site. Not set up conventionally in a way most sites are that appear more common. It will be better when they add the feature that allows you to choose notifications such as scheduled payments as presently there's no option to receive such notification. Some room for improvement but again, not bad. It could be a little more intuitive I suppose. Too often when you have to guess what to click you can find yourself wasting time going in a loop. Bottom line: I believe they'll get better.

Easy to use and navigate. SoFi has a lot of different account types - loans, investing, cash, credit card, etc., and you can do everything you need to do for each of them in the app. I do wish they would stop prompting me to apply for personal loans and the credit card every time I log in, after I have repeatedly turned down those offers, but then again, every other company does that in their banking apps, don't they?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Amazing! Glad that you‚Äôre enjoying the app! We‚Äôre always looking for ways to improve, so please feel free to write to us at mobilesupport@sofi.com with any other suggestions for what you'd like to see from us in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: They gave me a free share of stock, then proceeded to charge the account fees, taking back the stock with no notice. There's no way to close the account. I've been trying to close the account for 2 years now with no success, and they're still charging fees (is that legal??) It's impossible to get any help and the app and website are COMPLETELY USELESS when it comes to getting any support. I live texted with support there and even they can't do anything about the fraudulent fees. Don't trust them
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we‚Äôre so sorry this happened. We‚Äôre here to help but need to verify your information on a secure channel. Please connect with an Account Manager here: https://sofi.app.link/e/echat

scraped_reviews.content: I have set shares to buy at limit and the app didn't buy when it hit the limit. I have also set to buy at market on opening and it doesn't. It doesn't snyc with my bank account for over 19 hours and right now it's showing the wrong graph for the "1 week" on all my stocks. (UPDATE) Trying to look at the graphs and it's stuck on "loading" for cryptocurrencies most of the time. I also don't like the percentages being taken by SoFi when I buy and again when I sell ... Just take a cut from sales!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there. We regret to hear of this experience and would like to hear more about what you've encountered. Please connect with us via email at mobilesupport@sofi.com and our team will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, SoFi has been pretty good. I have multiple account types open through them that I use as my primary accounts. That being said, there are a few features that could use improvement like all apps. The Savings balance should only show the Savings balance, and maybe have a separate section where it shows "Total Savings Balance" that would include the vaults. Also, allow customization of vault appearance. Customer Service is terrible also 75% of the time. Depends who you get.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for sharing your experience and this feedback. Improving our products and services for the sake of the member experience is a priority, and we‚Äôve shared your thoughts with our team. Please stay tuned for potential updates in the future and let us know if you have further concerns!

scraped_reviews.content: At first it was good, but now the average costs do not calculate correct. For some reason my account is restricted, I can't withdrawal anything, or put in orders after hours. Seems as though the more money you put in 25k +, the worse it is. Moving to webull to hopefully have less issues. Due to the issues I'll be taking refinancing my loans and other products as well. Nothing is good if you put all your eggs in one basket.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at mobilesupport@sofi.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It takes 2-3 business days just to transfer money from one SoFi account to another SoFi account. Such transfers are instantaneous at other places. There is no way to simply update your address. In order to do so you also have to fill out a bunch of employment and income information, like you are applying for a loan. They do not offer email support, even though error messages in the app say to email support. You have to find time during their business hours to chat or call them. The chat starts with an automated agent. When I finally got to a human they didn't tell me that they couldn't see what I had already typed in. I thought they were looking into the problem, when apparently they were just wasting time. I entered my email address during the chat to receive a transcript of it. The email I received says it contains a transcript, but it does not. They are only able to handle one debit card per account. When you request a new one they automatically cancel your old one. They are unable to activate debit cards once they are cancelled, you just have to hope that your new one arrives. Mine did not. If USPS returned it to SoFi, they did not notify me. The debit card activation system via phone does not work, it just tells you to use the app. Setting the PIN while activating a debit card via the app does not work. There is no way to generate a virtual debit card.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Something doesn't sound right. Can you please email us at mobilesupport@sofi.com so we can look into this further for you?

scraped_reviews.content: I like the system overall, but they're not "modern" enough. Transfers take WAY too long, as well as check deposits, and they apparently have zelle, but it's not integrated into the app efficiently. I'd recommend the app for their high yield interest, but it's better as a savings account than it is as your primary checking account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for this review, it's very helpful. We're continuously working on features and functionality to help you get your money right, so stay tuned for more updates in the coming weeks. Thanks for being a SoFi member.

title: Facebook Lite
description:
Keeping up with friends is faster and easier than ever with the Facebook Lite app! Use Facebook Lite as a friends app to connect and keep up with your social network. The Facebook Lite app is small, allowing you to save space on your phone and use Facebook in 2G conditions. Many of the classic features of Facebook are available on the app, such as sharing to a Timeline, liking photos, searching for people, and editing your profile and groups. Specific features include:
 
 ‚Ä¢ Find friends and family
 ‚Ä¢ Post status updates & use Facebook emoji to help relay what‚Äôs going on in your world
 ‚Ä¢ Share photos and your favorite memes
 ‚Ä¢ Get notified when friends like and comment on your posts
 ‚Ä¢ Find local social events, RSVP, and make plans to meet up with friends
 ‚Ä¢ Interact with your friends by adding your own comments or reactions to their Facebook posts
 ‚Ä¢ Save photos by adding them to photo albums
 ‚Ä¢ Follow people to get their latest news
 ‚Ä¢ Look up local businesses to see reviews, operation hours, and pictures
 ‚Ä¢ Buy and sell locally on Facebook Marketplace
 
The Facebook app does more than help you stay connected with your friends and interests. It's also your personal organizer for storing, saving and sharing photos. It's easy to share photos straight from your Android camera, and you have full control over your photos and privacy settings. You can choose when to keep individual photos private or even set up a secret photo album to control who sees it.
 
Facebook Lite also helps you keep up with the latest news and current events around the world. Subscribe to your favorite celebrities, brands, websites, artists, or sports teams to follow their News Feeds from the convenience of your Facebook Lite app!

Consumer Health Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/privacy/policies/health 
Problems with downloading or installing the app? See https://www.facebook.com/help/fblite 
Still need help? Please tell us more about the issue: https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/640732869364975
Facebook is only available to people aged 13 and over.
Terms of Service: http://m.facebook.com/terms.php

summary: This version of Facebook uses less data and works in all network conditions.

scraped_reviews.content: The interface is better (cleaner, more visually appealing) than the full Facebook app, but it has issues. One of the biggest is that the "show most relevant first" option can be turned off in settings but the app still only displays a subset of comments, which can make it very frustrating and confusing when there's back and forth dialog in a thread of comments... they are out of order and maybe a third of the conversation is even visible. The post toggle for relevant vs all is missing entirely.

Facebook lite used to be my go to app . It uses less data. There were other problems but I still could manage them . But it's not cool anymore. it seems to use more data now and I can't enter if I sub a data bundle after using my free mode for the day. Also i think those updates were unnecessary. I have lost up to ten accounts to suspension even if I didn't do anything . The suspension is & disabling is my main problem üò©, and to think I was managing the app...this is a big disrespect to users.

I can't start typing a comment or post and then minimize the app and come back to it. it reverts to the home page and loses everything I was typing, even if I was on another page or looking at something in a group. It also does this if I lock the screen and set my phone down and come back. This makes the app completely unusable if you get interrupted. if you have a life outside of Facebook, use the regular app. If your device doesn't have enough resources for the full app, Meta hates you.

Lighter on the storage, and still has dark mode, but maybe you could add a button to share events straight to my Google calendar. I used to be able to, I think with the regular Facebook. Can't use gifs or certain animation. And doesn't have landscape view but phone can override it sometimes. UPDATE: Now I've been getting a white bar that takes up about a third of the screen (Z Fold 3 unfolded) occasionally. Maybe a fix in an update, you could enable "continue apps on cover screen"

when I watch short clips or reels, stop treating me like I'm a new user every time I watch them! I know how to swipe to see more content I understood that the first 150 times you told me. I am not stupid, the pop up is nothing but annoying and a bit intrusive. it's gotten to the point where I don't scroll out of spite. When I click on a link in Messenger that leads me to a Facebook post or a facebook Instagram reel, take me back to messenger when I press back instead of my feed, it's obnoxious!

In the new update, there's no basic mode now...you must use data if you want to enter facebook lite which is disappointing because this is my go-to app if I have to chat my parents whenever my messenger is bugging and my Facebook won't work properly. This was also easy to use because it loads faster than Facebook, but now... honestly I am sad to have this new features where I can only access it using data mode. Please bring back the old Fb Lite where there's still Basic mode or Free data:<<<.

I can't tell the difference between this and the normal FB app other than the look is a little bit different. I honestly don't know what is missing. The only things I don't like is that I can't move it from my phone's internal storage to the SD card and it doesn't stay a tiny app. It will eventually grow a little bit for "data" whatever that is. If I delete and reinstall it the data is gone but everything is the same. FB isn't the only app like that tho or the worst.

I'm having a frustrating issue with the comment button on a post. I've tried everything to fix it! I've restarted my Wi-Fi, rebooted my phone, cleared the cache, and even uninstalled and reinstalled Facebook Lite, but nothing seems to work. I'm still unable to click the comment button. This bug is really eating into my time, and it's quite frustrating. Could someone please look into this and fix it?

what is hping on with fb lite? I've had numerous issues with this app for some time now. it's loading other reels comments when I've moved onto a another reel. it just pops up randomly and then I have to do a back n button to remove it. when I'm downloading pictures to this app it won't complete the download on the app. I have to open it in Chrome. like I said this has been doing these things probably around a month.

I would like to raise my concern, when I'm searching at my search bar there's no results coming, they only saying "sorry we can't find something related etc...", first I thought it's just a bug, but after I relog-in, cleared my data, and updated my app it wasn't fixed at all. My other account works fine, but I don't know with my main account.

I'll give this a 4 out of 5 because it's a great app it's just like Facebook but less storage and there's just one thing I been using this for a long time now and there's been a bug like when I click the message icon on the app it won't work I already try a lot of way like re installing it, restarting my phone, everything but it's still didn't work and there's one more bug sometimes a random music will start out of nowhere and that's all I wish you could fix the bug and I'll give a 5 star rating

I used to like Facebook lite version more than Facebook. But it's getting annoying day by day. It took so much time to load. sometimes it doesn't even log even though I have perfect internet connection. It's hard to send anything un messenger. Besides you can't send a voice note more than 1 minutes that's so annoying. Hope they will fix this problem.

The app completely ignores my preferences. Even after marking content as "Not Interested," it keeps showing up again after refresh. When I click on a post I don‚Äôt want, the app says ‚ÄúYou hid a post. You will see less like it in the future‚Äù ‚Äî but in reality, the feed stays full of the same type of content, and sometimes even shows me the exact same post I hid. The feed also feels random and unrelated to the pages I actually like and follow. Overall, the content feed is very bad and annoying.

When i go to 'Menu' & select 'Group' & after entering one of the group list & i want to go back to 'menu' by using the arrow symbol on the upper left side screen & I can't go back to the 'menu' & it's stuck there. It happens often & I had to use another method, which was to go straight out of FB via phone & Re-enter / log back facebook again normally. It's an annoying little problem.

The issue I am having with Facebook Lite, is that when I comment on my own posts or on to a friends post & my friend's reply I 'NEVER' receive notifications about their reply's ! I only get the 'Like' notifications that I don't really care much about. In Settings, everything seems to be in place, so.. can you please fix it ? Other than that, for many reasons I much prefer Facebook Lite, to the original version. Thank's in advance.

I used to keep around 15 people and pages in my Facebook Lite search list ‚Äî the ones I interacted with the most. But now that feature is almost gone. First, it dropped from 15 to 10, and now it‚Äôs down to just 7. It might sound small, but it really bothers me. I mostly used Facebook Lite just for those 15 pages and people. Losing that feature feels genuinely disappointing. Edit: it has come down to 5-6 now. What is happening, I don't understand.

after creating my Facebook account, the first thing that happened was that i can't send friend request,then later it started working, I was enjoying the Facebook just for about 1 or 2 weeks i noticed that whenever i sent a message they will write in red"couldn't send" i thought that it was normal but it just continued that way.lemme first update it to know if it will still continue

Hi Meta Team, I‚Äôve noticed that on both Facebook and Facebook Lite, the photo upload process is quite stressful compared to Instagram. When I try to upload a picture, the gallery doesn‚Äôt show folders or allow me to easily select from organized albums like Instagram does. Everything just appears mixed up, which makes it difficult and time consuming to find the right photo or video. It would be great if you could make the Facebook gallery work like Instagram‚Äôs where users can easily pick from

Facebook has become a mess all my account has been locked including my business account. But please don't give up on the app peaple like use need it, Facebook no longer add friends and that's making things hard. Please improve on the app please reduce the level of blocking and at least leave the app to add friends. Thanks for understanding

Stop random postings in Notifications then Messenger!
