I still can't manage my accounts it's too difficult to adjust, have pictures, FROM PHOTO app. , etcetera into my Facebook page, make it easier!Scammer charges on my credit card! now! On Facebook. could be Better. COME ON GOOGLE!

I have many, many things I'd like to type here to complain about this app but I will skip to writing out the number one issue... The regular FB app was large - it was taking up almost 4gb or even over that - of space on my phone. So in order to save hard disk space as well as ram space. When I first download the app it was under 1gb. 3 weeks later and the updates have brought it to 3gn again

I gave one star because of a very annoying issue. While scrolling, random music suddenly starts playing, and I have no idea where it is coming from. Also, when I watch a video and stop it, the sound from the previous video keeps playing in the background even if I already move on to watch a different one. This makes the app very frustrating to use.

Recently, Lite is not responding to the option to hide posts that one does not want to see. Posts like nudes and Witchdoctors frequently find their uninvited presence on very irrelevant groups and it is quite annoying and frustrating. Pliz Facebook team work on that. Also, upon trying to create new account, both Facebook and its Lite version keep rejecting ones names. Otherwise now, fb including Lite has improved alot in recent years mak√≠ng it a beauty and entertaining media.

I gave one star because of a very annoying issue. While scrolling, random music suddenly starts playing, and I have no idea where it is coming from. Also, when I watch a video and stop it, the sound from the previous video keeps playing in the background even if I already move on to watch a different one. This makes the app very frustrating to use.

lite is always my go to app for social media, it has many useful features that are also user-friendly and easy to use, however, recently, i am facing this issue where i can't log in to the app, I'm stuck in the loading screen for how many hours, and no, it's not an issue with my internet connection. I hope you'll fix this issue.

I‚Äôm giving this app two star because of an incredibly frustrating problem. Random audio starts playing while I‚Äôm scrolling, and I can‚Äôt figure out which post it‚Äôs coming from. On top of that, whenever I watch a video and pause it, the audio keeps running in the background even after I move on to something else. It makes the whole app really annoying to use. Please fix this issue as soon as possible because it‚Äôs making the app almost unusable.

I couldn't log in my account it keeps saying error, I seriously can't believe it logged me out when I didn't even logged it out when I came back, I tried uninstall and installing it again, it won't work. For some reason my other accounts can log in but my main account can't üò≠üò≠, In messenger it's okay it's working fine but I think this is just frustrating cause I can't go through the lite app on my main acc, fix this pls...and I might just edit this...

Facebook is a place where people can interact, know each other more and get information about things online. I always use Facebook everyday. But what I don't understand was when I tried sending messages, it would tell me "couldn't send" when my internet is connected. Please, look into this matter and report back to me.

I swear if I could give zero stars I would. Says there's a new update, but the app refuses to update when I tap update. 0 stars. - and it just keeps getting worse. now its refusing to show some messages in my chat, and says it needs updated, but update isn't there. on par tho. at least they're consistent. üôÑ

This Fb lite is very useful ! I'm using after 5 6 yrs ! I'm super excited to share my epectations with FB lite ! No hanging no lagging just perfect. I honestly don't know what I missing. The phone internal storage to the SD and it doesn't stay a tiny apps . Lighter on the storage, and still has dark mode, but maybe you could add a button to share events straight to my Google calendar. This has made me realize that's the regular Facebook really needs to work on reducing those annoying ads and fix

It could be that I was complacent with the "old layout", for I find the new update very "big" and cluttered...the user interface is very busy, and opening the application takes forever. The "comment space" has been compressed horizontally, that before you have "finished your thoughts" the keyboard appears and whatever you have written is lost. Why did you move "WhatsApp" from within this application? It was easy navigate between the two.

The app was doing so good until I couldn't log into my account again. I've tried all means, I never logged out of my account but it appears I've been logged out and my password cannot be used. I think there should be a way to help us fix the problem when it happens like that.

Facebook is the best app I've ever use because it is the app that is open for your feelings or emotion you may post what you are feeling today and also you can apload video like reels, photos, and myday. When I am bored the first app will come to my mind is this app because aside from expressing your feelings or emotion, watch reels, upload photo, and myday you can also chat with other people like your friends, family even when they are not with you, moreover you can chat with strangers.

I've been using it for years now and it's truly a great app, the only problem that I have is I somehow cannot absolutely use my other account on this app, it keeps on loading and loading to the point where started to wonder if that account was hacked but it was not since I was able to open that account on my messenger and so I decided to uninstall and install it but it still won't let me open my account

I gave it 1 star because the app has some issues right now some reported that the app just keeps on suspending or disabled some accounts others say that they didn't even violate any rules but still got suspended or disabled. my 2 accounts on Facebook has been suspended/disabled and I keep trying on how to recover it but there's nothing happened hopefully meta will fix this issue not just Facebook but also Instagram, messenger and facebook app/lite.

Whenever I go to watch a clip/video and click on it, there seems to be another video merged into it right below it even though I didn't click on that particular video, so when I watch a clip/video there are 2 showing at the same time, before there was only 1 clip/video that showed when I clicked on it. This is so frustrating and annoying

10/28/2025 0:16 Philippine time suddenly FB lite's not loading, other apps are working fine. I also cleared cache but to no avail. I also installed Facebook to check if it also won't load but it would. I hope this will be fixed immediately especially since FB lite is a great alternative to FB because of lesser phone memory usage & lesser data usage

the app was great, super great actually, but.. there are some stuff that's going on with my fb lite. whenever I'm watching reels, my fb lite suddenly refreshes itself out of nowhere, my chats from my friends dissapearing, and its written "You've received a message, but your version of fb lite doesn't support it." idk what to do actually cause its either they're fb lite is updated so early or was my fb lite the problem-?

The app is good. The only thing I didn't like was that it suddenly started playing music. I hope this will be fixed soon because it's annoying... the one where you're watching something seriously and then suddenly there's music, you have to press back just for the music to stop.please admin fix it ..

The latest update of this app was particularly annoying, as it would appear every time I opened it. Even though I had data, it would always display the ‚ÄúBUY DATA‚Äù button. Back then, I preferred using this app, which helped me save data and avoid connecting to any other connection, just like WiFi. Please bring that back so that you can help us students save data

Before, FB Lite became my most useful app because I can still gain access from it even if I don't have data pack/load. But now? I can't even log in if my ‚Äúfree 30 MB‚Äù has ended for the day. It became inconvenient whenever I wanted to contact my friends or family when I am far away from them. Please, bring back the traditional basic free mode at least!

This app just started this weird glitch where if I react to a vid, it will take me all the way back to the page/feed I originally clicked on it from (even if I'm far down in reading the comments, like I hadn't clicked it at all). And if I react to a vid that I found from watching another one... good luck in me ever finding that vid again because it'll take me back to the very first one I clicked on. It's so annoying I uninstalled and reinstalled, but the problem was still there. 0/5 stars.

whenever I share a post, and write something, the writing just goes missing. rechecking/proofreading a comment could be made easier. leaving the app while writing and coming back to it, is hard, because the app resets. I know I wouldnt have any of these problem on the full facebook. but the full facebook is too much. its so much I cant even think of any of it as important. i wanna switch to threads, but god knows why that is only for instagram.

I can't tell the difference between this and the normal FB app other than the look is a little bit different. I honestly don't know what is missing. The only things I don't like is that I can't move it from my phone's internal storage to the SD card and it doesn't stay a tiny app. It will eventually grow a little bit for "data" whatever that is. If I delete and reinstall it the data is gone but everything is the same. FB isn't the only app like that tho or the worst.

after the last update, it became a trash app. if you search anything that ‚Äúpost, all, people‚Äù these individual options isn't available anymore. nothing can't be found easily because of this missing problem. can't even send any messages through lite. while reading or watching something important, this app gets a sudden refresh by its own. it's totally ridiculous. fix all these problems quickly or I'll report your lite app.

I like the Light version of Facebook so far. Thank you. I kept getting kicked off the other Facebook every time I logged in it would drop down off the page. Never did that before and I've been on Facebook for 17 years. It always shows two different logins in my name but one is my old email I don't use and the other is log in with my phone number. I can get on with that one every time. But the 2 Factor Authentication is not working. It only works for a week when I turn it on.

A small but important feature could be improved. The ‚ÄòWho can send you friend requests?‚Äô option is currently limited to ‚ÄòEveryone‚Äô or ‚ÄòFriends of Friends.‚Äô Adding a ‚ÄòNo One‚Äô option would give users much better control over their privacy and friend requests. Hopefully, Facebook will add this feature in the future.‚Äù

facebook lite is better than Facebook because when my Facebook Menu (three lines) isn't working and i can't Login my another facebook id then i install the facebook lite & it's Menu ( three line ) button is worked. and i finally log in my another facebook profile . All features in it. i think it have all features. if i say about any Limitation on it then main Limitation is it isn't smoothly operated/drive comparison on Facebook. May be i was Facebook Driver previous so. it's May be

I would give this app a star , seriously üòë, I don't just get how this new upgrade keep disallowing me from using my account, now it has been disabled for unknown reasons, because that's what it keep showing, or maybe it has been hacked, I can't even process any transactions or reply to any messages from any customers. I even tried to send you guys mail so as to help me, I couldn't reach you because you, there is no way to contact you , this is very bad , not even customer service bot üò°.

There's an annoying bug with the app. When there's a video in the news feed, the audio randomly plays even if you are not watching it. And when you go to your phone's home screen and return to the app, the audio from that video plays again. This happens despite the fact that sound in the app and autoplay settings are turned off.

Master the popular match-3 puzzle game, Clockmaker, and immerse yourself in its Victorian setting! Dive into an addicting story, solve the mystery, and save the city from the villain. Thousands of match-3 adventure game levels await you!

Experience the jewel mania and embark on a quest with our 3-match game! Match sparkling jewels and gems, using special boosters to overcome thousands of levels. Download now and enjoy this puzzle games for adults. Play "Clockmaker: Jewel Match 3 Game" either online or offline.

Features of the game "Clockmaker":

üíé Jump into a unique match-3 gameplay! Enjoy addictive new match three games (3 in row), combining a touch of science fiction with royal puzzle games for free.

üíé Discover secrets and play the classic bejeweled games for adults! Solve the mysteries of hidden objects and match 3 games to earn boosters and multiply your points.

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be a really good app. NOW when you log on you have to close 4-5 ads for game currency. You're forced to click thru all their side quests and watch their animations when new stuff comes up even if you aren't participating or want to. I've chosen to not play because when I log on there is all this hoop jumping required. I don't want to have to spend 3 minutes closing out and exiting stuff I don't want or need. Sad this used to be a favorite of mine and has become disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We appreciate you sharing your thoughts and are sorry for the inconvenience caused by ads and unwanted animations. Our team is working hard to improve the experience. Thanks for your support and understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: The ad where they say, "we're not going to lie about the app" while they're showing cool puzzles for you to solve? It's a lie. This is your run of the mill match 3 game, and you will end up watching an average of 7-9 ads per level to be able to clear the level. In its favor, you can watch as many ads as you need to clear the level, but it will rarely be only 1-2 ads. Never got to see a single puzzle like they showed in their "not going to lie" ad. Uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to send us your feedback. We understand how disappointing the situation must be and apologize for the inconvenience!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a good storyline that flows smoothly. The graphics are great and realistic. Even the games have just enough difference to keep it interesting. So you would think that this game is worthy of 5 stars, and at first, I did give it 5 stars. But now that I have to tighten my purse strings and need to rely on ads for assistance, the ads are limited, costing me to lose more lives faster. Therefore, having drastically cut down on my playing the game. The creators say this is the standard. Delete
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We truly appreciate your feedback and the initial support you had for the game. We're committed to providing a balanced experience, and your experience with limited ads is something we're eager to improve upon. Thank you for helping us on our journey to make the game better for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: Ads malfunction constantly. Ads fail to load or fail to load rewards, especially in special events, and when you've earned your way to enhanced functions: Guaranteed crash. the game elements themselves are challenging and creative, but once you get to where the puzzles cannot be solved without ads or real money, it's just kind of a bummer. Ads lock up, and you can blaze through a fortune just to jam up later.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! To report bugs, use our in-game support. If you've already submitted a request, it's being processed. You don't need to report it again. We greatly appreciate your patience and understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: had to come back for a maybe final review. still giving 5 stars, it is a fun game. but it starts to get stagnant. like reaching the clock tower, took way too long to get too, adding extra chest to complete the building also makes it feel miserable because you're doing the same puzzle, then it feels more stagnant because you have to collect 5-7 items at the end of each puzzle with high numbers on what to clear on the board with only 20 moves, 50 would be great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you so much for your detailed review and for sticking with us! We‚Äôre glad you‚Äôre enjoying the game. Your feedback about the Clock Tower and puzzle challenges is very valuable, and we‚Äôll keep it in mind to make future updates even more fun. Thanks for being part of our community!

scraped_reviews.content: the latest update has been frustrating. it takes forever to load the game. you can no longer skip ads by closing the screen and reopen. whatever timed prizes you get at the start of the game, you will lose at least two minutes off of them due to all the forced narrations you have to endure-no way to skip them. I couldn't play it yesterday because it simply wouldn't load. please get rid of the latest update.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for reaching out. We‚Äôre so sorry to know you have troubles with the game. Please send an email to our support team to this email address: clockmaker_support@belkatechnologies.com. More details about the problem would be greatly appreciated. Look forward to your email!

scraped_reviews.content: I had about 385 lives saved up and after the updates I lost everything you can only get a max of 10, which is dumb! The levels are way too hard even in the beginning stages, and the ads are ridiculous. This game has gone from fun to annoying and frustrating. The pushy ads is so annoying when on timed levels. please stip with the forced pop ups, make the levels more enjoyable, an for God sakes let us stack up as many lives as we want. this game went from bad to worse.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry to hear you lost your saved lives and are frustrated with the level difficulty and ads. To help us investigate the issue with your lost items, please contact our support team directly through the in-game "Help" menu.

scraped_reviews.content: This game is aggravating. It has so many pop-ups for mini games that you don't really get to play the actual game. If I had "Attention Deficit Disorder", this would be the game for me. If you play for 5 minutes you'll play the actual game 2 minutes. I'm playing thru a pay-to-play site & that's the only reason I play. But soon as I hot the level I want I'm deleting this game. I'd be really surprised if my review isn't deleted. I'm gonna check back. **responses are good chngs are better!!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We are sorry that our in-game events and pop-ups felt too disruptive. We will pass your feedback about the game's flow on to our design team for their consideration.

scraped_reviews.content: Even though you have made the app seamless and beautiful, I will be uninstalling, again, after this next ticket season runs out. I've NEVER seen such a greedy effing company! Asking if I'm sure after EVERY TIME I close out of an "offer". Telling me that I will get 4 extra moves with the purchase of the special ticket but they only last for so many games and then only give 10 to 15 moves otherwise. It's ridiculous and an asinine way to ruin a beautifully classic game!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We‚Äôre truly sorry to hear that you feel this way. We understand your frustration and appreciate your honest feedback. Your thoughts are important to us, and we‚Äôll make sure to pass them along to the team. Thank you for giving the game a try and for sharing your experience.

scraped_reviews.content: This game has levels you cannot win without using special Items that you have to purchase for just one extra move needed. To get the 3 extra moves, most of the time. The video will not load so you cannot win on the first try. Which is very frustrating it makes the game boring and stagnant. There needs to be new Special items and even special characters. Something to spice it up to make me want to continue to play it. The game will freeze up and that needs to be fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback! All purchases are optional ‚Äî you can earn boosters through in-game events. If the game freezes or videos don't load, please contact our support team via Settings ‚Üí Help. They'll be happy to assist!

scraped_reviews.content: Extreme slow to load, slow response time when moving objects in the game. After level 25 it's almost impossible to win even with boosters. If online, after game finally loads, you are slammed with about 10 other mini games one after another. super annoying and frustrating. I have decided to uninstall this app, not worth it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Sorry for the inconvenience! Please contact our support team at clockmaker_support@belkatechnologies.com with a detailed description of the issue and your player ID. They‚Äôll be happy to help you resolve this. Thank you for playing!

scraped_reviews.content: this match 3 game is beautiful, but has been ruined with ads. it used to have none, but they take up more time than you get to play now, and if you don't pay, you will need to watch them (they give you no choice now). I was not thrilled when they went to ads a couple of years ago, but the last few months have become unbearable. to the developers, what you had was once great. this is now boring and redundant. I am, with sadness, uninstalling after 6-7 years of playing your game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for playing with us all these years ‚Äî we‚Äôre truly grateful. We're sorry the ad experience has affected your enjoyment. Your feedback is very important, and we‚Äôre already working on improvements to make the game more enjoyable again.

scraped_reviews.content: you have ruined this game! At one time it was a favorite, now you can't play without being bombarded with purchase offers one after another. Game constantly glitches and closes a puzzle before it can be completed. losing a life. Why would I spend a dime when I can't even report the problem on support as the dialogue box also closes after typing a single sentence!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Sorry for the inconvenience! Please contact our support team at clockmaker_support@belkatechnologies.com with a detailed description of the issue and your player ID. They‚Äôll be happy to help you resolve this. Thank you for playing!

scraped_reviews.content: The actual matching game is okay, but pretty generic. The dialogue feels a little pointless and I usually just click though it and don't read it. The thing I hate about this game is that once you open it you are berated by a ton of pop up and mini games that you are then forced to play. It is never ending. Even if you like the main game it'll take forever just to get to it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We appreciate your honesty and are sorry for the trouble. Your feedback helps us get better ‚Äî we‚Äôll forward your thoughts to the developers for review.

scraped_reviews.content: At first I really loved this game. It's fun, exciting, challenging, has fantastic graphics & I didn't mind the ad breaks (which were only a few at first!). Fact is I do still very much love this game. However, when the time I spend watching the ads *GROSSLY* outweighs the time I'm ACTUALLY PLAYING the game... Well, now I have a frustrating & annoying problem! Despite how much I love this game, I damn near dread opening the app to "kinda" play & I have almost no patience left enough to keep it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your honest feedback. We‚Äôre sorry the ads have become frustrating and affect your gameplay experience. We truly appreciate your love for the game and will share your thoughts with the team to improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: i play on the app scrambly so it pays me to play which is obviously awesome. and it's a fun game. it's match 3 plus other stuff making it different from most the match 3 games available. love the aesthetic of it, heck even the background music isn't annoying and obnoxious. overall I enjoy the game, no bugs, always get my credit for playing so far.. no complaints. if you like match 3 games, this is a goodin. don't take my word for it though, find out for yourself! *not a paid rating..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for sharing your experience! We‚Äôre thrilled you like the game and its unique features. Your support means a lot to us. Have a great time playing!

scraped_reviews.content: Graphics and the story are amazing. FULL of ads - out of 20 min game time, 17 min are watching ads OR be prepared to pay (a lot). Extremely annoying because I spent way more time watching ads for other games than playing this one. It also pushes in-app purchases aggressively, when opened. I had to click away 8 pop-ups before being able to start a game. It would be an amazing game if the developer wasn't as greedy as they are.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for appreciating the graphics and storyline. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by ads and pop-ups. Your insights are invaluable, and we‚Äôll work on creating a more seamless experience for our players.

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be my go-to match 3 game. It had the perfect balance of challenge and success. Plus, there were always three or four alternatives to just bashing away at the same puzzle, which helped make it considerably less frustrating. But lately, I can hardly get to those side puzzles or any puzzle, because it keeps forcing me to play this sub-quest and this team competition and this and this and this. I can barely play the puzzle I want because it simply won't let me. Do not download.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you very much for your review concerning our game. We are always collecting user feedback that we can apply with updates. It will help us make the game better for our current and future players.

scraped_reviews.content: I have played this game for years and have thoroughly enjoyed it. BUT, as of late, it continues to move towards all about $$$ instead of play. You are unable to watch ads anymore for a few extra moves. In between every level is a pop-up to buy more. I understood when the game changed from 2 power ups to 1 from the cat, but it's starting to become too much.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you very much for your review concerning our game. We are always collecting user feedback that we can apply with updates. It will help us make the game better for you!

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy that the game can be played offline and is my go-to plane game. However, the amount of forced ads when online is too much for me. I don't see an option to pay to remove the forced ads (and the forced ads make me not want to watch ads for rewards and I often just close out of the game). The art is pretty, and I like the event variety and options.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your review and feedback. We're sorry to hear you feel this way. However, ads allow our team working on Clockmaker, add new mechanics and special events. There are also some ads in the game that allow our players to get extra items or bonuses for free. We hope for your understanding in this matter!

scraped_reviews.content: Update...what you see in the ads for this game us why I deleted it.. sooo many "events". Just annoying. Constant clicking "x" just to get back to the game. Loved the base game. "Events" are stupid and wastes your time. Had played this game for several years...I couldn't get thru all the ads and the endless self promoting ads. Once opened...it would take over 20 clicking "x"s to get out of all the extras juso get to play a game. Got fed up when it wasted so much of my "free" time and deleted it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with the game, and we'll take your feedback into account in our future work.

scraped_reviews.content: After last update, this game sucks. I will be uninstalling it. Before last update, you could play for maybe 5-8 minutes without having to watch an ad. Now it is EVERY level. Each level takes 1-2 minutes, and then you watch same 2 minute ad over and over. There is a very deceptive feature...if you click the button and watch an ad, you get a minor benefit. Make no mistake, don't click that button to voluntarily watch an ad, you STILL going to watch an ad. More time watching ads than playing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your review and feedback. We're sorry to hear you feel this way. However, ads allow our team working on Clockmaker, add new mechanics and special events. There are also some ads in the game that allow our players to get extra items or bonuses for free. We hope for your understanding in this matter!

scraped_reviews.content: It's the only game I play; has the right level of challenge since I have to stop-and-go play most of the time. The graphic design is great! It's hard to get bored, always multiple levels to play. If I don't give up on hard levels, I eventually beat it. I rarely have any technical issues. The few I did have were fixed in a timely manner once I reported it within the game's inbox, [upper right-hand corner's 3-line link, then click settings cogwheel, support, contact us].
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. If you will face any troubles with the game, please contact our support team (enter settings in the game and press "Support" button, that looks like a bug) and describe the issue in details. We will be happy to find out how we could help!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a very cute and well put together game. But it is very pay to play. Issue 1 My hubby calculated how many moves some puzzles require w/o using cash - the game doesn't give you a fighting chance. You can't progress without paying (especially on the event boards) 2 Any in game earned rewards such as gems, dynamite, extra hearts, time, etc disappear when I close the game 3 Dynamite, lighting, etc doesn't take all the gems they should Maybe it's just a glitch
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback. We wanted Clockmaker to be a challenging game. It might seem that some levels are too hard, but it is possible to complete them without purchasing. Try out different strategies, be patient, do as many attempts as possible and we‚Äôre sure you will beat these levels!

scraped_reviews.content: When I started playing this game, it was a lot of fun. I also didn't mind waiting for my hearts to fill up before playing again. It then became manageable with free advantages and extended time limits. However, as the levels go higher, it gets harder (understandably so). But, I finally hits a brick wall in where I could not advance for two weeks. So, instead of having fun, I felt nothing but frustration. Unfortunately, it's a good game but I will uninstall for my mind's sake.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. When developing Clockmaker, we wanted to make challenging gameplay and hoped our players would enjoy it. If you think some levels are too hard and cannot be completed, please send us more info and we will check them.

scraped_reviews.content: Just a note for people considering this game. I have played it for years, and like the game. However, recently I am very disappointed. While I sometimes buy assists, I really like the challenge of not using them. Now, however, the game is getting SO difficult, it is apparent the paradigm has changed. If you don't pay, you CAN'T win. I have played the same 2 boards for literally weeks, and cannot proceed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. Our goal has always been to make Clockmaker a tough, yet entertaining game. This means some tasks really might seem harder than others. However, we're always rebalancing levels, and constantly adding various events that reward you with useful bonuses.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a match 3 app with a basic storyline you can follow as you go. It gives me everything I want from a game like this: It's easy to win without purchases, there aren't ads, and the in app purchases are reasonable, reasonably priced, and seem genuinely to be respectful of the game and its users. I found this from an ad reel they purchased to spare users from annoying ads, and it was just music with a text reel to read if you didn't skip. I didn't, and got it, and don't regret it a bit.

Decent enough match 3 game. It lacks some common mechanics that make it a little frustrating, and whether you win a stage is heavily dependent on what random pieces you get. Very pretty graphics, but the story and characters are less than memorable. What kills it for me, though, is the crazy number of popup announcements you get every time you load the game - and sometimes right after you exit a puzzle, too. I just can't stand tapping through them all anymore.

Cute graphics and intriguing mystery storyline, but the game takes you on too many sub-story lines: one is a restaurant needing to be fixed before the health inspector closes it, another is to build a ship, and on and on. This game doesn't know if it wants to be a mystery to be solved or just unconnected games within the game. In the higher levels, it starts getting very repetitive, and the boosters don't help nearly as much as they should, likely a tactic to get you to pay for more boosters.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you very much for your review concerning our game. We are always collecting user feedback that we can apply with updates. It will help us make the game better for you!

scraped_reviews.content: This has long been my favorite game. However, most of the puzzles have become so difficult to win that they are often boring after playing the same screen numerous times. This often makes me leave the game to play something else, which causes me to lose the set. Please fix this so I can give 5 stars again! Update 4/12/24: now there are 10 to 15 popups in the game start that force you to participate in side challenges & other games before you can choose the game you want to play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with the game, and we'll take your feedback into account in our future work.

scraped_reviews.content: I started playing this game 1 yr. ago & I haven't been able to stop playing it! It's so much fun but it's super addicting lol! You move through levels fast at first, they get harder but they're not impossible. It's challenging but not impossible which helps keep you interested. Tons of chances to get rewards like infinite lives and other items to help you out as you go through the levels. It also doesn't bombard you with pop-up ads all the time. I'd definitely recommend it, entertaining! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§

this is definitely a fun matching game with lots of levels, bonuses &rewards. it doesn't have very good instructions and is confusing to play at first. also when you get rewards, they have timers. you can't save them so if you don't play the game you lose that reward. I wish that was different, it would be much better. sometimes it's difficult to get a bonus and if the timer is 4 hours long and you want to use your reward you have to play the game that long?! who can do that?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review and feedback about the game. We really appreciate this. We're sorry to hear you experienced a lack of instructions at the beginning. We're working on this point to make the game more comprehensive!

scraped_reviews.content: It's a fun game, but some of the levels are impossible to beat. I can only assume it's to push you into such frustration that either quit the game altogether, which I have done several times, or spend money. Additionally, I had over 30 lives that just disappeared, and nothing was done to rectify that. However, I did receive an email saying they were sorry I was experiencing problems. REALLY!!!? Also, my progress won't transfer over to my other devices even though I'm logged in to FB.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jennifer! Thank you for the review and sorry for the problems. We hope in the next update we can solve issues you mentioned. Also, could you please tell us number of your ticket? Have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: I have added a star to my review because it is fun to play. However, at higher levels, odstacles are added that make it impossible to win without spending money to buy boosters. No matter how many turns you get to complete a puzzle, 90% are getting obstacles out of the way, so you are prevented from getting enough matches to complete the puzzle. If you are willing to spend thousands of dollars, or play the game for one day once a week, this game is for you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Joseph! Thank you for your review. When developing Clockmaker, we wanted to make a challenging gameplay and hoped our players would enjoy it. If you think some levels are too hard and cannot be completed, please send us more info and we will check them.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game. However, what I don't love is spending money just to finish a level. I would rather have the option to watch an ad! 8/12/24 I have to stop playing this game. At this point, PAYING JUST TO FINISH A GAME IT ASININE! I'VE ALREADY SPENT WAY TOO MUCH MONEY PLAYING THIS GAME! #MONEY PIT GAME! While, yes, it's a choice to pay or not, the higher you get in levels the harder it is to finish a level because of all the bombs, spider webs, & etc that you have to get through.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We understand your concerns. We aim to provide a balanced gameplay experience where players can progress without necessarily making purchases. Your feedback is invaluable and we'll take it into consideration for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Good game, unfortunately can't be saved and/or sync across platform. Your progress is saved but anything you earned (extra bomb, puzzle, etc) they are saved locally. It's quite a disappointment to find that I lost 100+ puzzle pieces when I changed my tablet. Other than that, a fun match 3 games. Some difficult enough that you have to spend time or money to pass. Game is quite stable as I originally played in Galaxy S1.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Angelina! Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate this since it will help us to make the game better. At the moment we're working on a new system allowing to synch almost all the elements in the game through Facebook. This will help to transfer puzzles as well as other game items. Sorry for the inconveniences and hope for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: My jury is still out on this game. It's obvious the developers spent a great deal of time on strategies and design. But it's a bit overwhelming and slightly muddled as what does one do next. Oh wee shiny, but more complicated than needed. Not quite a swing and miss but too close for comfort. Developers should rethink some of those intriguing strategies.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that was the impression you got of the game. Yes, the game does have various elements that can make it seem complicated, but our team is always working on making the game clearer for our players. We hope you'll give Clockmaker another chance in the future. Have a nice day!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game! It is not boring, has all kinds of challenges, and I especially love the ones involving the lizards, owls, and fish. My only complaint is an ongoing lack of receiving my heart/s (jewels) as rewards. When I buy them, I get them, but still cannot receive them otherwise. I reluctantly uninstalled, cleaned up the cache, waited a little while, then re-installed. I was ecstatic I didnt have to start all over, but sad the same problem persists.

I've been playing the game for nearly a year. At first it was easy, as most games are in the begining, then it became challenging which was fun. But now? It has become impossible to complete a puzzle without a help. You've made the game harder so we have to buy different things in order to progress. The people in my society all agree, we won't pay to play. If that is what you want then you should charge up front. I did enjoy the game & got family & friends interested. I'm very disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. When developing Clockmaker, we wanted to make a challenging gameplay and hoped our players would enjoy it. If you think some levels are too hard and cannot be completed, please send us more info and we will check them.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game, but always, it freezes or starts glitching in the middle of a game and won't correct itself. I have to close out of the app and reload just to get it to stop. I deleted it and re-download and it's doing it again. It always ends up freezing. The ad for this comes up on other games I play. They need to spend money to make their game work consistently instead of constant ads on other platforms. Plus I am glad I didn't spend money just to have the game stall out indefinitely.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We apologize for the situation you're experiencing. Please contact our support service through the Setting menu in the game and describe the problem in detail, so we can help fix this. The more detail you can give us, the better support our team can provide. We'll be waiting for your message!

scraped_reviews.content: Some of the games are impossible to progress unless you buy game boosters and such. But all in all it does present a good challenge! They just need to stop putting in those timed bombs. Sometimes there's so many you can't keep up, so the game explodes and you have to keep repeating. All the others games are challenging enough. Those little nasties aren't needed!!! I can rate it a 4 star I guess üòä

Same experience as others have posted about. Cool game. The nonstop ads and constant popups for more and more paid content are incredible intrusive and frustrating. I play games to unwind a little, but this game is doing the opposite. Quick suggestions: allow players to buy an ad-stop option. Remove mid-play popups. Finally, please choose quality over quantity--the home screen is so crowded and disorganized!! Maybe players don't really need 8 simultaneous special events??
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your review. We're sorry you experienced this inconvenient situation.

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely hate this freaking game. The levels are impossible with the amount of moves given, and I believe it's made that way so you spend more time watching videos to get extra moves than you do playing the game. If I wasn't trying to beat a certain level to get Rewarded Play points, and hadn't already invested so much time, I would have deleted it a long time ago. I've just started thinking of it as watching ads to get points, because that's basically what you'll end up doing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're very sorry to hear about your extremely disappointing experience with the game, and we'll take your feedback into account in our future work.

scraped_reviews.content: I really enjoy this game, however the rewards are not consistent. I completed the last jigsaw puzzle last week, but the "Coming Soon" is still up, but none have been released. This is the main source of free boosters. I have acquired several more puzzle pieces, but cannot see the total or know of they are accumulating for my use. The safe with the gems was nice, but disappeared quickly. I thought it would be a constant feature...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sam! Thank you for your review. New puzzles will be available with future updates. When they appear in the game, the puzzles pieces will be apllied to the pictures automatically. The safe is a regular feature. It means it is supposed to appear on a regular basis from Fri till Mon every week. Hope this info will be helpful!

scraped_reviews.content: The advertising for this got me in, but then the game got me out. The levels get too hard too fast. Have to pay for more gems. Too many side quests. It gets confusing what I am playing for. Also, you can't combine power ups of different colors. They can only be used in a combo of 3 or more of that color. I have played a lot of match three games, and this one is the worst!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Trisha! Thank you so much for taking your time to leave a review about Clockmaker. We're sorry to hear you don't like the game, but your feedback will help us make the game better. Have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: I revisit games that I'd put away for various reasons. I laughed when I read your condescending reply stating that there was no need to buy power ups to complete levels. We both know that's a lie. There is NO other match 3 currently or previously in rotation where I can't beat a level using 10 turns. So continue sending out form letters implying that gamers aren't good enough to beat your insanely unbeatable game. That's also a lie. But here's a truth though. This was the final shot. Deleted.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We‚Äôre sorry to hear you feel this way about the game. When developing Clockmaker we aimed at creating challenging gameplay. We would like you to know that we have big plans for the future. Maybe after a while you will play our game again and you will see how we grew up and how much work was done.

scraped_reviews.content: I think the game would be so much better if when the "time" rewards counted down the time remaining it would count down only when you are actually playing the games. People do actually eat, sleep, work, etc. Times when you can not play. So, your rewards with time are quite minimized and take a lot of the fun of winning away. Way, way too many ads now. After every game, too much!

Very pretty game. They claim entirely possible to win without powerups ($$$). This might be true if you get 100% lucky on each puzzle, but much too quickly it becomes quite difficult. It isn't fun doing the same level 40 times. Also, the ads promise a big story and not just connect 3... well I didn't see it at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre sorry to hear you feel this way about the game. When developing Clockmaker we aimed at creating a challenging gameplay. We are still working on the game design and balance, so your feedback helps us to make the game even better.

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy the game, but need to get through 10 minutes of pop up offers & options for the game before playing. And in spite of turning off the sound every time I can get that far, the game resets my sound preferences when I start it up. If I ever click on a house and need to go back, I get the entire realm of pop ups again. This is super irritating for many reasons incl time & my music, I get blasted with super loud game music, etc instead.

The game was fun in the beginning but as I progressed it was more challenging. I did buy some of the packages to continue a level but as it got harder the more money I had to spend. I stopped purchasing packages, until I pass a few levels without having to spend more money, well it's been a few months and no luck. I would the game is fun and if you have the extra cash go for it, but this is the end of the road for me family before games.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your review. We really appreciate your opinion about the game. It is true that the game is getting more difficult together with you progressing. But it is possible to pass levels without buying. Moreover, you can win various rewards that include boosters, hours of free play, etc, that can help you in completing hard levels.

title: PhonePe UPI, Payment, Recharge
description: PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card & debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline & online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds & buy insurance plans on PhonePe. Get Car & Bike Insurance on our app. Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment, investment, mutual funds, insurance & banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking. Things you can do on PhonePe (Phonepay) App: Money Transfer, UPI Payment, Bank Transfer - Money Transfer with BHIM UPI - Manage Multiple Bank Accounts‚Äì Check Account Balance, Save Beneficiaries across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks. Make Online Payments - Make online payment on various shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra etc. - Pay for online food orders from Zomato, Swiggy etc. - Pay for online grocery orders from Bigbasket etc. - Pay online for travel booking from Makemytrip, Goibibo etc. Make Offline Payments - Scan & Pay via QR Code at local stores like kirana, food, medicines etc. Buy/Renew Insurance Policies with PhonePe Insurance App Health & Term Life Insurance - Compare/Buy Health & Term life Insurance with monthly premiums - Coverage for individuals, senior citizens & families Car & Two Wheeler Insurance - Browse & get India‚Äôs most popular bike & car insurance - Buy/renew your car & bike Insurance in less than 10 minutes Other Insurance - PA Insurance: Insure yourself against accidents & disablement - Travel Insurance: Get international travel insurance for business & leisure trips - Shop Insurance: Insure your shop against fire, theft, natural calamities and burglaries. PhonePe Lending Get pre-approved personal loans ready to be disbursed into your bank account through seamless & digital loan onboarding journey. Repayment Period: 6 - 36 Months Maximum APR: 30.39% Example: Loan Amount: ‚Çπ1,00,000 Tenure: 12 months Rate of Interest: 24.49% per annum Processing Fee: ‚Çπ2,500 (2.5%) GST on Processing Fee: ‚Çπ450 Total Interest: ‚Çπ13,756.27 EMI: ‚Çπ9,479.69 Maximum APR: 30.39% Amount Disbursed: ‚Çπ97,050 Total Repayment Amount: ‚Çπ1,13,756.27 We offer loans from some of India's biggest lenders - Aditya Birla, Piramal, IDFC First, L&T Finance, and Credit Saison India. Mutual Funds & Investments App - Liquid Funds: Get higher returns than savings bank - Tax-Saving Funds: save up to ‚Çπ46,800 in tax & grow your investment - Super Funds: Achieve financial goals with expert help on our app - Equity Funds: High growth products curated as per risk appetite - Debt Funds: Get stable returns for investments without any lock-in period - Hybrid Funds: Get a balance of growth & stability - Buy or Sell 24K Pure Gold: Assured 24K purity, build gold savings on our app Recharge Mobile, DTH - Recharge Prepaid Mobile Numbers like Jio, Vodafone, Airtel etc. - Recharge DTH like Tata Sky, Airtel Direct, Sun Direct, Videocon etc. Bill Payment - Pay Credit Card Bills - Pay Landline Bills - Pay Electricity Bills - Pay Water Bills - Pay Gas Bills - Pay Broadband Bills Buy PhonePe Gift Cards - Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline & online outlets and across the PhonePe app. Manage your refunds - Manage & track refunds from your favorite shopping websites on PhonePe. For more details, Visit www.phonepe.com Permissions for App and reasons SMS: to verify Phone number for registration Location: a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions Contacts: for phone numbers to send money to and numbers to recharge Camera: to scan QR code Storage: to store scanned QR code Accounts: to pre-populate email ID while signing up Call: to detect single vs dual sim & let user choose Microphone: to carry out KYC video verification
descriptionHTML:
PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card & debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline & online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds & buy insurance plans on PhonePe. Get Car & Bike Insurance on our app.
Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment, investment, mutual funds, insurance & banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking.

Things you can do on PhonePe (Phonepay) App:

Money Transfer, UPI Payment, Bank Transfer
- Money Transfer with BHIM UPI
- Manage Multiple Bank Accounts‚Äì Check Account Balance, Save Beneficiaries across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks.

Make Online Payments
- Make online payment on various shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra etc.
- Pay for online food orders from Zomato, Swiggy etc.
- Pay for online grocery orders from Bigbasket etc.
- Pay online for travel booking from Makemytrip, Goibibo etc.

Make Offline Payments
- Scan & Pay via QR Code at local stores like kirana, food, medicines etc.

Buy/Renew Insurance Policies with PhonePe Insurance App

Health & Term Life Insurance
- Compare/Buy Health & Term life Insurance with monthly premiums
- Coverage for individuals, senior citizens & families

Car & Two Wheeler Insurance
- Browse & get India‚Äôs most popular bike & car insurance
- Buy/renew your car & bike Insurance in less than 10 minutes

Other Insurance
- PA Insurance: Insure yourself against accidents & disablement
- Travel Insurance: Get international travel insurance for business & leisure trips
- Shop Insurance: Insure your shop against fire, theft, natural calamities and burglaries.

PhonePe Lending

Get pre-approved personal loans ready to be disbursed into your bank account through seamless & digital loan onboarding journey.

Repayment Period: 6 - 36 Months
Maximum APR: 30.39%

Example:
Loan Amount: ‚Çπ1,00,000
Tenure: 12 months
Rate of Interest: 24.49% per annum
Processing Fee: ‚Çπ2,500 (2.5%)
GST on Processing Fee: ‚Çπ450
Total Interest: ‚Çπ13,756.27
EMI: ‚Çπ9,479.69
Maximum APR: 30.39%
Amount Disbursed: ‚Çπ97,050
Total Repayment Amount: ‚Çπ1,13,756.27

We offer loans from some of India's biggest lenders - Aditya Birla, Piramal, IDFC First, L&T Finance, and Credit Saison India.

Mutual Funds & Investments App
- Liquid Funds: Get higher returns than savings bank
- Tax-Saving Funds: save up to ‚Çπ46,800 in tax & grow your investment
- Super Funds: Achieve financial goals with expert help on our app
- Equity Funds: High growth products curated as per risk appetite
- Debt Funds: Get stable returns for investments without any lock-in period
- Hybrid Funds: Get a balance of growth & stability
- Buy or Sell 24K Pure Gold: Assured 24K purity, build gold savings on our app

Recharge Mobile, DTH
- Recharge Prepaid Mobile Numbers like Jio, Vodafone, Airtel etc.
- Recharge DTH like Tata Sky, Airtel Direct, Sun Direct, Videocon etc.

Bill Payment
- Pay Credit Card Bills
- Pay Landline Bills
- Pay Electricity Bills
- Pay Water Bills
- Pay Gas Bills
- Pay Broadband Bills

Buy PhonePe Gift Cards
- Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline & online outlets and across the PhonePe app.

Manage your refunds
- Manage & track refunds from your favorite shopping websites on PhonePe.
For more details, Visit www.phonepe.com

Permissions for App and reasons
SMS: to verify Phone number for registration
Location: a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions
Contacts: for phone numbers to send money to and numbers to recharge
Camera: to scan QR code
Storage: to store scanned QR code
Accounts: to pre-populate email ID while signing up
Call: to detect single vs dual sim & let user choose
Microphone: to carry out KYC video verification
summary: Secure UPI, Money Transfer, Recharge, Bill Payment, Mutual Fund, Gold, Insurance

scraped_reviews.content: I know I'm not the first person to give this feedback but the new UI is a disaster. I don't know what you did in the background and if it was a tech stack upgrade but it spoiled everything. Using the app without the dark mode is the most unpleasant experience. The previous version itself was amazing and we all got used to it very well. As a user I don't see a need for a new UI. You have tried to fix something that was not broken. Please bring back the old UI.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Balasubramanian, we hear you! We‚Äôre working on improving the UI based on user feedback to make it more seamless. Dark mode will be rolled out by the end of the week. We appreciate your patience and support! ‚àûZB

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using PhonePe for quite some time now. Recently I had a situation where money from an unknown ID was transferred into my account. The unknown person was calling me constantly for the return. I had no way of knowing if it was spam or not. I tried to raise a ticket but there was no option for this. I tried calling customer support multiple times but there was a recorded conversation without any option for these situations. This is frustrating and very bad service.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Gayatri. This is not the experience we want you to have. You can always reach out to us via the PhonePe help section by tapping on the "?" icon or via this link: https://support.phonepe.com with relevant details. You can also call us at 080-68727374 or 022-68727374, Monday to Sunday (24 hours). ‚àûPD

scraped_reviews.content: UPI payment was introduced to make swift payments. But often transactions remain pending for several days and fail on certain banks. Also there is no option to transfer to a different bank account from Phone Pe wallet. No customer care phone number available as well. In case of emergency you have to still depend on chat response which takes up to 48 hours.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Krishnendu,

It is our consistent endeavor to provide the best of our services. However, if you have faced any issue, please feel free to contact us via message/email to support@phonepe.com. We will be more than happy to assist you. 

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: An issue I face once in a while is it it says paid but recipient doesn't get confirmation and I get message from bank it is debited. Naturally the recipient would go by his phone not mine. It happened twice once with Uber Auto and other with cab driver at railway station when I was rushing to catch a train. They were frustrating experiences. Another persisting issue of late is when try to log out for security reasons it hangs. Otherwise by and large I'm satisfied with this App.

To everyone. PhonePe, is best in quick transactions. It supports multiple banks, does task such as monthly electric bill, insurance, travels, loans etc. & Now to developer, please look for the autopay system. it's incovinient at the time. There are not many instructions in app to educate peoples about autopay. And even I don't know. The subscription plan I thought I canceled was not canceled, somehow my money was deducted. Later I found manage autopay option came after money started deducting.

Phonepe SIP Gold Scheme is very good for saving of poor people, But this is okay if there is a minimal difference between the buying price and the selling price of gold. On the contrary, there is a large difference, which can cause a lot of loss. ( The charges are too high.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Lenin. Thank you for your feedback and hear your concern. The price of gold includes GST when purchased, but excludes charges when sold. The prices on PhonePe are based on real-time commercial bullion market rates. Contact us via PhonePe app help section for any queries. ‚àûJB

scraped_reviews.content: biometric completely stopped working even after uninstalling and reinstalling the app multiple times also complaint to the customer care but they have no clue hello team, thank you for your response I have reached out to your team, and all they can give is a general trouble steps. you do understand that my UPI is not secure. i have uninstalled and reinstalled the app twice
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Rahul. We‚Äôre sorry for the inconvenience. Kindly open your app and tap on your profile, you will get a 'security' option, click on that and change your setting for 'Biometric & screen lock'. If the issue still persist please feel free to connect with us via the Help Section by tapping on the "?" icon for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: The app interference is simple,which makes it easy to use. There are a lot of good things about this app which make it useful but most of the time when there is a large crowd or poor connection of the network it fails to do the payments while the alternative apps do the payments payments. And please add a section for note so that we can write what the payment was for, It's really helpful.

Hi Team, When we scan and pay for ATM withdrawals, we get a success message screen for the transaction. Post that it is observed that we can't navigate back or anywhere else inside the app. We will have to close the app entirely to navigate to different section inside the app. This issue is for Android 11 device. Hope this bug will be fixed in upcoming updates, thanks!

Hello ‚àûJB, Thank you very much for your response and suggestions. I have cleared the cache, reinstalled the app, and updated it, but unfortunately, the message is still not sending. I would greatly appreciate it if you could kindly look into this and provide further assistance. Thank you, Antony
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Antony. We apologies for any inconvenience caused. Please raise a ticket by tapping the "?" on your PhonePe app home screen so that we can check what went wrong. ‚àûPD

scraped_reviews.content: a great app . but there is a problem if I send money to someone via phone no then i cannot remove them from the "payments & chats" section i think there should be an option to hide someone in "payment &chat" bcz we have to pay to random people sometimes and it's annoying seeing there name on top. it was very annoying for me. Edit: I don‚Äôt want the transaction history to be deleted ‚Äî I just wish there was an option to hide people in the ‚ÄúPayments & Chats‚Äù section.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Vipul. Thank you for reaching out. We apologize for the inconvenience. Your feedback will be forwarded to the relevant team for review. Any updates will be communicated to you through the app. Please don't hesitate to contact us via the help section by clicking on this "?" icon if you need any further assistance. ‚àûYR

scraped_reviews.content: The app is very good and works smoothly, but I have one concern after the latest update. Now it is compulsory to use App Lock for PhonePe, and without it we cannot use or make transactions through the PhonePe wallet. This feature is inconvenient because when we are in a hurry to make payments at a shop, it causes delays. First, the app gets stuck for a moment, and then we have to enter the password, which makes the process time-consuming. My humble request is to please remove the compulsory App

In recent days the biometric isn't working properly. the app doesn't ask for biometric at all even after re-enabling the security option or restarting the phone. seems to be a glitch from the app. it logins directly which isn't a good way for such an app. note: restarting the app, clearing the cache, uninstalling and reinstalling everything was done. still no use, it doesn't work the way it used to. I can't raise a support ticket as well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Srinivas. We're here to assist you. Please get in touch with our customer support team by tapping the "?" icon on your PhonePe app home screen. They will help address your concerns. You can also contact us at 080-6872-7374 or 022-6872-7374 anytime, on all days. ‚àûZB

scraped_reviews.content: I had a very disappointing experience. The customer support is extremely difficult to access, and there seems to be no proper resolution process when a customer faces an issue. Both chat and call support are unresponsive and ineffective, making the overall experience highly unsatisfactory.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Payal. We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. This is not the kind of service we strive to provide. To assist you better, we request you to raise a ticket through the PhonePe Help section by tapping on the (?) icon. Our team will review your concern and provide the necessary support promptly. ‚àûDR

scraped_reviews.content: I am never buying policies from phonePe anymore,i have had a very bad experience. I even urge the people not to buy it. I paid a sum of 12k in vehicle insurance but got only 5k back . It was later found out that to make the price of the policy low, like a bait, the NCB was kept very high. Moreover i waited for more than 2 months to get back the amount. it was a vehicle insurance luckily had it been health insurance i would have faced the deadliest scams ever.the care people dont even bother.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! It seems like you had an unpleasant experience with us. Please raise a ticket by tapping the "?" on your PhonePe app home screen so that we can check what went wrong. ‚àûPD

scraped_reviews.content: Avoid using this app if possible. There is hardly any support available if you experience any problems in the app. You won't get an actual person to help you on customer care numbers and with the chat they don't bother much to help you solve the problem. At least with regards to customer support, other UPI apps are quite decent! Edit: To the responder, please elaborate as to which options in both these numbers will get me in contact with an actual human. I have only received automated responses
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Sanjeet. This is not the experience we want you to have. Please share the ticket ID with us. We will check the details and assist you further. ‚àûMI

scraped_reviews.content: showing alert as you have received the scratch card but not ableOkay, so I got a notification that I won a scratch card, which was exciting! But then I couldn't actually *find* the darn thing anywhere on the app. I spent ages searching, and even checked all the usual places, but nothing! Now, a few days later, it says the scratch card has expired, what a bummer. Seriously, what's the point of winning if you can't even use it?! to find it where it is. after few days showing as expired
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Kartheek. Sorry to hear your scratch card isn't visible. Please reinstall the app and check your rewards section. If the issue persists, please connect with us via the Help Section by tapping on the "?" icon for further assistance. ‚àûRN

scraped_reviews.content: There was some sort of glitch in a code while switching to a second account it was showing all the details of the logged out account. I think while logging out and in between two accounts on the same phone there was a database synchronize issue. Need to work on it. This should not happen as it will lose the security and authenticity of the users data.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jyoti. Sorry to hear that. We at PhonePe prioritize our customers' safety. Please allow us to check this for you. Connect with us via the Help Section by tapping on the "?" icon for further assistance. ‚àûRN

scraped_reviews.content: Phn Pay is a very convenient and user-friendly app for making quick payments. The interface is simple and easy to use, even for beginners. Transactions are fast, and I haven‚Äôt faced any major issues so far. It also supports multiple payment options, which makes it very useful. I would recommend adding more cashback offers to make it even better. Overall, a reliable and smooth payment app.

PhonePe is a very useful and convenient app, but it lacks one important feature ‚Äî the option to permanently delete an account. Every user should have the right to remove their account and personal data easily if they decide to stop using the app. Please consider adding this feature in future updates. Apart from that, the app‚Äôs interface and services are quite good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Thanks for your positive review, Rahul. We're glad you find our app useful. We have also noted your valuable suggestion regarding an option for permanent account deletion for the users. This feedback has been shared with our team for their consideration. We appreciate you taking the time to share this with us. ‚àûBV

scraped_reviews.content: loved this app, it has most of the features. yes could be better, because sometimes checking your bank balance gets restricted temporarily, for absolutely no reason, but after 1-2 hr this technical fault gets solved automatically aswell..ü´∂üèªü´¥üèª

Recently I recently paid an amount at a place, but it was in processing. Because of the processing, I had to make a cash payment. When I checked the payment three hours later, I found that the payment had been processed successfully. title: DeepSeek - AI Assistant
description:

Contact us:
Twitter: @deepseek_ai
