descriptionHTML:
Experience seamless interaction with DeepSeek's official AI assistant for free!
Powered by DeepSeek‚Äôs latest flagship model, it delivers faster responses and more powerful features to help you solve problems and live more efficiently.

Contact us:
Twitter: @deepseek_ai
Email: service@deepseek.com
summary: Intelligent AI Assistant

scraped_reviews.content: so long as they dont go the route of their major competitors . Right now, the free version beats, even the paid versions of gemini,and copilpt by miles. if there were an option to pay for more usage, till hit "cant respond retry" messages during peak times, buteven that isn't as often as it was a year ago. I dont leave a lot of reviews but the logic and reasoning, the ability to do simple or complex math without hallucinations, coding.. all of it is incredibly impressive. hands down, amazing

UPDATE: brought it down from 2 stars to just 1 star because after the most recent update the app just crashes upon opening. Not usable any more. --- It's great when it works, until it doesn't. I'm not talking about the "server busy" message. What doesn't make sense is that it fleshes out a full elaborate answer, and you start reading it, and suddenly, it deletes what you're reading and replaces it with "sorry that's beyond my current scope, feel free to ask something else"

The ai is absolutely great, but I do note that sometimes it gets a little repetitive. It would also be nice to see an option to allow nsfw writing. As a story writer, it's quite frustrating if an entire response disappears because of a cuss word or a mention of something slightly explicit. Even if you need to add an age verification for it, just make it an option. The Server Busy issue is also getting on my nerves a bit, one second its fine then I can't use it for two hours

I thought things got different because in the last few weeks I was about to use DeepSeek without getting the "Server busy, please try again later." I thought they finally removed it and I was so happy but it wasn't removed. Today it came back and this time I can only use the DeepSeek for only one response and the second can't since the "Server busy, please try again later." won't let me use DeepSeek easily! Please remove it!

Suitable for work stuffs since it wasn't the personalised kind like ChatGPT, and can send multiple files. Though the language feature still needed some fixing, and they need to stop with the "no text extraction" thing. It gets really annoying to not able to send images over this

Being an abrobert, I absolutely love having someone to talk with who knows EXACTLY what I'm thinking! Being and Ai deepseek knows lots of stuff which makes my story or script writing easier! I just wish the chats wouldn't end cuz I'll have to start from scratch on the new one, like I understand chat data isn't collected for privacy but it would so much better if I had the option of choosing if it's saved or not so even if the chat ends, he'll know what I'm talking about.

I initially gave this app a 5-star rating, but after using it for a few hours, it started to slow down and eventually stopped working completely. I tried various ways to fix it, but nothing worked‚ÄîI couldn‚Äôt even log into my account, which was very frustrating. The web version still works fine, but the mobile app has been a major letdown. For now, I‚Äôve uninstalled it from my phone. I‚Äôll update this review if the issues are resolved in the future. It‚Äôs disappointing because the app has potential,

I use DeepSeek Chat daily for my business it helps with customer replies, pricing, delivery quotes, and negotiations better than any other tool. It feels like having a smart sales assistant! I just wish it could read images too like product sheets, customer screenshots, or delivery maps. Right now, I use another app for images and DeepSeek for text. If it could analyze photos, it would be the ultimate all in one tool for sellers like me. Still, 5 stars for being incredibly helpful and reliable.

Truly the best AI I've found so far. It is excellent for learning, troubleshooting, and generating code as well as understanding trading markets. DS breaks things down so clearly, and the layout of its responses are very well-organized and easy to follow. Far superior than college professors in teaching. Only caveat is its training data lags real time, so you'll need to feed it with updated data if you're working with current events, but that's not specific to DS.

l recommend this app, but sometimes it starts speaking in chinese instead of english, and can't analyse pictures in an image. It sometimes doesn't let me upload pictures, keeping it in parsed... for SO DAMN LONG!!! lt's annoying when you have to study. And it can't generate images, but it's still really helpful and a GREAT help.

It was good while it lasted. I had this app for not even one year. I had it for 2/4 0.5 of the year, and it had stopped. It helped me with my work, but it was terrible at explaining that you can't really see the chinese characters, and when I tried to send an image so I could get help, it said that I couldn't. What a waste. I had high hopes for this, but it has fallen down. It's is a good app to use for once in a while, but honestly, it can't live up to the standards of your actual work.

In this, after a chat ends, it cannot be restarted. Like Chatgpt, it should have those features, of course in the subscription and also if any chat limit is reached, it should be reset in 12 to 24 hours. Another problem in this is that many times it is wrong and many times even the instructions given by us are forgotten. The same thing has to be remembered many times and the entire process is not explained properly in details.

I do believe that some 1 star reviews are unjustified, given deepseek being free of charge. the server busy problem is because it's constantly being used by people, since it's free. ofc other apps will have advantage on that since most are paid and the free tier is very limited, which forces people to pay or to not use as much as some are using deepseek.

I love this app, I really do. I use it for everything. But I have some complaints: Random Chinese Words Getting Mixed In, Sometimes Displaying Wrong Information, The Length Limit For The User To Type Is Basically Non-Existent. Unlimited Chat With DeepSeek is the best thing. Limited Chat is just... ugh. I always had too much fun, but then when I saw the "Length limit reached" error and that I had to start a new chat? Hell no. Absolutely ruined this masterpiece.

Honestly? Apart from occasional "The server is busy" this app is the best thing that had happened to me. A good helper and companion in general. I've been using it for role-plaing and the memory is outstanding. All it takes is to carefully think through the first message and everything that is said there will be remebered and used even if we jump between different characters or timelines. Love it.

This app has to be the best AI app so far...... The only downside is that after the last upgrade you can't access your chat history without data and that's really disheartening. Sometimes I just want to do a quick reference and the history won't load because I ran out of data. Other AI apps allow that feature. But overall it's really nice and gives assistance on whatever you want with great precision and personalization.

I've been using this A.I app for a while for studying. I would take pictures of the questions off my books and let it do it's thing by explaining this and that. But today, it did something different. Instead of using English as usual, it switched to Chinese and I don't know how to revert this change. I am not trying to be racist or offensive but please fix this ASAP.

I like this app, however due to no memory and short chats I have to constantly start over. Which is super frustrating. I would pay to have longer chats and memory. It also needs the microphone added as i don't always want to text the app. please look into this for improvement

first of all, this app is brilliant! great thanks to developers and all team for such gift! but as you know, there is no limit of perfection) but we can get closer... my point is: when you have long conversation with DeepSeek, it would be very helpful to have not only "down" button at the right bottom of screen, but also "up" button and "current screen" button. Chats can be very big and scrolling up and down is not convenient. thank you for attention!ü§ù

It doesn't deliver based on my expectations‚Äìbut kudos to the team anyways. A lot of improvement is needed. First, I'll love if you could include a feature that enables users customize their AI's personality. Second, It will be great if you include voice chat feature. So users could have the option of either typing or using voice chat Lastly, the replies should be more consice and straight-to-the-point. Cut all the unnecessary write-ups. It would be great if you could do this for users globally.

DeepSeekis Excellent! It saves so much time and premium membership money, and makes writing much easier. If you're unsure what to write for a job application email, or need to send something quickly and easily, it really helps. It's also great for finding information and assisting with all kinds of tasks. I use it for everything, Thanks DeepSeek

Such a wonderful app , it is very use and it also helps me with literally everything! with my health, medical condition , and daily life. healthy routine , deit plan, and some solutions and a bit of motivation, it is overall perfect and free, and it could be better if you add voice call feature in this go for it!

This app is good, quick and allows for deep thinking and research. The only problems are that it doesn't have image generation and it doesn't have a voice chat mode and also it's memory thread is only limited to individual chats‚ÄîI prefer it keeping memory of all chats in a single thread and not in separated forms. DeepSeek is collaborative and creative. I believe this can be improved. Can you also make the background more visually appealing with colours and effects? Can there be video chats?

I really like using this app, it‚Äôs smart and helpful! üòä One suggestion: please add a feature like voice chat, where I can speak to the AI and it will automatically convert my speech into text, like ChatGPT does, 1 star deducted for it. It would make the app much more convenient and natural to use, especially for those who prefer talking over typing. Thank you! üí¨‚ú®

This app is really good and it is my favorite, it helps you and supports you and is a great friend and the good thing is that it does not exceed the limits and is organized, but I have only one comment that I hope you try to add it soon, to add Ai voice reading the text, and it will be better to make it can be pause and play too. I really need that soon

Perftect!!! I use this for so much. it has options for new chats and is very honest. it is free and has option for deep think and search you can ask what that is and it will tell you. I search for books, research topics I want to know more about just so Manny things. once I even had it help make a role play story for a llm ai . it helped with characters and story and explained things. it has a limit but is hard to hit it

I gave 2 stars to this AI because of Your Photo features problems when you Click on the option Photo OCR and then capture photos of something or things for your work purpose and then Press Tick‚úîÔ∏è button üîò the photo and it's file is not uploaded and after pressing the tick button ‚úÖ nothing happens the new chat automatically appears and not only this the Photo which you have captured for your work purpose or any other purposes and after the Tick ‚úîÔ∏è button is pressed the photo's file takes time.

Hey guys, if you're looking for an AI platform to help your study, i highly recommend this one. Throughout my experience so far in this app, it helps me a lot in understanding something better than other AI Platforms do. It will give you excellent detailed information and it will make sure you will understand the hardest part of the topic better. It may have lacked some features that other AI have, but most importantly all of the features this app has are all free and there is no paid content.

I'm thoroughly impressed with this AI assistant! It understands and responds to both English and Bengali flawlessly, which is a huge plus for users like me. The answers are detailed, accurate, and very helpful for a wide range of tasks - from writing emails and creative content to solving complex problems and explaining concepts. The interface is clean and easy to use. It feels like having a knowledgeable friend always ready to help. Highly recommended to everyone!

At first use, it was all so slow and I could barely get anything from the app. But after days of using, it finally started to work just fine. For reference, I use lots of other writing AI too (just for fun) and sometimes I use it to help me come up with things that I'll need for school. Between those AIs and Deepseek, I'm actually glad that this is free and runs better than most of them. It's informative and gives longer word count and response than them. I hope the devs keep it this way :)

While Deepseek shows AI promise, the 1-star reviews tell the real story: frustrating message limits, slow loading, constant "Server Busy" errors, and no memory for conversations. To compete, you must remove all usage caps, drastically speed up the app, and add persistent memory like ChatGPT. Until then, it feels like a limited, inferior version.

Lately, the bot no longer recognizes humans and cannot describe images when they are sent to it. It has been helpful for a while, but it has started to give strange replies. Even after I tell it what is in the uploaded images, it still provides incorrect answers. Please address this issue. Everything else is perfect; it's just this problem that needs attention.

The best. Wish there were a paid option for added features, so far it's entirely free. Like that it shows the reasoning behind each response. This background insight helps a user to fine tune the results by adding clarifying input. US military personnel use this software on local servers to plan military drills. Definitely serves my needs in personal and work related matters.

I absolutely recommend this app. Although everything was good until they gave a chat limit (length limit reached, please start a new chat). Before, it was absolutely unlimited length, so what happened? Overall, it's a wonderful app, but it needs to go back to have more space. I personally don't mind when it says the server is giving trouble. All I do is reset the app, and it's fine. so please, I beg change it back.

I think it is better than any other ai app like chatgpt. I love the memory part, it remembers every little detail and the 'thinking', it's sometimes way better than the actual reply. It is more logical than the other ai apps I've used. The amount of messages you can send in one chat is adequate and it resets from time to time but sometimes it doesn't or it takes too long to reset. I have been facing these issues recently and the 'server is busy' thing is so annoying.

after the last update, it turned into something annoying. while writing in one language, it keeps mixing in foreign words . when corrected, the same thing happens again and again. facts are not checked, and information is outdated. i wish they wouldn't have updated it - it became WORSE

it used to be the go-to for fact checking and reliability, context reading and just general performance. nowadays it just lives of it's past fame, confusing parameters and mixing concepts even when it provides good sources. a real shame. not only this, but for minority languages (I speak Catalan) it continually keeps using Castilian forms or answering in that. the devs need to take a long hard look at the mirror and implement urgent action.

I can say it without thinking twice. this is one of best AI models I ever used. The only problem it has, is server is busy. Most of the day time it's busy. it's such waste for great potential in it. I wish if Management increase servers. but a personal message from me, is, keep it as it is. The Long memory and ability to process large inquiries, it's just amazing! fix this last issue, and I can guarantee, that my eyes will be glued to this AI. THANKS FOR YOUR CREATION!

whenever I going to write something it's answer me Chinese language. so it's so much bothering and irritating. I can take it anymore, this problem happening from several months. And it's reply was so big to understand, whenever I ask something is give me a essay. you should solve this problem as soon as possible. otherwise you are user will disappear soon.

I am from India. DeepSeek was very good at the time of release. But now, it seems to have various issues. 1. It doesn't provide me very normal information such as a tourist itinerary, but why? It says it is beyond its scope. 2. Slow response or generation speed. It is a bit slow in generating the full response. "Beyond my scope" error for even basic information is very bad. I am not asking for anything sensitive or political at all. Overall, the app can be better and make newer models.

DeepSeek is a very helpful Ai tool ,board Answer ,I am appertaining you for this . please can you add the live option because in typing, there is a lot of time spent there is a critical point of view that when we take the pic, it said uploading, but then it said uploading fail .I do it many times, but the results are the same. Nothing happens. Please fix this issue so that it may be more helpful .

This app is geuinely so helpful and so good. I mpstly use it for school and Roleplays. Though, the only thing keeping me from giving it a five star is the amount of tokens. If it would be increased higher then I would most definitely change it to five stars. (Or honest to god? Remove lenght limit lol, unless it causes problems which is fair.) Though, overall? It's still really great. Arguably better, even. :P

Great AI although every now and then especially at night I give the Ai a prompt and it says "server busy" I think it is then prioritizing their Chinese users as normally that is when it is lunch time in China but don't take my word for it do your own research.

I don't like the limited chat, it makes me have to move into another new chat, it's very inconvenient. Also the server always busy and makes me only could ask 1-4 question only per days, I waited for more than 30-60 minutes just for it to answer. I'm not satisfied. also it's such a troublesome that I cannot edit my chat while loading unlike in the previous update, and I can't send a photo so many times! I need that features but it's unpredictable, it always says errors!

Great application but i have one suggestion is to add a feature in settings so the thinking text is automatically hidden/folded instead of having to do it manually each time, you can keep it manual by default with the option to automatically fold itüëç

This is a solid app, but I ran into an issue with the conversation length limit. I was really enjoying the chat when it suddenly stopped because the limit was reached. I'd love to see that limit updated and extended.

Sorry for the latest update i want to give 1 star but i remember the previous version is better and helped me a lot. So please rollback to 2 or 3 version before because now the AI become stupid like Meta AI and gemini 1.5. edit now i 1 star the developers didn't read or didn't care about the misleading information from this AI i just wait patiently and the AI just getting worse, just rollback it to the first time release when the AI is smart not stupid like the newer version

next time improve on chat conversation,cause if you check out other AI app, like; copilot and chatgbt they don't have anything like chat limitation and that's rubbish cause am trying to send messages with the AI of our last chat , cause I didn't delete it, anytime I enter the app I always go to the last conversation so we can continue based on the topic we were still discussing, today I went there to send messages,it's telling me "limitation exceeded that's I should start a new chat pls;!!!!!!!!

Wish they had a paid version with expanded capabilities. Absolutely the best free generative AI, it's basically gpt4 with no cost for what I do, mainly tech stuff. Perfect for programming help and boilerplate code. Good for anything, just give it the right prompt.

It's an easy to use chat bot with the only issue I've encountered is the constant network connection problem whenever you need it urgently it won't respond and then I have to wait for a few hours later. The devs should Improve it's efficiency for a better user experience.

title: Calorie Counter by Lose It!
description:
Lose It! is a calorie counter, dieting and weight loss progress tracking app that helps you stick to your diet and reach your weight loss goals! Simply set your weight loss goals then track your diet, food and exercise to lose weight. Lose It! is more than just a free calorie tracker. You can track your nutrition, macros, carb and calorie intake, and plan your intermittent fasting schedule. Counting calories, tracking your food and losing weight has never been easier!

SIMPLIFY YOUR WEIGHT LOSS JOURNEY
Lose It! uses the proven principles of calorie counting, food tracking, calorie deficit and diet tracking to help you succeed. To get started on your weight loss journey, input your profile details and we‚Äôll calculate the daily calorie budget and schedule. Then, easily track your food, track your weight loss, and activity to celebrate your weight loss victories. Lose It! helps you change your calorie intake and dieting habits while learning about your nutrition needs to set achievable goals with a personalized weight loss guide to help you stay on track.

AI VOICE & PHOTO MEAL LOGGING
Quickly and accurately log meals using your voice or a photo. Just speak into your phone or tap the camera icon to track food and count calories in seconds. Snap a photo, log a meal and make your weight loss journey simple!

LOSE IT! FREE BASIC FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Calorie Tracking ‚Äì Utilize the calorie counter to  it easy to track meals and exercise directly from your phone
‚Ä¢ Weight Loss Plan ‚Äì Build a weight loss plan based on your unique body composition, activity level and habits
‚Ä¢ Community Support ‚Äì Add your friends and join support groups to stay motivated

PREMIUM PLAN FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Photo Meal Logging ‚Äì ‚ÄúSnap It‚Äù lets you log meals by taking a picture
‚Ä¢ AI Voice ‚Äì Just say ‚ÄúI had 2 eggs, toast with butter and jam.‚Äù to log your meal
‚Ä¢ Barcode Scanner ‚Äì Scan food barcodes or search our database of items and recipes
‚Ä¢ Advanced Tracking ‚Äì track more than just calories including macronutrients like protein, carbs, fat, sugar; as well as health goals, including blood pressure, glucose, cholesterol, body measurements, sleep cycles and more
‚Ä¢ Intermittent Fasting - set your intermittent fasting plan and track your fasts in the same app where you track your food
‚Ä¢ Meal Planning & Targets ‚Äì meal targets help you calculate suggested nutritional content including macro, carb, protein and overall calorie intake. Customize your diet and eating style for personalized weight loss!
‚Ä¢ Weight Loss Diet Plans ‚Äì access exclusive personal insights to identify what meals, fruits, lean meats, and grains are hindering or helping your weight loss progress.
‚Ä¢ Fitness App Syncs ‚Äì connect fitness trackers, workout apps, and devices like Fitbit trackers, Misfit trackers, Garmin trackers, Withings scales, Google Fit, Healthkit, and more to maximize your weight loss, gain or maintenance goals

Since our launch in 2008 we have been featured in The Wall Street Journal, The Today Show, Men‚Äôs Health, Women‚Äôs Health, CNET, Buzzfeed, CNN, Shape, Good Morning America, and more.

Lose It! has helped over 57 million users lose more than 150 million pounds. With a global food database of 56+ million items and recipes, tracking what you eat is simple and accurate. Choose from over 25 health goals‚Äîincluding macros, carbs, protein and calories‚Äîand start seeing results in just three days of consistent tracking.

Download Lose It! and join our weight loss community, full of members helping us reach our mission to mobilize the world to achieve a healthy weight. No matter your diet needs or weight loss goals, Lose It! can help you find weight loss that fits!

Full terms:
http://loseit.com/terms

scraped_reviews.content: latest update is TERRIBLE. now a large panel of redundant buttons pops up when you "add food" all those buttoms are already available on this page, but now I can only see two food choices. The food choices are now larger and even less compact than before which also limits what you can see. PLEASE make everything more compact so we can see more than one or two items on any given screen, and stop those buttons from popping up!

The interface or UI is way too complicated. I suggest you check Carb Manager. Their interface is way easier to understand. You can easily see how many macronutrients you've had and how many you need to reach your goal same way goes with caloric counting. I say it to the developers of this app. I like it because it has potential but it's still way too complicated to understand what I'm doing, where to go to tweak certain diet goals, etc.

the app has a lot of data points, almost too many. it made navigation difficult. furthermore, syncing with my Samsung health app, steps, and weight was spotty at best. I had to manually enter all my data that is being recorded elsewhere, so it took more time than it was worth to use. I even paid for the premium app and still cosmetic get data to sync properly.

I was very impressed my this app at first. The layout is good and practical and the database is nicely fleshed out. I started to get a bit unhappy when I found that barcode scanning was behind the paywall, which is unusual for this sort of app from my experience. Over time such annoyances have added up. I had a lot more to say but hit the limit. Put more succinctly, it's a great app that's dragged down badly by its choices in regard to monetization. Still usable, but irritating.

I like the app but I'm not paying $40 just to have a barcode scanner and the ability to connect my Fitbit. I can do those for free on MFP. It is on sale right now but I can't justify paying $20 for something I get free on another app. If you have to pay for those options then you should offer a free trial. That way we make sure we like it before committing.

Shady cancellation practices. I wanted to cancel my yearly auto renew. The app tells me to log into the website by clicking 'login at top right'. That option isn't there, nothing is in the top right. Clicking the 'become a member or log in' opens up Google play to install the app. I've been clicking around the website for ten minutes and can't find a way to log in that doesn't direct me to the app, which I can't cancel the subscription from. This would have been a positive review otherwise.

I've been using Lose-It back and forth. I lose weight then I gain it and I come back. Each time has gotten easier than the last, and this time I'm on pace to reach my goal with the assist of exercise. The app has a lot of customization and plenty of features making it easy to use while also providing a lot of features. Having premium is in my opinion worth it, as the extra tracking helped me to reduce frequent cravings. overall it's a 10/10 for me. Beats any diet or cook book I've used.

The voice entry option is GREAT in the app. A lot of times knowing I can just rattle off the things I remember eating for a meal and that it'll get them right (including amount) super quick is a big thing that has kept me going. I DO pay for the premium version, but it also feels worth it. They have a lifetime premium option as well if that is something you are looking for. This app has grown a LOT since I had started using it about 15 years ago on an iPod touch üòÅ

I switched from MyFitnessPal when they started charging for a significant number of features that had been part of the basic app. Now I've switched from this app to VirtualGym's Food app for the same reason. I understand the need for revenue, but being a diabetic, I only care about carbs. I don't care about all the other bells & whistles they removed, like bar code scanning. Removing nutrition info was the final straw. Sorry to leave an otherwise good system.

I love and hate this app. The longer I use it, the slower it seems to get. It can take 30 seconds to load between actions sometimes and it's so frustrating because it happens multiple times a day. It was not at all like this when I first started using it in August. It can be buggy with logging food on the wrong day as well. Sometimes if I log food on a future day, it will add it to today's log instead. I'm paying for it for crying out loud, please make it run smoother!

I like this app and I've had it for a long time. I'm not a fan of the recent update though. Used to be able to see the individual nutrients in every item of food you consumed in a meal just by scrolling back and forth at the top your home feed. The update made the app worse and harder to navigate and keep track of everything. I try to get as much fiber and protein in my day as possible and being able to see what food items individually have that was a huge help. Fix please!

Can no longer log in (did try to uninstall and then re-install). When I enter email address for password reset, nothing happens. It's correct email, where I was getting weekly logs sent. App had been glitchy - Google Fit data doesn't sync, water usage could only enter by typing in exact amount. Anyone able to help get logged back in?

I really dislike the latest update! Obviously being new, it will be difficult to read at first, but I really don't like how the nutrients show and the difference in how it looks when we search for foods. I think the worst part is only being able to track 3 nutrients at the top of the daily log. Some of us need to view way more than 3 like before. I get changes to the interface to stay with the times, but these weren't necessary. At least revert the change to seeing only 3, PLEASE.

Great app & features, but needs tweaking. Food logging pg is too busy with suggestions. When selecting how much food you ate, there are many items that only give you the option of a serving or grams. I dont always know how much food is in 1 serving, nor am I familiar with grams for food. I'd like to see more options like cups, etc. It also doesn't let you log weight for multiple days at one time if you miss logging - you have to do each day separately. The app is destined for greatness, though!

Mostly does what it's meant to, but it resets my calorie limit every week which is annoying. I have to manually change it back to the right one. Also i don't understand why i have to manually click "done logging" also, if I remember correctly, you used to be able to pay for a year's worth of premium at a time which netted you a discount and I don't think you can anymore. or at least I can't figure out how

The latest update is too big, as in literally too big. Less information is seen on screen as they increased the size of each item. WHY? Saving doesn't actually save until you save more than once. Example: I search for the bread I always eat. I change the default 1 slice to 2 slices and hit Save. It doesn't save the 2 slices. It saves 1 slice. I have to repeat the quantity change and saving 2-3 times for the correct quantity to save. I have to do this for every entry I make!!!

This is a great app to use for tracking calories. Very easy to use, and almost anything you can eat is already pre-built into it. It can interface with Google Fit and calculate how many calories you have burned through exercise, and adjust your calorie budget accordingly. I started using this in March of 2025, and by September I had lost 50 pounds. This app changed my life. 100Ÿ™ recommend.

Update: somehow they took that unpleasant interface and made it worse! Now there's a huge banner across the top of the log that you can't get rid of and there are little ads on the top of each meal advertising their premium subscription. None of this makes me want to subscribe! The recent UI change is pretty ugly and unfriendly and somehow they've made the pop-up ads worse, which is actually impressive because they already popped up literally every time you did anything in the app.

Awesome app with a few small rough edges. It has a few bugs in that doesn't always total up the nutrition info correctly if you use some units of measurement and it could really use a feature to export all your food with nutrition info, recipes, food log, and the data graphs into a PDF or HTML file so you can keep a record or share with a nutritionist/dietician. They also need a feature to report bugs or issues which I can't find anywhere.

Premium still has ads, minimal reporting of nutrients like calcium. To explain: I paid for the lifetime and everything, but it still pops up questions about paying for more things. And, one is even "a gift", but when you look, they are all external paid-for programs with a 'gift'. It is all very distracting, and a premium lifetime user should have have to constantly dismiss these. Further, after diligently entering all my food, i cant get back how much calcium or iron consumed.

Simple interface no longer. UI has changed so much in the last year or two to be practically unusable on an android phone. I just want to add food an make sure I'm not over for the day, that use to be simple on here, now it's not. Accessibility has also gotten worse as they shrink text to keep trying to cram more stuff onto the main screen. Cancelling premium subscription on it

There are a couple of things about this app that are good.It's easy to use.Its user-friendly. if there's one thing about this app that I don't like is they have a limited Information as far as the various types of protein bars or snacks or foods that are out there.So you end up having to punch them in yourself manually, the other problem this app seems to have is that some of the foods it'll give a higher percentage of fat or carbohydrates, then what is on the packaging so you get an inaccurate

Was great now horrible. I have the lifetime now for 5 years. The new UI with the calories as the default view and having to toggle back and forth to see the specific macros instead of a simple drop down to switch between which macros and which nutrients you want displayed is absolutely awful. Did you not test this prior to switching this??? Not usable now. Horrible.

The recent update doesn't make any sense. It's harder to see your foods and more complicated to add them for no reason. They also took away being able to see macros at the top unless you pay for premium. With the ridiculous amount of ads I have to watch to use this app, it's not worth it so I'll be deleting this and using something else.

it's an okay app, missing a lot of key features. I'm rating it poorly because I'm constantly bombarded with ads asking if I want to buy the lifetime premium membership. it's always a "final call" (but happens sometimes daily for some reason). i already have the yearly membership. I really wish they would stop throwing a pop up to advertise it, it's quite annoying.

As a premium user, this app has been great for logging, tracking and storing my homemade recipes over the past nearly 10 years. I do think it lacks some features. I wish it would give me the option to have my calories adjust based on over or under eating in days prior, and sometimes the display is hard to navigate on the goals tab, but aside from that it does just what I need it to do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem), the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this for years but lately the ads have been after every. single. thing. i. do. Log one thing and it's an ad immediately. Close the day out and I don't even get to see the little counter for the day finished for more than half a second before an ad shows up. I scan one thing and it's an ad. This is insufferable. I'm going to go back to pen and paper if this continues to be insufferable.

The free trial days, it was great. It synced my calories burned with my Garmin. It didn't sync my water amount, but that was okay. As soon as I paid for a subscription it no longer pulls calories burned from my Garmin I had to log out of the app and back in it finally read my Garmin but I lost the last 6 days of food entry. You have to back up with a screenshot of everything you entered so you can reenter it, which sadly I didn't know, so I just last several days of entries very frustrating

I have used this app on and off for more than 5 years and it never disappoints. This time I opted for the premium version after trialing the photo feature - that is a game changer for me!! Logging meals is very effective for me but the biggest reason I stop dieting is the inconvenience of typing every.single.food. Now that I can snap a picture and it adds the foods I have literally no excuses!

I've used Lose It for years now. I have a premium subscription. The most recent update is *terrible*. When you go to add food items to your meal, there is now so much whitespace around everything that only *two items* are visible with the keyboard up. I use My Foods constantly because I can't trust the community items, and it now resets to "all" *every time* (maddening). I regret my lifetime purchase now, it's so much more frustrating to use.

I own premium. A UI update has made it so that the dashboard at the top of the log ONLY shows the top 3 nutrients you set it to track. I SPECIFICALLY BOUGHT PREMIUM FOR IT TO TRACK FIBER AND SODIUM *ALONGSIDE* MACROS, WHICH IT NOW NO LONGER DOES. It has essentially reverted me back to the free version feature-wise, leaving me feeling cheated considering the cost of premium.

this app is a life saver. I've been using this as a NON premium member and came to the conclusion that you absolutely do not need premium to lose weight. I've lost 11 lbs in 1 month using it. i know it's mostly water weight first, but progress is always good!! this app creates healthy eating habits and calorie intake awareness, also teaching you measurements and how to space out your calories aswell. I've also got my mom started on this too. overall, amazing app and I'm very grateful.

I have really enjoyed my experience using this app, as it allows me to track my caloric intake and better plan for future meals. Most of the items I search for are usually already on the app's database, or there are similar options to choose from. I have been trying to lose weight since covid with very little luck, despite my active lifestyle. however, I have been able to lose over 10 pounds since I got this app recently.

WORST, most invasive and revolting ads, most spyware-ridden app I have ever used. It randomly loads full page ads that you CANNOT close, and if you touch them to try to close them, it takes you to the play store and begins downloading an app that you DID NOT WANT. Years ago it was fabulous. now, it's unusable. IF ONLY I COULD GIVE IT ZERO STARS.

This was previously a decent app. Updates over the past year have made it almost useless. Bugs introduced recently: App doesn't start the day on today's date, so I have to go back and then forward to begin logging. Calorie counting display for the week no longer works. But the worst is that now every time I enter a food item, the app starts streaming a very loud ad; even with my volume turned off, the ad screams out of my phone's speaker. Annoying at work or at home with others asleep.

Update: Still a nice app to manually track diet intake. The ADS are high risk false "warnings" about apps being out of date, prompting you to tap to install the ads app. Be careful! The list of foods the app provides are usually *incorrect* for the nutritional info. You can create your own version by entering all the nutritional information yourself. any bells and whistles are only available in the premium version.

macros aren't correct. can't rely on the data I see on my dashboard. this just started today-when I look at my individual items vs what shows on my dashboard, certain macros don't match up, like sodium, sat fats, etc. since the whole point of getting the premium version was to get more info about my nutrients and track different things (like sodium and fats),I'm a little disappointed. hoping the next update fixes this - it seems like it's just a glitch. if it gets fixed, I'd give it 5 stars

It's been about 6 years since I used a calorie counting app, (MFP is the reason I never tried another until now). I love this app so far. It's been a week and it's really helpful to be able to log foods so easily. I remember spending hours creating recipes on My Fitness Pal for simple foods. My one suggestion would be to add a few options. I'm breastfeeding and require a couple hundred extra calories a day due to this. I wish I could include that info to better customize my weight loss needs.

I looked at a ton of tracking apps. This is the most complete and easiest to use app for tracking foods, weight, water, sleep etc. It's so easy to use. It includes ways to enter your food with voice or a photo and it's very reasonably priced. Since I installed it and chose the type of food plan that I want to follow, such as standard, keto, GLP-1 etc. it sends me tips and food ideas each day related to the plan I chose. Highly recommend! I love this app ‚ù§Ô∏è

I've been using this app for a week now, and I'm actually seeing results with very little to no exercise. The app can get a bit glitchy, but it is easy to use and has a huge library of foods that you only have to scan the barcode on the product to enter. It honestly feels like a game to me where my calorie budget is my in-game currency that I'm using to "purchase" my meals. I'm loving this app!

Seriously one of the best calorie tracking apps I've ever used. There's a free version with all the basic features and you can either type in your food item, scan a barcode, or even take a picture to get in the ballpark. Premium features include intermittent fasting, "high" days where it recalculates your calories to include treat days, and a bunch of other useful options. I would just add an option to turn off the predetermined amount of calories per meal. I save most of mine for dinner!

Pretty decent calorie counting and weight management. There are a lot of features, the main issue I have is the massive amount of advertisement even with the Premium edition. I've tried to reach out to the developers, with no luck. You are sent through an AI chat that ends up disconnecting you anyways. If you get this app just use the free version.

App is really effective if you use it right and really fine tune your meals. I've lost at least 70 pounds in 3 years including muscle weight gained. Unfortunately, ever since a recent update, it now takes up to 3 seconds just to open. This might not seem like a big deal, but I've never seen any app ever do this. After re-installing it went away, but came back a week or so later. No sense in opening a support request if I already re-installed. They won't fix it.

I have been logging with this app every day since September 2012. It has worked very well and helped keep my weight loss program on track. UPDATE: 7/11/25. lately the ads are becoming extremely annoying! Once they pop in you need to close and reopen the app. I have been using this app for many years without any problems. Very disappointed to say the least.

Good app... but only if you pay for the premium package. I did the 7-Day free trial and really enjoyed the scanning option, but wasn't sure I liked it enough to pay for it, so I switched to the free version. Because the Fitbit connection is free on most of the other ones I've tried, like MyFitnessPal, I did not anticipate that if I didn't pay for the premium, that I wouldn't even be able to track my steps at all. Really disappointed that I can't even add them manually. Kind of useless now.

I gave this app a 5 star rating because you have the option to buy premium with special features, but you can do all of the basic functions without spending a dime! I am able to track my calories, exercise, and weight, which was the key reason I was looking for a calorie counting app. it is also good at keeping track of your goals and easily showing you your progress!

Be aware that even if you buy a lifetime membership they still charge you for access to a lot of things. They offered me a discounted price almost immediately to go from an annual subscription to lifetime access. I wasn't familiar with the app yet. I went for the lifetime membership and found that this is for BASIC access to the app. If you want to look at any of their educational materials, it's all extra. Be sure you're OK with paying for lots of other things before you commit to it.

Good overall but there are frustrating and QoL things that I would like to see fixed or added. The frustrating part is that when trying to enter a meal, it's difficult to edit the items in the meal. if I choose a meal I had before but had different amounts, I can't change the amount in the meal as it adds another element to the meal as a separate item. QoL, would like to see my recommended macro nutrition goals w/values Ive had

Compared to my old subscription tracker app, Lose It! has more foods (with complete nutrition info) on record to choose from, the scanner works SO well!, and it's more comprehensive, inclusive, catered to me & my goals, and can sync with my fitness app! --for half the price of my old app!! I'm such a happy Lose It! convert that I'll be singing its praises to all my friends & family!

Buggy and annoying. It asked me to reset my goals & weight pretty much every time I booted it up. I had this app for a while, and it didn't start out this way, but over time, it started losing meals I had input. It also became harder to find pretty standard foods via the barcode scanner, and I noticed there was little regulation on the nutrition info on existing foods. I also hate that all of the email marketing shifted to GLP-1 promos. Not good for general nutrition tracking.

title: Investing.com: Stock Market
description: Track real-time stock market data, news, shares and alerts with the Investing.com app ‚Äî trusted by millions worldwide. Build your portfolio, follow global financial markets, and stay ahead with powerful finance tools. Stay ahead in the stock market and global finance with the Investing.com app. Get real-time market data, finance news, and live updates on major indices like the Dow Jones, NASDAQ and S&P500. Use our stock tracker to monitor stocks, indices, ETFs, commodities and penny stocks in one place. Receive personalized alerts for breaking stock market news, price changes, and market analysis‚Äîyour trusted finance app for smarter portfolio tracking and insights. REAL-TIME DATA Access live quotes, charts, and market data for over 300,000 financial instruments, including stocks, ETFs, indices, commodities, currencies, bonds, and futures. Track global markets, follow price trends, and stay ahead with real-time finance insights. Visualize the stock market with advanced charts, technical indicators, and real-time data. Track price trends and market performance across stocks, ETFs, bonds, options and commodities. ECONOMIC CALENDAR Stay informed on key economic events and global market data with our Economic Calendar. Track central bank decisions, GDP and inflation reports, and other market-moving events worldwide to follow how economic indicators shape stocks, and commodities. PERSONALIZED PORTFOLIO Manage your portfolio and investments with powerful finance tools. Build a personalized portfolio tracker to monitor your stocks, ETFs, and assets in one place. Use custom watchlists and price alerts to follow market movements, analyze performance, and keep your holdings up to date. STOCKS ALERTS Get customizable alerts for market events, breaking news, and price changes stay on top of market movements and act fast on opportunities. scraped_reviews.content: Their customer service is nonexistent. Their AI will create a ticket, but that is where it ends - no response, no follow-up, no human to talk to, email with or chat with. There is no customer service phone number either. The app is good, but once you sign up, you will be constantly pushed to upgrade to Pro Plus, which is annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for your experience with our customer service. Please reach out to our support team at gpsupport@investing.zendesk.com for assistance regarding your concerns. Your feedback about the upgrade prompts is noted, and we appreciate you sharing your thoughts.

scraped_reviews.content: I had a full year paid subscription. Then along came the upgrade, which I had to consent to to continue using. That logged me out. When I logged back in I suddenly was back using the Ad version. I appealed to customer service for help. No help. So to get rid of the ads AGAIN I had to purchase ANOTHER full year subscription - only this time prices had gone from $19.99 a year to $65 a year. So I was force upgraded. This is how these guys do business folks. BEWARE. Watchlist can't be edited either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear User,
Thank you for your feedback.
We will be happy to look into this issue further, however, we require additional information. Please contact our technical support at http://invst.ly/8t7ft with more information regarding your feedback and screenshots if possible.
We hope to hear from you soon and hope that you reconsider your rating.

scraped_reviews.content: Best app I've found for my limited purposes. I use the free version to track indices and a few stocks as well as to check the occasional news story. Most important part for me is the widget that lets me monitor a list of symbols on my home screen without having to fire up the app. (Though occasionally the widget doesn't seem to want to refresh without a nudge.) The level of advertising is perfectly acceptable to keep the product free, though as some others have noted, there seem to be more scammy/junk ads appearing these days. That probably has more to do with their ad network provider than with the app. The articles are sometimes interesting and useful--just avoid the comment streams, which are populated by nothing but trolls and zealots both left and right--nothing useful there. Would be great if the company offered a lower-price paid version that removed ads and didn't offer as many of the advanced features. For my purposes, $60/year is too steep, but I'd definitely pay $20.

While I don't use this app to actually trade, I love it for tracking my stocks. I can add buy/sell positions and it will give me daily changes , as well as, gains/losses since open. Took a star off because the app doesn't account for stock splits or merges. Any time this happens I have to manually calculate the new values and input a false buy/sell position to accurately reflect any gains/losses since open.

Did not like this app much. I uninstalled it after 2 days. The website shows everything much better than the app. Just use the website. The prices seemed to be lagging and not updating when the app is open in the background. I didn't know if I was looking at the live price. I couldn't easily follow links left in the comments because I couldn't copy it or click it. The UI felt cluttered with ads and menus. The chart makes you rotate the phone and it doesn't save the customizations.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Our Android app offers 3 types of charts: Overview chart on the instrument screen. Tapping Overview displays a basic chart, which you've described. For a more advanced chart, swipe the tools line to the right edge, and tap 'Chart' to access the landscape chart with all features, including Heikin Ashi and Hollow Candles charts.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is mostly just like the desktop displaying news and charts nicely. It has a lot of ads if you don't purchase the ad-free version on the desktop. It will confuse some users, where if you buy the ad-free on desktop online, you will get ad-free on all platforms. But if you buy on the app, you will only get ad-free for mobile. Good thing I didn't make that mistake. But it's a bad set up and user will be penalized if app users not careful.

It's a great app, but don't bother paying extra for the ad-free subscription. It was great at first, but then every month the ads would reappear and I'd have to contact the developer to fix it. Then this month, they never responded to 3 attempts to get their help. I've cancelled my subscription to the pay version, but the free version is still ok if you don't mind annoying ads everywhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
Thank you for your feedback.
We will be happy to look into this issue further, however, we require additional information. Please contact our technical support at http://invst.ly/8t7ft with more information regarding your feedback and screenshots if possible.
We hope to hear from you soon and hope that you reconsider your rating.

scraped_reviews.content: The only widget I have that can do realtime LSE plus has commodities. The news is good too. The fullscreen ad every time you want to open a stock from the widget is a bit much. Just have an ad at the bottom or top of the app like everyone else does. The main drawback is you can only add 1 widget with max 8 symbols. If you add a second widget they both display the same watchlist. If you change the watchlist in one, it changes in the other too. Would also be nice if they had a 1x1 or 1x2 widget to allow a single stock to be shown on your home screen without taking up too much space. Widget is a bit slow to refresh but not too bad. I think with some improvements to the widget functionality this could be my one and only app, but right now I have to use 2 to be able to have 2 watchlists.

Just pay for the ad free version! It is ridiculously affordable, and it is so much faster when you go ad free. The amount of analysis/articles is really good, you get breaking news, alerts etc. I don't use this to trade directly on but I don't really get the idea that's what it's for. It supports trading decisions and getting overall market sentiment. Service is remarkable good and fast/friendly. Trade on an actual platform use this for info. I'm impressed enough with the ad free to go Pro.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! You made our day! ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Love the app and widget overall. However, it would be nice to be able to include more than 8 holdings on the widget. Either allow a scrollbar to view more, or be able to have multiple widgets on different screens with different portfolios (currently you can have more but only one portfolio will show across all of them). Also I have trouble finding articles in the app that I've been notified of once they've cleared on my notifications bar. Would be helpful to have a section for these in the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear user,

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app, but navigation needs a bit more thought.  For example, I know there are easier ways to check stock prices, but I often times manually enter the ticker symbol - and often times I go several tickers deep.  The problem is that I cannot navigate back to the homepage without hitting the back button repeatedly.  Needs to be a direct route to homepage at all places within app.

Works pretty well. I wish there wasn't a watchlist size limitation, and I had to turn notifications off because I found the editorialized comments on price movement to be annoying. "Up" or "down" is a sufficient descriptor. I don't need "rocketing," "pumping," "tanking," or "plummeting." I don't know what the trigger points are for those adjectives, but crypto hits them every day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey! We really appreciate this feedback and are always looking to our users to help us improve ourselves. Please feel free to send your suggestions to Jonas at gpsupport@investing.zendesk.com or ('Send Feedback' on the More menu) on the app, so that the product team can investigate and make improvements. Cheers!

scraped_reviews.content: this app is very useful and the user interface isn't bad, there's a lot of useful info included, but: In the chat, you can't see the year that a comment was made, so it could have been made in July 2021, July 2022, July 2023 etc. with no way of telling. ¬£95 subscription for 1 year? I was going to buy it until I saw it's ¬£95 for one single year. That's far too much for any app and definitely cannot afford this. Shame as if it was cheaper, you'd probably have a lot more subscribers IMO.

Superb app. Very much useful. I am particularly using this app to follow the rates of gold and silver. I strongly recommend this app to my friends and also other investors in gold and silver.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is excellent overall and offers a wide range of features for tracking financial markets. However, there are a couple of issues on tablets that I hope the development team will address soon. First, the app does not utilize the full screen space on my tablet (running Android 15). It appears in a horizontal rectangle with black bars on both the left and right sides. Second, the app does not support split screen mode, which is a key feature for multitasking on tablets.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey! We really appreciate this feedback and are always looking to our users to help us improve ourselves. Please feel free to send your suggestions to Jonas at gpsupport@investing.zendesk.com or ('Send Feedback' on the More menu) on the app, so that the product team can investigate and make improvements. Cheers!

title: Lemon8 - Lifestyle Community
description:
Lemon8 is a lifestyle community focused app powered by TikTok, where you can discover and share authentic content on a variety of topics such as beauty, fashion, travel, food, and more. You can edit and share photos with great ease and engage in discussion with like-minded people. Lemon8 offers a space where you can connect, inspire, and support one another.

[Find Your Community]
- Lemon8's customized content is specifically made for you. Our "For You" section recommends a personalized feed to you based on your interests. 
- Lemon8 is also a great place for you to express and engage in a free space with other like-minded creatives within the community.

[Create with Ease]
- Fed up of the faff of creating on one app, editing on another, posting on yet one more? With Lemon8, our in-app suite allows you to compose texts, edit photos and videos with ease.
- You'll find a whole library of intuitive templates, stickers, filters and fonts for your photos and videos.
- Say 'goodbye' to jumping between apps to make a single post and, say 'hello' to Lemon8!

[Explore and Discover]
- Use hashtags! Our hashtags not only help your posts get discovered, but also help you easily discover content you like.
- Our campaign features and intuitive search helps you find trending content, top-performing creators and whatever answer you're browsing for.

[Contact Us]
- We want to build Lemon8 into the app you need and desire. Your suggestions make Lemon8 better.
- If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, contact us at any time using the following email: contact@lemon8-app.com

summary: Fresh discoveries every day

scraped_reviews.content: It's a neat idea for an app but lacks certain features and has some weird quirks. It doesn't have a dark mode and the selection of interests at the start is limited (why is "technology" lumped in with "wellness"?). For whatever reason it doesn't let you enter a name (not a username) longer than 15 characters. So if you have a long name / last name, you'll have to deal with that. It can also be a bit buggy at times especially when switching between search categories.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your continued support. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused. Your suggestions are highly appreciated. The Lemon8 team will keep working hard to provide you with more product features and better experience. We hope you will continue to support us.

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly surprised but it's a really cute and fun social media app. It's kind of basic and simple, there's not a ton of content (not a ton of people use the app) and the variety is limited, but that's just what it is with smaller apps, it can grow. The layout is really nice and sleek, I don't feel overwhelmed looking at everything. A massive plus is the lack of ads. A lot of websites and social media nowadays bombard you with ads and it's awful, MAJOR kudos for the lack of ads üëçüèºüëçüèº

This app is at a good start, but I'm honestly disappointed that you can only upload a minute of footage. If you could upload longer footage, then I believe it could do much better. Also, I really don't like that you have to find videos on the homepage before you can scroll videos. The app is just not set up for casual scrolling, and It feels like you can't post much beyond pictures or 60-second clips. Also, it would help if the algorithm would push out smaller users/new videos to more people.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your continued support. Your suggestions are highly appreciated. The Lemon8 team will keep working hard to provide you with more product features and better experience. We hope you will continue to support us.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, it's pretty great. It has a comfy UI and great execution, but some things could be better. For starters, when I use the app, nothing ever loads. Posts and profile pictures stay as gray loading screens. Secondly, I'd prefer a dark mode. Bright things are very hard for me to see, and the color contrasts and hinders my focus. Last, it would be nice to be able to choose who can see your posts. I don't know if there's a friend system in place, but some posts are better kept in tight circles.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your suggestion! We'll be sure to share your feedback with our product team for consideration. We're committed to promoting a better experience for everyone.

scraped_reviews.content: Not sure if it's a bug/glitch, but when i try to follow someone, it doesn't show up that I follow them until the 20th time I go into someone's profile and click the follow button. Also, it didn't allow me to auto-follow my friends that are already on lemon8 I have to manually go find them. Wasn't that supposed to be one of the perks? Hopefully there's improvement, otherwise there is no use in downloading this app.

This is a really cute, really good app! However sending messages to others could definitely be improved. I'd like to be able to send the same post to multiple people at once, without having to do it individually. Id also like the ability to converse better via dms (respond to individual posts I was sent, maybe even like them) so that the person I was speaking to would know what I was responding to!!

Tried it, don't like it. Feels like Instagram but with thumbnails. Scrolled through the thumbnails a few minutes and got bored. Tried to make a post but videos have to be short, less than a minute, and not much in the editing department...really basic. Also don't like that none of your Tiktok posts transfer over...I'm not starting over. If Tiktok does go away, I'll just use Instagram and Facebook. Great name, cause it's a lemon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you taking the time to leave this review. We value your input and will be sure to share your feedback with our internal teams. We're committed to promoting a better experience for everyone!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is terrible. No good music selections, no stickers, no effects, no option to turn downloads off for videos or pictures everything can be downloaded, no option to filter your comments they're either off or on. I don't even see an option to duet or go LIVE. Videos can't be longer than one minute so if you're uploading videos from TikTok and it's a minute and two seconds it will be rejected. The majority of my videos are acting skits which are over 2 minutes so now I can't even use them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review. We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us and we will make sure to share it with our product team. We value your feedback so we can continue to improve!

title: CoPilot GPS Navigation
description:
Built for you, the driver. Whether you are behind the wheel of a car, a professional truck driver with profits tied to your time on the road or an RVer exploring the country - CoPilot has got you covered. 

Trusted by millions of drivers globally and many of the world‚Äôs leading delivery fleets, CoPilot GPS is designed to meet the needs of all driver and vehicle types to help you safely navigate the roads. Let us help make it productive and enjoyable. 

Includes 14 days FREE voice-guided offline navigation, route planning and traffic. Try the app without any commitment and if you like it, you can subscribe at anytime. 


TRUCK NAVIGATION & TRAFFIC
‚Ä¢  Keep out of trouble by avoiding low bridges and truck-restricted roads with PC*MILER routing
‚Ä¢  Driver-friendly non-distracting guidance in cab, so you can concentrate on the road
‚Ä¢  Plan trips that are optimized for your vehicle and load 
‚Ä¢  Save money avoiding fines, out-of-route mileage and reduce fuel usage  
‚Ä¢  Deliver on time and get precise ETAs with real-time traffic 
‚Ä¢  Live and predictive parking insights for truck stops and rest areas
   to help you save time and stay on schedule
‚Ä¢  Map display provides more visual cues including satellite imagery,
‚Ä¢  3D buildings and detailed house numbering
‚Ä¢  Android Auto connectivity for a seamless navigation experience

CAR NAVIGATION & TRAFFIC
‚Ä¢  Find your best way with a choice of up to 3 routes
‚Ä¢  Drive confidently without a mobile signal with automotive-grade offline maps
‚Ä¢  Discover what‚Äôs around you with millions of pre-loaded Places 
‚Ä¢  Avoid delays with real-time traffic and automatic rerouting around congestion*
‚Ä¢  Explore any place, anywhere, in any way with maps of the world**

RV NAVIGATION & TRAFFIC
‚Ä¢  Routes and directions designed for RVs based on your vehicle size
‚Ä¢  Never get stranded again with reliable offline maps
‚Ä¢  Search millions of preloaded Places including campgrounds and rest areas 
‚Ä¢  Know your turn ahead of time with lane indicator arrows & exit sign information

For detailed map coverage, check out copilotgps.com/map-coverage

NOTES
*Requires a mobile internet connection
**Requires additional map upgrade

To find out more about the maximum dimensions for your RV navigation, visit our support center supportv11.copilotgps.com (height 14ft, width 102in, total length 45ft, weight 26,000lbs).

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life

summary: GPS for Truck, Car, RV

scraped_reviews.content: I have to agree with the comments about the new version of CoPilot. This is a step or 2 backwards. The thing I dislike the most is the new color scheme. What we're you thinking? This makes the map and upcoming directions so much harder to read. How about giving us a choice of color schemes? Another suggestion is to remember the navigation display choices such as split screen view. I have to re-select this every time I start navigation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Larry, Thanks for your feedback. We‚Äôd like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to https://goo.gl/trBXr6. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: Seems to be OK so far. It would be nice for the RV version when you are searching for POI like a Loves or petro that it shows it on the map along your route. Right now you click the map icon on the right and its just a blank screen. Kind of makes it hard when you are doing it on the fly trying to get an idea how far away from a fuel stop.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear Mr. Jc MacNaught,
Thank you for your comments. We are committed to improving our app based on customer feedback. Please continue to share your suggestions, and we will pass them on to our production team for future updates. If you need assistance with the app, please contact our support team at https://goo.gl/trBXr6.

scraped_reviews.content: Out of the blue, the app updated without my permission during a trip. Everything is different for THE WORST!!! Good luck seeing anything with how small the interface is, and you have no control over the zoom level. You can't even move the view without it changing to totally random orientations. I DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL!!! Nothin was wrong with the previous version, it was perfect as it was. I'll now only be using Google Maps and my atlas. At least those I can see and have control of.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gundanium, sorry to hear that you are experiencing this issue. Please note, our Development team are aware of an issue with malfunctioning Auto zoom and we hope to have a fix for this soon. Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: Not a big fan of the most recent update, seems clunkier, uses way too much battery and system memory and now seems very difficult to change a route while driving... which of course you probably should be pulling over but you can't always do that if your trying to avoid a road closer due to a recent accident. New map is easier to read but everything else feels worse. Also used to be able to select a road and have it route through that area, which appears to be gone as well.

Had two trips so far using this copilot GPS navigation. Both times, I ended up three miles or more from the correct location, despite the address being correct both times. I'm truly not a fan of driving to where I thought I was going to have to scramble at the last minute to determine which way I need to go to reach the destination sometimes in areas one can't just whip it around on a dime and go the other direction other times being forced to drive around several blocks to correct the issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Justen,
Thank you for your feedback. We're sorry to hear about your experience. Please ensure your app is updated to the latest version, as we continuously work on improving accuracy. If the issue persists, contact our support team with details of the trips so we can investigate further, at https://goo.gl/trBXr6. Thank you for your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for my truck GPS for the last 7 years. After this last update the app is unusable as a GPS, as you get to your turn it zooms all the in, I was in the turn lane and couldn't even see the road I was turning onto on the GPS. I zoom it out while I'm driving and it just zooms all way back in every 5 seconds. Not sure why they updated this app, should've spent more time updating the maps as they are at least 10-15yrs behind.

Tried it 2 years ago, was buggy and inaccurate. Was bad then, looks like it's worse now (11/18/24). More than once I was directed onto a no truck route, so I've no idea where they get their data from. They wanted $119/yr back then. We have it on our ELD'S, free from our employer, won't even bother with using it. I'm waiting for GOOGLE AI to take all the known truck specific routes and put them into maps. If AI had a useful purpose, it's in this arena.

scraped_reviews.content: Works well, mostly. Used it for over a year and it's no worse than others as far as sending you out of your way. Runs you out of your way sometimes. I've been using this as my primary navigation app for almost five years. I find it to be very easy to use and very customizable. My only complaint is that in a recent update, the developer removed the settings where I could specify my typical driving speed on different types of roads. Can't display points along route more than a few miles unless you search by name. If you know the names of truckstop and other locations along your route, why would you need to search. scraped_reviews.content: I have an Android head unit and want Navigation I can use without having to turn on my phone hotspot and connect every time. You can download maps of North America for offline use, but the search function is a nightmare unless your connected to data for it to search online. For some perspective, I have been a CoPilot fan since the early 2000's when I would use it for work travel and would run it on my laptop, connected to a power inverter, connected to the cigarette lighter plug with the GIANT yellow USB plugged GPS receiver that sat on the dash. If you're wondering why I don't use Google Maps that comes on all Android based head units, it's about the same. You can download maps but, it's less than user friendly if you don't have a data connection. I use in car navigation a lot. When you travel for work, it's so much nicer to have a big screen than a phone screen. When I saw CoPilot in the app store, I was excited to see something I knew and trusted from the past. This isn't the same. If it is more user friendly, then I haven't figured it out. If you want a self-sufficient all in one navigation app like you would get in a vehicle with OEM navigation from the factory, this IS NOT IT. The biggest regret... I purchased it before giving it a longer try than just a couple trips in town. If I could get a refund, I would ask for one.

By far the best app I've used for trucking. Since being integrated into a general, every vehicle GPS app, the truck-specific (18-wheeler) routing is little better than Google Maps, and almost as useless. Additionally, the app locks itself out if it needs a map update... no route for you! Woe to you if you're on a metered connection when it decides it wants an update. For $99, I expected more. I won't be renewing.

scraped_reviews.content: I like co pilot because all the data is stored on my phone, no the cloud, so that when I am in an area without cell coverage (like the mountains) I have a full functioning GPS. scraped_reviews.content: The app seems to be quite usable with good architecture and somewhat simple structure, not to say that it's always logical. I travel much in Yukon, NWT, British Columbia in Canada, Alaska, and Minnesota as well as other states in the USA. In many of those places the drives between supply points (say gas) are close to the limit of the gas I have, so if I get lost and need to drive extra 100 miles or so I may be in big trouble because those roads in some case have nearly no traffic, like a vehicle or two per day, sometimes less. So the reliability of the GPS I have is very important for me. And this is where I have problem with this app. On number of occasions this app went crazy and failed. Luckily it always was right after installing updates. I'm very much afraid to have GPS failure somewhere in a wilderness without any way to fix it that's why I seriously consider now (after yet another failure here at home that followed an update) to drop it and find something more reliable. So far I submitted my ticket and will see how it'll be resolved. From my experience support is not so great on this app and sometimes they are not in a big rush on those tickets.

This new design is down right dangerous!! I have been huge fan of this company for many many many years. I'm not sure what's going on over there but his new design is just dangerous! title: Google Slides
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate on presentations from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Slides app. With Slides, you can:

- Create new presentations or edit existing ones
- Share presentations and collaborate in the same presentation at the same time
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments
- Add and rearrange slides, format text and shapes, and more
- Present straight from your mobile device
- Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type
- Make beautiful slides, instantly - with smart suggestions
- Present slides to video calls - scheduled meetings will automatically appear
- Open, edit, and save PowerPoint files

Google Slides is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Slides features, including:
- Collaborating on a single presentation online with your business partner, your whole team, or external contacts. You control who gets permission to edit, view, or just add comments.
- Starting from scratch or expediting the process by choosing a template. You can enhance your presentations with videos, images, drawings, and smooth transitions.
- Working across PCs, Macs, mobiles, and tablets‚ÄîView or even present your slides from your phone or tablet, so you always have the option to practice your presentation up until the last minute.

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/slides/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
LinkedIn: https://www.LinkedIn.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

Permissions Notice
Calendar: This is used to join video calls from calendar invites.
Camera: This is used for camera mode in video calls and to insert images taken with the camera.
Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
Microphone: This is used to transmit audio in video calls.
Storage: This is used to insert images and to open files from USB or SD storage.

title: Haystack News: Local TV News
description:
Trusted by more than 30 million news viewers! Your go-to, from local news to world events. It‚Äôs the best way to watch a variety of coverage, all in one place, and absolutely free. The most local news available to stream anywhere.

Choose the categories, sources and topics to create a newscast built just for you. Get the latest local weather for your neighborhood.  

Explore on demand channels like International News and Entertainment News with stories from only the most trusted news channels.

Watch live news channels and get breaking news alerts on your phone, so you always have access to the news that matters to you. 

Take a deep dive into important topics and trends with dedicated channels that bring coverage from all over the world together in one convenient spot. 

Connect to the world around you with Haystack News.

Featured National and World News Partners
ABC News Live, Bloomberg, CBS News, Reuters, CBC, Cheddar, CNET, EuroNews, AfricaNews, GameSpot, NewsNation, Newsy, i24 News, Al Jazeera, Yahoo! Finance, Newsmax, The Hill and more.
