scraped_reviews.content: Even with the autoplay setting off, it tends to start playing videos no matter what I'm doing in the app. So if I'm looking at help I have to back all the way back out to turn off the video. It also hops to new videos in the middle of videos. The PC (browser) version also has many similar bugs (volume control's really bad). I realize that the TV versions are their primary emphasis, but why have these apps if they're going to be so clunky.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To assist with this issue, it would be helpful to have a little bit more information. Can you send any screenshots related to the issue, along with your device details, to feedback@haystack.tv? Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a very good app, but they stated the premium version is commercial free. After signing up for the premium version, however; I was still getting as many commercials as before. I reached out several times with no response and out of total frustration, I finally cancelled the premium subscription. If you want a good news agitator and do not mind LOTS of commercials, use the free version.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear User,
Could you please contact us via feedback@haystack.tv? We'd love to hear more about this issue in order to assist you.Please make sure you login with the same email id you used to purchase premium on all your devices to enjoy Haystack ad-free (Haystack app-Settings-Login).

scraped_reviews.content: Needlessly inefficient. Selection is pretty good, and I enjoy the ability to watch just the items I want. But I want to efficiently and permanently prune down lists of things to watch. If I watched an item on phone or tablet or roku, don't show that item on any device ever again. If I swipe away an item off a list, that means I don't want to watch it ever. But if I go to a different category, the swiped away item will be back. Even worse items from a couple days ago will often reappear.

Ads are in the wrong language (Chinese and Spanish in the Bay Area). Personalization is not that great, it still takes a lot of browsing to find the stories I care about. I also wish there were a wider selection of news sources. Update: Personalization got better, but the app (both on the phone and TV) became very slow. It often takes 30+ seconds for the next story to play. Also, the TV app now often freezes for a minute or two.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear User,
Could you please contact us via feedback@haystack.tv? We'd love to hear more about this issue in order to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: We've starred several #topics and @people in Haystack on our Android TV.   These used to be displayed as a list on the left side of the main Haystack screen.   I'd love to get them back there.  That was our preferred mode of  navigation.  Now we have to go to Search to access them.  I don't know if there's a configuration I can't find or if the app doesn't support that anymore.

You can not get the app to stop sending you entertainment and sports news. I have down-thumbed those stories every time, I have NOT clicked that as an interest, yet, every 10 minutes, i get more entertainment and sports stories. HOW TO STOP THAT??? Otherwise, I like this app a lot and it acts differently on different types of TVs or phones or laptops. On some TVs i get offered a list for late night TV, but not on my other Tvs. odd. But i very much DO like being able to get the news from other sources besides the cable news channels. And i like that international news is offered. I do wish the late night option was offered on Every tv set i have.

title: Khan Academy
description:
You can learn anything. For free.

Spend an afternoon brushing up on statistics. Discover how the Krebs cycle works. Get a head start on next semester's geometry. Prepare for upcoming exams. Or, if you're feeling particularly adventurous, learn how fire-stick farming changes the landscape of Australia.

Whether you're a student, teacher, homeschooler, principal, adult returning to the classroom after 20 years, or a friendly alien trying to get a leg up in earthly biology ‚Äî Khan Academy's personalized learning library is available to you, for free.

- Learn anything, for free: Thousands of interactive exercises, videos, and articles at your fingertips. Study math, science, economics, finance, grammar, history, government, politics, and much, much more.

- Sharpen your skills: Practice exercises, quizzes, and tests with instant feedback and step-by-step hints. Follow along with what you're learning in school, or practice at your own pace.

- Keep learning when you're offline: Bookmark and download your favorite content to watch videos without an internet connection.

- Pick up where you left off: Tailored to your current learning level, our mastery system gives instant feedback and recommendations on exactly which skills and videos to try next. And, if you choose to create a free account, your learning syncs with http://khanacademy.org, so your progress is always up-to-date across all your devices. 

Learn using expert-created videos, interactive exercises, and in-depth articles in math (arithmetic, pre-algebra, algebra, geometry, trigonometry, statistics, calculus, differential equations, linear algebra), science (biology, chemistry, physics), economics (microeconomics, macroeconomics, finance and capital markets), humanities (art history, civics, finance, US history, US government and politics, world history), and more (including computer science principles)!

Already familiar with the Khan Academy website? Not all functionality is available in this app. Community discussions, computer programming content, test prep, parent tools, teacher tools, and district tools should all be accessed directly at http://khanacademy.org.

Khan Academy is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization, with the mission of providing a free, world-class education for anyone, anywhere.

summary: You can learn anything.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm a dyscalic adult trying to relearn my math skills. I'm really impressed with the detail it goes into explaining the concepts. How I was taught was mostly rote memorization, but this actually teaches the concepts. I'm still exploring the app, but it looks like it can easily be scaled up or down depending on a learners level and there's a lot of subjects. Great for anyone trying to teach as well. I think the app is a little ugly and not always user friendly. I'd give it 4.5 stars if I could.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Kit!

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback on the app. :) We truly love hearing about the impact Khan Academy has on the community!

If there‚Äôs ever anything we can do to make learning with Khan Academy an even greater experience for you, please let us know!

scraped_reviews.content: It's pretty good but.... I wish their was an option to have it read things out loud to the kids, like a little speaker button so it's optional. It would really help my kiddos and me. So far he can only do math on his own unless I can sit and read it too him, which isn't always an option. Also the patent dashboard needs an easier layout. I would also appreciate the option for a 4 digit pin for my kids to log in. And make the app on chromebooks work better. Other than that we love it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Shaela!

While we do not currently offer these features, please know that we continue to add new features to improve the experience at Khan Academy. I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours and vote on your suggestions.

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Ever since Covid, I've loved Khan Academy. Its free math courses allowed me to get ahead, and their customer service is in my experience, unmatched. I once had an issue (that was completely my fault) that I needed help from the Khan Academy team to fix. When I sent in a request, less than two minutes later, they had fixed it and notified me. This is truly my favorite app for learning.

So far so good. Brushing up and refreshing my memory on topics I studied when I was younger. One thing I like is the game aspect of it. You get rewarded when completing the lessons. One thing I would like for you guys to add is a green check mark on the course icon when a course is 100% complete. On the app, if you look at the course list, there's no indicator on which you completed. Example, I'm going to do all math, from early/kid to high school. I'd like to see the grade levels checked off.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi!

While we do not currently offer this feature, please know that we continue to add new features to improve the experience at Khan Academy. I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours and vote on your suggestions.

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: For the platform itself, 11/10. The fact that such an amazing website exists that is completely free with no subscription ever, is absolutely incredible. For the app, I find it somewhat difficult to find and access profile settings but that's probably on me, and I kind of prefer the previous app layout. I love being able to learn subjects I would otherwise never have access to, and I would love to see language courses incorporated eventually! Great job all around. Have been using for years!

I like it, especially if helping me relearn math I forgot. Unfortunately, it's extremely buggy and actually makes me really angry to have to deal with it so often. Sometimes when I leave a math exercise and come back later, none of the exercises load for the longest time. This wasn't a problem when I started using this app back in October, what the hell did you guys do to it? Also, can't use a hint during a quiz or unit test without it crashing. Please fix these issues because it's really difficult and frustrating to deal with.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!

I would like to recommend that you try uninstalling/reinstalling once more. If the issue persists, we would be more than happy to investigate further, please send us a ticket over at our support hub!

Here's the URL: http://khan.co/KA-support

scraped_reviews.content: This app has helped me quite a bit. I feel like I can stay on track and have a free tutor outside of my college classes and refresh what I forgot in highschool. The English and grammar lessons are easy to remember and well built, and although the math lectures can be slow, they make it easy to understand the material and focus on harder concepts one at a time. You can work on the go without having to have a computer standing by, or at a PC at home. Perfect for my needs!

Great app of course, this is free education so I can't complain about that. The computer version is much better and easier to navigate however. I have a lot of difficulty entering answers into the quiz on the mobile version for Algebra. So I find myself redoing problems to try and get a better score. So if you have access to a computer I think you'd get more out of the course but nonetheless this is a good app overall.

It's great. I am using it to brush up on Grammer for my field of work but I found much more. Upon exploration, I found useful learning concepts for both my children and myself in mathematics, history, science, arts and humanities. After going through a few videos, I see that they focus on multiple learning styles. Each video has traits of visual, read/wright, and auditory. After the video, they provide quizzes for hands on. It's an amazing resource for anyone wanting to learn.

Loving it so far. In depth explanations of how various subjects are done and why. What I would like to see in the near future is more content to study for more career paths. Such as adding additional disciplines to the field of engineering. Update has ruined this app. After coming back to work on it some more I've found that the lessons are slow and sometimes don't work at all. You guys need to fix this. The old version was so much better.

This app is really helpful if anyone's having any trouble with their math, the Instructor makes more sense than your average teacher, he will break it down in such a way it's amazing. I'm looking at your history, pls add more. Note: Khan Academy, I want to say that your math section covers all your life skills, and thank you for supplying this education to the people who need it. PS: reviews that say that's there's a problem with the sign in, there outdated. best wishes, a Khan Academy Learner

Khan academy/the people/videos/tests are all incredible. Everyones voices are very pleasant,the videos and explanations are quick(much appreciated),as well as very informative and really drives the point home explaining in it several different ways, so it's easily understood, and memorable. The little test along the way really help make sure you understand too. I was ecstatic when I finally completely understood how to solve an algebraic equation! That's never happened before! So thank you!

It's great, just like the website. 1 thing it is missing is scratch paper or notes. I have galaxy note 8 and was wanting to be able to do work within the app. Would be awesome if you guys added this, you wouldn't even need a stylus one could use their finger, it should at the very least be an option, thank you. EDIT: Just realized they actually added scratch paper, and it works just as well as it does in the full website browser. The app to me is now relatively perfect, 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Curtis - thanks for letting us know this. We'll definitely take this into consideration when thinking about improvements. It's helpful to mention these ideas in our discussion section on the site where they can be voted and commented on by Khan Academy members!

Here's the URL: http://khan.co/KA-content-requests

scraped_reviews.content: It's really easy to use, the lessons are short and easy to understand, the teacher is good at explaining the concepts. The main problems is that once you've watched a lesson 90% of the time it doesn't check that you finished it, and there's no way to manually check that you finished it, so it can be easy to loose track. The other problem is that the app struggles to even work, it wont work out of wifi, and it sometimes won't run the tests even on wifi. Otherwise it would be 5 stars

Oftentimes, uninstalling and reinstalling the app and/or closing any background apps on your device solves any issues you could be running into. If the issue persists, please submit a support request in our Help Center: http://khan.co/KA-support.

Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: I like learning about the different kinds of math and science, and was sad to lack convenient resources after graduating. Khan Academy helps me keep learning. I can brush up on what I already understand, and move into stronger subjects as I build on what I know. I can go back whenever I feel I have the time, and there's no deadlines or expectations I have to meet. It's free education at my own pace! All the people behind this resource are amazing for making it accessible and easy to understand!

Love this app. The lessons are great and exercises actually challenge what you've been taught. I'm probably much older than most people using the app, but I love math (like a game to me). The only issue I have is that some time recently they changed the input and I don't like it. They should also address the issue of nothing happening when you click on a box to input an answer.

I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours. A new Khan Academy app has been released which comes with fixes for previous bugs and includes performance improvements.

scraped_reviews.content: So, as a 13 year old (about to go to highschool) I have used this frequently in my school, as well as my friends and teachers. Teachers love it because we learn, but the students don't really enjoy it (myself included) but, if you do want people to enjoy it more, make learning fun, like prodigy, or other learning games, maybe have a game show, where you need to multiply fast to beat the computer or your friend. Things like that make the app more intuitive and fun, and easy to do for long periods

English is a language, not a measure of intelligence.... but still, could you have a spelling or vocabulary class? Also, I've noticed a lack of accessibility. There's no text to audio options. Lastly, anyway you could be compatible with Google Chrome... or whatever the kids are using? I donate when I can, which ,truthfully, is not that often. But I do have 1,886,112 energy points. This is my favorite video game only equal to doordash... so I hope that gives some weight to my user input

This app was great before the newest update. There were some bugs, like sometimes the equation wouldn't show up. but this was fixed by simply closing the app and reopening it. now, I can barely get through one assignment without taking like 10 minutes! The app is now extremely slow. And I know it's not on my end because I have the Sasmung Galaxy S8, a reasonably powerful phone, and I've barely used half of its storage. Hope this gets fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!

Please try uninstalling/reinstalling the app and make sure that you have version 6.0.2. If the issue persists, we would be more than happy to investigate further, please send us a ticket over at our support hub!

Here's the URL: http://khan.co/KA-support

Thank you for your interest in helping to improve Khan Academy

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely recommend this app. I had teachers before that couldn't explain things well and I always stayed up studying with Khan Academy. They're very through with subjects and give the best demonstrations on how to do things. it's awesome for both visual and auditory learners. It also has a lot of languages and a very neat and organized setting. You can just download this app, search up what you need and you're good to go! I have definitely aced a few test thanks to Khan Academy. Bless Y'all.

This is a great educational app! I do three of my school subjects on this, and it makes learning easy. They have great informational videos, and quizzes to apply what you've learned. I also think the app layout is great as well. The ability to pin courses is really nice. One thing I wish they would have kept was the jump to the "up next for you" lesson/task button that would allow me to get to my course material faster without having to scroll through all of it. Regardless, still a great app!

Awesome app. I am so thankful that it's all free content. I first downloaded this to refresh on math before my placement test for going back to college (I hadn't done a math problem in almost 6 years, so I started from Kindergarten and worked my way up to algebra within a month and a half) and I ended up being placed into college level algebra. I felt so relieved and at ease during the test. I now use it for fun, brushing up on many more subjects. Love the app, thank you so much!

Khan Academy is one of the best free education resources there is. I use the website with no problem but the app has a couple. It lets me download sections but when i try to open them offline they do not load and it displays an error message. Also, quizzes/tests do not offer the detailed explanations for each answer choice like they do online, and they are incredibly helpful. It's just as easy to go to the website which works great but it would be nice to have available for offline use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Nick!

Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app, disconnecting any idle devices from your network (this ensures it isn‚Äôt saturated), and closing any background apps on your device. This usually solves the error message issue. 

If you find it persists, please submit a support ticket in our Help Center: http://khan.co/KA-support.

scraped_reviews.content: Hands down a quality educational must have. Clean interface, easy to understand, Truly free to use, and Made for everybody. I Downloaded this app to brush up on my math before I enroll in college and it has been a blessing since I started. Lessons are easy to find and organized as well as there being a number of intro lesson plans to help anyone pick up wherever they left off or for the first time. Best practical app I've downloaded in a long time

it's a phenomenal app! I use it as an adult woman who thought I hated math but turns outI lacked practice and consistency. this app gives you both! the layout of each subject unit is great. it reminds you to come back and use the app with an notification in your email i like that feature a lot. it's free. I don't know how it's free. but I'm very thankful it is.

I was so excited to find this app. I've always wanted to learn about a lot of different subjects and now I can/am! Some of the ancient history time line is a little off, it's based around the Christianity/religious timeline. (Which I thought was super lame.) I was super impressed with how much education app has to offer. It's not all just boring, having to read 50 pages in order to finish one section of a section. You go by your own pace of course. Highly recommend.

This is the most amazing learning app I've ever used. This app truly is for everyone. I'm a college student seeking to review high school subjects. Its completely free. You can learn any subject. I'm studying math and science. I suck at Math and this app helps me become a better math student. I can trust this app because its credible. I'm gonna donate to them even though it is free because i want everyone across the world to be able to have access to Khan Academy. They suggest add languages.

It is really a great platform but it is still by far better to study in a computer browser than in app. There are a lot of functionalities that is missing in the app such as the profile view, easier navigation/searching of courses, etc. Just like what others wanted, it would be better if you could add the discussion feature. It is a really a huge help in learning since the author (or other knowledgeable) people could elaborate more on the topics. Hoping these features would be added someday.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Abraham!

While we do not currently offer the features you mentioned in the app, please know that we continue to add new features to improve the experience at Khan Academy. I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours and vote on your suggestions.

scraped_reviews.content: Kahn Academy is a great app very effective and very sufficient for education! The app covers everything in every subject in complete detail from grade school and some into college. The lessons given are clear and understandable. The teacher teaches and draws out the lessons carefully and explains them in a very simple way so that anybody can understand. Very easy! The lessons can also be rewound as many times as you like. It's very easy to use. Love the app!!!

Mostly good. The lessons are digestible and mostly straight forward, but the speaker tends to not explain certain things (often simple things I admittedly should know.) Sometimes I get frustrated getting questions wrong and ask for hints only to find that I was marked wrong even though I got the answer right verbatim to the hint. If not for these flaws it would be perfect!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Arnold!

Thank you so much for taking out the time to share your feedback on the app. :) We truly love hearing about the impact Khan Academy has on the community!

scraped_reviews.content: I generally do enjoy the app but over the past two weeks it won't load my assignments. Everytime I click on a course it keeps telling me, "Unable to load course. Check your connection and tap to try again." I already refreshed multiple times and cleared the cache. I also checked on my wifi and still nothing. I hope this gets fixed as soon as possible! Thank you for your time and consideration!

it's ok, but it lacks a lot of the features of the website such as marking your progress, connect to videos on YouTube, and the discussions. it's just the videos followed by a couple questions without any aid. The main feature it is missing is the discussions where you can interact with other learners, to get additional insight. The discussions need to be included in the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi!

Unfortunately, the Discussions are not available on the app. However, you are still able to access them through the website using your mobile browser. Additionally, I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours and vote on your suggestions. 

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Very convenient for math (or any subject) on concepts you have trouble with, but I do wish that I could work out problems without having the need to physically write things down (I just solve problems in my head). If you could add a notes tab on quizzes (where you can tap/slide from the side of your screen to bring it over if you want to use it to type notes down, and to tap/slide it back to to the side of the screen to consume less screen space), this app would be even better :D
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Bryan!

Please know that we continue to add new features to improve the experience at Khan Academy. I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours and vote on your suggestions. 

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Due to the prevalent pandemic, I am now relying on this app for most of my classes. The app is good, but my biggest problem is how the assignments are displayed. They are all shown in a list. I have at least one hundred assignments and it is very time consuming trying to find the specific assignment that I want. It would be nice if the assignments were grouped under the specific course they originated from.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi!

Please know that we continue to add new features to improve the experience at Khan Academy. I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours and vote on your suggestions. 

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Tried deleting and reinstalling. I'm on an up to date Samsung Galaxy s8 plus. Tried restarting my phone. Still doesn't work. The website works fine, I know I like that. Update: Contacted the help desk. In less than 24 hours, they looked into it and made an update. It works perfectly now. Prompt attention and correction to the problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!

I would like to recommend that you try uninstalling/reinstalling once more. If the issue persists, we would be more than happy to investigate further, please send us a ticket over at our support hub!

Here's the URL: http://khan.co/KA-support

Thank you for your interest in helping to improve Khan Academy!

scraped_reviews.content: Everything is pretty great so far, besides one thing that can be a bit annoying. Because it's made like a game where you can earn points by getting answers correct, it bothers me that I can't get 100/100 points, only up to 80/100, even if I've done the practice multiple times and got all questions correct every time. It's just bothersome that I am unable to achieve all the points even though I've done the work and have been successful.

So easy to navigate and the courses offered seem endless! The structure of the courses I've started is very similar to the college courses I've taken and I can do them at my own pace! The political science class I'm taking right now is debatably better than the calsses I took at the University! The instructor does a great job at simplifying and expanding in areas that seem confusing.

love this. but there are several questions that come up with words or letters that overlap each other making guessing the answer the only option as the choices are unreadable. This showed up in the Early Math level. It's happened several times while I was watching the student work. Otherwise I love the program. Still trying to figure out how to add another teacher. That's a place that could be made more user friendly.

Absolutely no ads, no premium plans, a simple interface and free educational lessons!! I've been using it almost my entire summer break, and it's a great way to learn something new or re-do past school lessons that I missed out on or want to revise. I can't wait to complete even more lessons in this app. Finally, the teachers there explain things throughoutly. Absolutely no complains. Only that it fails to load at start-up sometimes, however, that could be a server's issue.

It is far better than byju,toppr,extramarks,as here are the lessons are taught very well and don't even charge you a single paise just an internet connection . No adds . No bothering about courses . A non profit organisation . Love it . Will give it a 10 star . Recommended to everyone . Have been using it for last 6 months. But it has one defect . Very few exercise are there to solve . Please add some more questions in all subjects.

Totally helpful. I used it on my pc, but right now, I just installed it on my android phone. I can't tell if it's just my phone's OS lagging with the app, but the feedback is delayed whenever I click on things (settings button, for example). I just wanted to raise my concern just in case the problem was on your side. More power to the team!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Claire!

Could you please try a few basic troubleshooting steps? Oftentimes, uninstalling and reinstalling the app and/or closing any background apps on your device solves any issues you could be running into. If the issue persists, please submit a support request in our Help Center: http://khan.co/KA-support.

Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: It's great that they are offering education completely free. I appreciate the absence of ads. The information related to the subjects, I think, is enough, informative, and understandable. I've been taking Economy, Finance, Physics, and History classes and the teachers are great. The absence of dark mode is a huge let down for me as I like watching the videos in portrait orientation. If you could, please add it. Thanks for the amazing work!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi!

Please know that we continue to add new features to improve the experience at Khan Academy. I encourage you to share your request in our discussion forums (http://khan.co/KA-community), where users can add their thoughts to yours and vote on your suggestions. 

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Best educational app out there and entirely free. With a bunch of explanatory videos, exercices, step by step explanations. Just perfect. The only thing I want to point out is that the videos get stuck sometimes (but that's okay because you can also watch them on Youtube, where they run just fine) and that the answer windows have bugs sometimes, but that's quite rare. It's still a very enjoyable and incredibly helpful app.

Just fantastic. Its a lot when youre new. All that knowledge for free... I think. Im skeptical. But its fantastic for people that dropped out of school and are willing to catch up on lost education, university prep and genaral touch ups. I came across an issue on my Chromebook while using the app. Equation images were zoomed in and i didnt see the last part of the equation, and i then got it wrong as a result. Sometimes i get confused where i last left off in a subject or whats next.

I recommend this to people who's struggling with math and science. Although some courses are missing. Not sure if it's just me but some courses available in the desktop website (e.g. Computer Animation, Programming etc...) is nowhere to be found in this mobile app. Please add ALL of your available courses in the app and update the app regularly. Also please add practice tests and quizzes in your Science course, make it very similar to your Math course. The math course is perfect so far!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!

Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience with the Khan Academy App! 

We'd love to hear your feedback in detail in our discussion section on the site where it can be voted and commented on by other Khan Academy members with whom this may resonate with.

khan.co/KA-community

scraped_reviews.content: It's very good, my school use it as a way to learn in advance. But I just seem to struggle to use the app in mobile, the keyboard is very confusing. When the subject is Math, the keyboard is all numbers, no letters, so when the topic is Algebra, there's no letters for me to use as a variable, means I can't complete the answer. Which lead to me getting wrong answers. I think I'm the only one with this problem, if I am the only one, at least can someone tell me how to fix it. Thank you.

The app itself is absolutely brilliant and it would've received 5 stars if it weren't for ONE thing... I'm hard of hearing so with the videos, I have to ramp the sound right up AND have the transcript on at the same time, I honestly don't mind that. I DO mind that when every question is answered correctly, my ears are then assaulted with this brash bell noise EVERY single time! Even with the sound low, it's discordant tones makes me uncomfortable and I end up closing the app in frustration. Every. Single. Time. There are no options in settings for sound control and that is why KA has 4 stars (sorry, I really did want to give it 5, it's ridiculously good otherwise!)
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!

Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us feedback on your experience with the Khan Academy app! 

We'd love to hear your feedback in detail in our discussion section on the site where it can be voted and commented on by Khan Academy members in order to think about the experience improvement: khan.co/KA-community.

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great for anyone wanting to learn any topic, even those that are not necessarily academic. But I have a lot of issues with it; it's slow. Articles, exercises, and videos sometimes take way too long to load. There's even one exercise that I haven't finished because it won't load and all I see is a white screen. Also, some videos will all of a sudden lower their screen and sound quality. And it's not just for one video in a single unit.

I can learn math, sciences, economic, history, etc for free on khanacademy. It was mainly made for learning math. As the time pass, they added science, economic, humanities, computing, etc. I don't recommend you to use this to learn to code or learning programming languages. They lack of those stuffs. But it's still useful for general knowledge. It doesn't have some features that I find in web version like the questions/tips & thanks and changing the video quality.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there!

Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us feedback on your experience with the Khan Academy app! 

We'd love to hear your feedback in detail in our discussion section on the site where it can be voted and commented on by Khan Academy members in order to think about the experience improvement: khan.co/KA-community.

Thank you!

title: Offline Map Navigation
description:
Ever found yourself lost with no cellphone tower signal ? Use our offline maps to locate yourself, search for places and get accurate turn-by-turn driving directions to navigate safely back home. 
Planning a holiday ? Search offline and find nearby hotels, restaurants, and other points of interest easily during your trips. Our app ensures efficient travel planning with precise ETA, weather updates, and the ability to add multiple way-points. 
Whether you're driving, biking, cycling, or walking, always have peace of mind with our app by your side. Offline Map Navigation is your trustworthy backup, ready to assist you whenever you need it most.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Turn-by-Turn Navigation: Receive route instructions.
‚Ä¢ Multiple Modes: Find the fastest routes for car, motorbike, bicycle, or walking.
‚Ä¢ Supports Android Auto & Automotive - use Offline Map Navigation on your car‚Äôs display
‚Ä¢ Offline Points of Interest: Locate nearby hotels, restaurants, hospitals, ATMs, banks, charging stations, and shopping places without an internet connection.
‚Ä¢ Junction View: Navigate complex intersections with ease.
‚Ä¢ Voice Guidance: Get accurate voice instructions in multiple languages.
‚Ä¢ Lane Guidance: Clear information on turn lanes.
‚Ä¢ EV Routing: Includes charging station information for electric vehicles.
‚Ä¢ Weather Updates: Real-time weather details for your location.
‚Ä¢ Multi-Stop Routes: Add multiple way-points for optimised paths and precise ETA.
‚Ä¢ Automatic Rerouting: Stay on track with instant rerouting.
‚Ä¢ Target Compass: Navigate directly to any destination with precision.
‚Ä¢ Alternative Routes: Choose from multiple route suggestions.
‚Ä¢ Share Routes: Easily share route instructions.
‚Ä¢ Save Locations: Save favourite locations for quick access.
‚Ä¢ Fast GPS: Enjoy quick GPS updates.
‚Ä¢ Day and Night Modes: Clear maps for any time of day.
‚Ä¢ Downloadable Maps: Use maps offline.
‚Ä¢ Offline Search: Find locations and addresses without internet.
‚Ä¢ Over-speed Alerts: Stay safe with speed alerts.
‚Ä¢ Local Events: Discover local events.
‚Ä¢ User-Created Attractions: Explore attractions created by users.
‚Ä¢ Full Offline Functionality: All features work both online and offline.

Why Choose Offline Map Navigation?
‚Ä¢ Save on Roaming Charges: Use offline maps to save money.
‚Ä¢ Efficient Travel Planning: Save locations, add way-points, and find optimised routes.
‚Ä¢ Share Trip Plans: Easily share your trip details.
‚Ä¢ Multi-Language Support: Available in various languages.
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Coverage: Access maps and navigation for various regions worldwide.
‚Ä¢ User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.
‚Ä¢ Regular Updates: Benefit from regular updates and improvements.
‚Ä¢ High Accuracy: Depend on precise and reliable navigation.
‚Ä¢ Customisation Options: Personalise your navigation experience with various settings.
‚Ä¢ Community Contributions: Explore user-generated content and local insights.
‚Ä¢ Privacy Focused: Navigate securely with a focus on privacy.

Wear OS Integration:
Synchronise with your Wear OS smartwatch for seamless turn-by-turn navigation.

Steps to Use Wear OS Support:
1. Install the app on both your Android device and Wear OS smartwatch.
2. Open the app on both devices and complete the setup.
3. Start navigation on your mobile device.
4. Receive navigation instructions on your Wear OS device.

Disclaimer:
Offline Map Navigation is a GPS-based app that uses your location while using the app or all the time, even in the background, for accurate positioning and navigation guidance.

scraped_reviews.content: Offline Map Navigation works well as long as the location is there. It could beat Google Maps if it continues to improve. But 6 times out of 10 the thing I'm searching for isn't even there. Also, most of the time I don't actually know the physical address of the location, but that's the 1st thing displayed in the search results (before the name).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: in the coming update we are improving the experience. We will take note of your feedback and work on it as well.

scraped_reviews.content: I never got the chance to try this app out because right off the bat it wanted me to subscribe for $29.99 a year with only a 3 day trial period. I uninstalled immediately. As a full-time RV'r that wouldn't be a bad price but I don't constantly move so I never would have been able to try the app out fully in just 3 days.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience. Could you please share more details or screenshots of the issue? This will help us fix it. You can send them to android@virtualmaze.com. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: I guess it's okay, but can't preview it to see because it immediately demands money before you can download "more than 3 maps". But I never got a chance to choose a map. It starts up somewhere in India. By the time I got it positioned to USA my free map quota was somehow gone. I certainly won't buy something I can't preview. The other app with a similar name is much more usable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Can you try our latest update and provide feedback. Thank you !

scraped_reviews.content: Still in the nascent state. Somewhat disappointing. With great expectations I downloaded this app with subscription, this being an Indian app. Even famous landmarks, hotels and places are missing in search. Any page takes too much time to load. A bit confusing to find routes and places. Has to improve a lot, if you have to beat Google maps which is free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your disappointment and apologize for the experience you've had. We're working hard to improve the app, including enhancing search results for landmarks and faster loading times. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we appreciate you sharing your thoughts.

scraped_reviews.content: I tries this app and although it worked okay on my phone, it was less that satisfactory when I connected it to Android Auto on my car. A large menu appeared that blocked out a third of the screen which made it impossible to see what was happening on the map. I could not get rid of the menu. So I decided not to buy the app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience. Could you please share more details or screenshots of the issue? This will help us fix it. You can send them to android@virtualmaze.com. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: App is good, just need to simplify it and make it easy to find the address I'm looking for. Plus less clutter when viewing directions would make the app great
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review! We understand the frustration of not finding the right address and cluttered direction views. We're working on simplifying the search and improving direction presentation. Could you tell us more about when and where you face these issues? Your input will help us make the app better.

scraped_reviews.content: horrible too many ads and your force the hey start your free trial just give me your wallet. I don't like it i couldn't even get to make directions before an ad don't you know the era we're living in it's full steam ahead on the ad blocker app for me no ads cause they are annoying you want money get an actual job like the rest of humanity you bum.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience. Could you please share more details or screenshots of the issue? This will help us fix it. You can send them to android@virtualmaze.com. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: I‚Äôm really disappointed with the Mapple app. It‚Äôs not a good navigation app at all ‚Äî it doesn‚Äôt even come close to the performance or accuracy of Google Maps. The directions are often unreliable, and the overall user experience is frustrating. On top of that, it‚Äôs disappointing that users have to pay for an app that doesn‚Äôt meet even basic navigation standards. Totally not worth it. I hope the developers make serious improvements in future updates.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience. Could you please share more details or screenshots of the issue? This will help us fix it. You can send them to android@virtualmaze.com. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: In terms of accuracy and its utility value this app easily matches it's closest rival, Google Maps. Where it tends to fall away is the repeated calls to switch to a paid plan while Google Map makes no such demand.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We genuinely appreciate your feedback. Please know that we‚Äôre always working hard to improve the user experience and occasionally offer a premium plan that can help. If you have any other concerns or suggestions, please reach out to us at android@virtualmaze.com. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: looks like it does what it said , will try firs free version and surely go premium if it can replace ggmap ( free ) with offline nav so I can use a cheap phone as gps without risking my overpriced one , without subscription for another sim and data plan , but if I get adds popping while driving I ll return immediately to gg map on personal hotspot which will do exactly the same ,

title: Dynamics 365 Business Central
description: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central is a comprehensive business management solution that helps small and medium-sized companies connect their finance, sales, service, and operations teams within a single easy-to-use application. Accelerate deployment and adoption with step-by-step onboarding guidance, contextual next best action intelligence, innovative AI features, and interoperability with Microsoft 365. Confidently move to the cloud to optimize digital business processes and unlock the insights needed to adapt faster, work smarter, and perform better. Work with a Dynamics 365 partner to easily tailor and extend the application to meet your unique business or industry-specific needs. With every day and every minute bringing something new, be equipped for what‚Äôs next and unlock limitless possibilities with Business Central. Adapt faster Innovate and adopt new business models faster with flexible deployment models, mobility, reliability, security, and an adaptable Microsoft cloud solution that grows with your business. Work smarter Empower people to be more collaborative, more productive, and more impactful with actionable insights and interoperability to Microsoft 365, including Teams, Word, Excel, and Outlook. Perform better Enable high performance with guided workflows, governance, and real-time metrics that drive continuous process optimization, accelerates financial closes, and improves cycle times. ¬© 2018 Microsoft. All Rights Reserved. Notes for the mobile app: - Requires Android 13 or newer. - By installing this app, you agree to the terms at: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=724013
descriptionHTML:
Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central is a comprehensive business management solution that helps small and medium-sized companies connect their finance, sales, service, and operations teams within a single easy-to-use application. Accelerate deployment and adoption with step-by-step onboarding guidance, contextual next best action intelligence, innovative AI features, and interoperability with Microsoft 365. Confidently move to the cloud to optimize digital business processes and unlock the insights needed to adapt faster, work smarter, and perform better. Work with a Dynamics 365 partner to easily tailor and extend the application to meet your unique business or industry-specific needs. With every day and every minute bringing something new, be equipped for what‚Äôs next and unlock limitless possibilities with Business Central.

Adapt faster
Innovate and adopt new business models faster with flexible deployment models, mobility, reliability, security, and an adaptable Microsoft cloud solution that grows with your business.

Work smarter
Empower people to be more collaborative, more productive, and more impactful with actionable insights and interoperability to Microsoft 365, including Teams, Word, Excel, and Outlook.

Perform better
Enable high performance with guided workflows, governance, and real-time metrics that drive continuous process optimization, accelerates financial closes, and improves cycle times.

¬© 2018 Microsoft. All Rights Reserved.

Notes for the mobile app:
- Requires Android 13 or newer.
- By installing this app, you agree to the terms at: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=724013
summary: Connect and grow your business

scraped_reviews.content: Updating after 2 years of using the app, it's still just as bad. Horrible interface. Hard to enter hours and submit timesheets. Often I haven't even been able to log in, I keep going through a circular process of filling out the email address, entering password, authentication, then it takes me back to the email sign in again. The email an password give me no trouble on a computer, so not an error in the login.

Absloutely horrible experience with this app about 50% of the time I can not even access my home screen. It wants me to keep logging in and every time I do it kicks me back to the email screen whenever I eventually get in it will only work once or twice then its the same song and dance again. Recently I keep getting a refresh screen and cannot even access my account i am on an android with the most recent update I have uninstalled and re installed multiple times and still no change

Microsoft you need to and have invested in the app. I have a team of 16 sales reps I have taught to put fast quotes into the system but right now get kicked out so many times, app makes it easy for them to be on the road, & enter quotes, look up pricing, show cust pictures of product, check status of account. they use Ipads,so safari is a no. app is very powerful tool and I think they are missing a huge make not updating the app, the new generation loves thier phone and apps, please update app.

From a browser Microsoft forced me to download the app (webpage would not continue otherwise). But the app wouldn't allow function due to low screen resolution!! My phone has a high res screen, and it should work on a phone if you're forcing that. Typical Microsoft. Getting things right always seems like a grasp too far.

Two of our customers just reported that with BC 17.5 they are not able to login with the APP anymore. Buffer and locally stored data was cleared, and they can login. But they need to do this everytime to get the APP working now. Unfortunately they un-installed it on one of their devices, and they can't intall it again on a Zebra Android v10 version, because Google says it is unsopprted version? How can we get the BC installed again? It is working/installed on other equeal Zebra devices.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear that. Please update the mobile app to version 3.3.4201 that includes all the necessary fixes.We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app.
